.... achchari-vaḍe svargga-prâptan âda maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śubhaṃ bhavatu

div.head:
86
At Śirâḷakoppa (same hobli), on copper plates in possession of Jôyis-Śêshappa.
div.p: (Nâgari characters.)
(I b) śrî-Śaṅkaranê gatî | śubham astu |

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-dhara-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara parama-
bhaṭṭâraka Hastinâpura-varâdhîśvara ârôhaka-Bhagadatta ripu-râya-kântâ-datta-vairi-vaidhavya
Pâṇḍava-kula-ka[mala]-mârtâṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa kaliga-kôdaṇḍa gaṇḍa-mârttaṇḍa yêkâṅga-
vîra raṇa-raṅga-dhîra Aśvapati-râya-diśâpaṭṭa Gajapati-Râya-saṃhâraka Narapati-Râya-mastaka-
tala-prahâri sâmantaka-mṛiga-châmûra Koṅkaṇa-châtur-diśâ-bhayaṅkara chachcha-puṭṭa kâcha-
puṭṭa Îśvara-mukha-kamala-vinirgata-Brahma-vîṇâdi-Bharata-śâstra-prasiddha anêka-śâstra-pra-
vîṇa Kôraṇṭa-Vyâḷi-Nâgârjunâdi-mantra-traya-suddha prasiddha-samudaya-namita-pâdâravinda
ari-râya-kula-vilaya-kâlânala nîty-âkara parâṅganâ-putra suvarna-varâha-lâñchhana-dhvaja | śrî-
Sôma-vaṃśôdbhava Parîkshita-chakravarttî tat-putra Janamêjaya-chakravarttî Hastinâpurê sukha-
saṅkathâ-vinôdêna dakshiṇa-diśâ-varê yâ-dig-vijaya-yâtreyaṃ Tuṅgabhadrâ-Haridrâ-saṅgamê śrî-
Harihara-dêva-sannidhau kaṭakam utkalitaṃ Chaitra-mâsê kṛishṇa-pakshê Sômadinê Bharaṇî-
mahâ-nakshatrê saṅkrânti-vyatîpâta-nimitta-samayê | sarpa-yâgaṃ karômi âśîrvâda-pûrvakaṃ
chakravartti machchi pañchâṅga-pasâya-(II a) chhatra-sukhâsana-aṅka-daṇḍa-khaṇḍanê-jôtisha-
upâdhike sarva-namasyavâgi yêvaṃ Hirê-Jambûra-grâmât Masûru Goṭṭe-varaha Ballûra-grâmât |
brâhmaṇât | Kannaḍa-śâkheya Vaśishṭha-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Ruk-śâkheya Chhâya-Bhaṭ-
ṭara putra Chikka-Chhâyê-Bha[ṭṭa]ru tat-putra Śaṅkara-Liṅgaṇa-Jôyisarige aikamukhya tasyagrâ-
mântara-sîmântarâṇâṃ katha(ḥ)-pûrvakaṃ prathama-sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-dakshiṇôttara-pâ-
[shâ]ṇa-pratishṭheyu dvitîya-sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-dakshiṇôttara-pâshâṇa-pratishṭheyu tṛitîya-
sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-dakshiṇôttara-pâshâṇa-pratishṭheyu chaturtha-sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-
dakshṇôttara-pâshâṇa-pratishṭheyu yêvaṃ-katha (II b) Jambûra-sîme-Masûra-śîme-jyôtisha-upâ-
dhyake yâvach chandraś cha sûryyaś chav âgi Kṛishṇârpaṇaṃ ǁ yêvaṃ grâmât Ari-râya-kula-
vilaya-kâlânala śrî śrî (usual final verses)

div.head:
87
At Beḷagâmi, (Tâḷagunda hobli), on a pillar in the main-entrance of the Kêdârêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 55 neya Virôdhikṛitu-saṃvatsarad Âśvaijad amavâsey
Âdivâra-sûryya-grahaṇad andu śrîmatu Hoysaṇa-Ballâḷa-Dêvan-arasi tuppada-bâgala śêviyaru
śrî-Ballêśvara-[dê]vara nivêdyakkaṃ pûjârigaḷig .... var-artthamâgi sâlevaru .. śege
kaḍaṃ goṭṭa gadyâṇa ... vṛiddhi varshakke gadyâ ... yeraḍu honnu Mallêśvara-dê-
vargge kuḍuvantâgi ... koṇḍa pûjâri Lôkimayyana kâlaṃ karchchi Ballêśvarada sthâ-
...... paḍi yeraḍu gadyâṇa .... maṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭar â-sthâ-
nakkam â-hoṅge Lôkimayyana vaṃśadavar-oḍeyaru sâleyaparuśeyâ honnan avargge kuḍuvudu
koṭṭ-î-dharmmamaṃ pratipâḷisuvudu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî yî-dharmmaman aḷidavaṃ pañcha-mahâ-
pâtakan akkuṃ ǁ

div.head:
88
At the same temple, on the 4th pillar of the verandah.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu nâḷ-prabhu Nandinâgarada Gâḍa-Gauḍanu śrî-Kêdâra-dêvara maṇḍapadalu aḷaṅ-
kâra-sahitaṃ

div.head:
89
On the beam of the western door-way of the same verandah.
div.p:
śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bîrayya-Daṇḍanâyakaru aḷaṅkâra-sahita teṅkaṇa-mukha bhadrava mâ-
ḍisidaru

div.head:
90
At the same temple, on a vîrakal to the west of the entrance.
div.p:
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varsha hadinaidaneya Śrîmukha-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-bahuḷa
Da ... yandu Haḷeya-Nâyakana mayiduna Ko .. ya-Nâyaka .... tâṇḍâ ....
taḷt ir̤idu sura-lôka-prâptan âda .....

div.head:
91
On the first stone in the enclosure of the same temple.
div.p:
śubham astu Śaka 1807 ke sariyâda Pârttiva-saṃ ǁ rada Mârgaśira-bahuḷa 3 lu san 1885 ney
isavi December târîkhu 24 ne Guruvâra-sûryyôdayadalli Maisûru-mahâ[râja] Châma-Râja-Vaḍêru
Balligâvi-Kêtârêśvara-vagairê-dêvara darushaṇada uddêśya dayamâḍisi bahu-santôshârûḍhar âda-
ru dêvara viniyôga dêvastâna-kâmagârige êrpâḍu mâḍyâr âgi tôrutte yî-Balligâvi-nâḍ-ella Kallu-
mani-Garjina ... Channapaiyanavaru iddu .. Garjina-Gurupâdappana aksharagaḷu ǁ

div.head:
92
At the same place, on a 2nd stone.
div.p: ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ

lg.l: svasti tê Kêśavâmâtya yâvad â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Kâḷañjara-pura-varâdhîśvara suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirghôshaṇa Kaḷa-
churyya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa mâna-Kanakâchaḷa su-bhaṭar-âditya kaligaḷ-
aṅkuśa gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara pratâpa-Laṅkêśvara para-nârî-sahôdara Śanivâra-
siddhi giri-durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava niśśaṅka-mallâdi-yathârttha-nâ-
ma-śrîmad-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla Bijjaṇa-Dêvaṃ mahî-vallabheyan anudinav
anubhavisidan ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: pṛithvî yâ Pṛithunâ purâ chirataraṃ mûḍhêna gôtvaṃ gatâ |
ratnaṃ dêva tathaiva bhâti jaḍadhau vêḷâdhipâdhasthaḷê |
Vishṇôr vvakshasi kaustubhaṃ nṛipa-vara prauḍhêna sâ ślâghatâ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ int a-dvitîya-svâmitvadiṃ vasudhâ-vaḷayamaṃ sukhadin êka-chchhatradiṃ râjyaṃ geyvutt
irdd âtma-râjya-bhara-nirûpaṇaṃ mâḍid â-mahârâja-priya-tanaya-pratâpamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: ripu-bhûpâḷa-tamaugham ôḍe kumuda-brâtaṃ karaṃ perchche tad- |
nṛipanê Sôman enalke Bijjaṇa-mahîpâḷâbdhiyoḷ puṭṭida ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-bhuja-baḷa Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-tanûjaṃ râjâdhîrâjaṃ râja-mârttaṇḍaṃ mârttaṇḍa-karâti-
tîbra-têja-svabhâvaṃ bhâvitâśêsha-yâchakâbhilashita-phaḷa-pradâyakaṃ vairi-bhaya-dâyakaṃ Râ-
ya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêva-chakrêśvaraṃ samasta-pradhânariṃ parivêshṭitanâgi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda-
diṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam irddu samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta sênâdi-bâhattara-
niyôgâdhishṭhâyakaṃ prabhu-mantrôtsâha-pramukha-nîti-nishṭhâyakaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ
sarvvâdhikâri mahâ-pasâyitaṃ Byâḷikeya-Kêsimayya-Daṇḍanâyakaraṃ karadu dakshiṇa-diśâva-
rada bhaṇḍâravâda dêśaṅgaḷ ellavaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ mâl̤pud endu kâruṇyaṃ
mâḍal mahâ-prasâdam endu kaikoṇḍa mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍa-nâtha-pratâpônnatiyaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: idu Vidyâdhara-lôkah allad idu nâkânîkavant allad int |
idu Gandharvva-nikâyav all aṇav id â-sat-Kinnara-brâtav all |
tanag aḷavaṭṭa nîtiye parârtthame tanna bhujârjjitârtthav âl̤- |
dana mahimônnatitvame nijônnetiy âśrita-tushṭi tannad end |
enipa negaḷte perchche sale jîvise Kêśava-Daṇḍanâyakâ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant anêka-mahimônnataṃ Taddavâḍi sâsiramumaṃ Hânugall aynûr̤umaṃ Banavase pannir-
chchhâsiramumaṃ sukhadin anêka-kâlaṃ paripâḷisuttaṃ sva-dêśâvalôkanârtthaṃ bandu śrîmad-
anâdi-paṭṭaṇaṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara mâṭa-kûṭa-prâsâda
ratna pûje suvarṇṇa-kaḷaśa vidyâ-dânânnadânâdy-anêka-śrî-kârryamaṃ nôḍi yidu Vârâṇasigaṃ
virmmaḍi Kêdârakkaṃ nûrmmaḍi Śrîparvvatakkaṃ sâsirmmaḍiy adu-kâraṇav illig ênânuṃ dharm-
mavaṃ mâḍi kṛitârtthan ahen endu tadîya-sthânâchâryyar appa śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvara samî-
pakke vand avara vidyâ-viśêsha-mahimônnatiyaṃ nîḍuṃ nôḍi ǁ

lg.l: nâṭyâdau bharatê muniś cha Bharataḥ kâvyê Subandhuḥ svayaṃ |
sô’yaṃ râja-gurur yyathârtha-kathitaś śrî-Vâmaśaktir yyatiḥ ǁ

div.p:
ity-âdy-anêka-prakâradiṃ stutiyisutav âtmîya-dharmmâbhiprâya-vṛittântaman avarg ar̤ipuvudun
tad astu nîv ênaṃ dharmmavaṃ mâḍidaḍaṃ svîkarisi ihev enal śrîmat-Kaḷachuryya-varshada 16
neya Sarvvadhâri-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-Paurṇṇami-Âdityavâra-sôma-grahaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-vya-
tîpâtad andu Hânugal-nâḍa Yelambiya-kampaṇada bal̤iya bâḍaṃ Chikka-Kaṇṇugiyaṃ śrîmad-
dakshiṇa-Kêdâra-dêvar-aṅga – bhôga-raṅga-bhôga-khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ brâhmaṇa-
tapôdhanar-anna-dâna-vidyâ-dânakkav â-sthânad âchâryya śrîmad-Gautama-Dêva-priya-śishya
śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi tri-bhôgâbhyantarav â-chandrârka-târaṃ-baraṃ salvant-
âgi śrîmad-Râya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêvage binnahaṃ geydu tâṃbra-śâsanamaṃ paḍedu tanda Byâḷikeya-
Kêśimayya-Daṇḍanâyakaṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭan î-dhrmmoman âvanânuṃ paripâlisidâ-
Vâraṇâsi-Kurukshêtrâdy-utkṛishṭa – kshêtraṅgaḷal vêda-śâstrôditâhitâgnikâmushyâyaṇa – sahasra-
brâhmaṇarige sahasra-kavilegaḷaṃ suvarṇṇânêka-ratnaṅgaḷiṃ kôḍuṃ koḷagumaṃ kaṭṭisi dânamaṃ
koṭṭa phalav î-dharmmaman aḷidavan â-kshêtradoḷ â-tithiyoḷ â-brâhmaṇaruman â-kavilegaḷaṃ
sva-hastadindav aḷida narakakke iḷidan îy-artthada sâkshitvêna śruti ǁ (usual final verse)

div.head:
93
At the same place, on a 3rd stone.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-Pra-
tâpa-Dêva-Râyara kumâra Vijaya-Râya-mahârâyaru ............ Hastinâvatiya nelavîḍinoḷu sukha-
saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyutt ire śrîman-mahâ-pradhâna Bayicheya-Daṇṇâyakara kumâra
................................. geye . beḷiya ........... Dêvaru ............ Dêvaru Koḍa-
nâḍ-oḷagaṇa ... Kuḍigereya Siddhêśvara-Dêvaru Pañchêśvara-Dêvaru mukhyavâda ...............
âchâriya Buḷḷa-Dêvaṅgaḷa su-châritrav ent endaḍe ǁ parama-śuddha .. pâvana-charitra viśâla-
chittaṃ śâstradoḷ pariṇatânvayâmbudhi-sudhâkaraṃ ...... śrî ... kalpa-bhûruhaṃ ...............
arâti-da ... pa râjipaṃ dhareyoḷ â-Bommi-Dêvana su-putram Buḷḷa-Dêvaṃ kṛita-dâna ............
nigamôktiya vichâradoḷuṃ migi ... prabhâva dhâruṇiyoḷu tannaṃ ........... koṭṭa ...... ambu-
dhâreyan er̤adu ...... bhakti ............ tannoḷ âvagaṃ vara-guṇi Buḷḷa-Dêvana charitrateg âr
sari bhû-taḷâgradoḷ ǁ

lg.l: sthirateyoḷu Buḷḷa-Dêvana guṇaṅgaḷa baṇṇipar âr dharitriyoḷ ǁ

div.p:
Śaka-varushaṃ ... sâvirada munnûr̤a nâlvatta nâlkar̤a Śubhakṛituv enisida saṃvatsaradoḷ Âsvîja-
suddhada pañchamî- ..... yavâradoḷ

lg.l: Chenna ... Buḷḷayya Bâchale | unnate Maḍukâye tammoḷ atiśayadindaṃ ǁ śrî

div.head:
94
At the same place, on a 4th stone.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvara parama-bhaṭ-
ṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ svasti samasta-
bhuvana-vikhyâta – pañcha-sata-vîra-sâsana-labdhânêka-guṇa – gaṇâḷaṅkṛita satya – sauchâchâra-
châru-châritra naya-vinaya-Vîra-Baḷañja-dharmma-pratipâḷana viśuddha-guḍḍa-dhvaja-virâjitâ-
nûna-Khaṇḍaḷi-Mûḷabhadrôdbhava dvâtriṃsa-veḷâmavavum ashṭâdasa-paṭṭaṇamuṃ chaushashṭi-
yôga-pîṭhamam ar̤uvatta-nâlku-ghaṭika-sthânamum Ayyâvoḷe-pura-paramêśvaran śaraṇâgata-vajra-
pañjararuṃ pirid-ittu-mar̤evaru mar̤ege vare kâvaruṃ para-nârî-sahôdararuṃ âśrita-jana-kalpa-vṛi-
ksharuṃ nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-paṭṭaṇaṃ râjadhânî-Baḷḷigrâmeya paṭṭaṇa-
svâmi Hanumanta-Seṭṭiyuṃ Bammi-Seṭṭiyuṃ Mêchi-Seṭṭiyuṃ Saudore-Biṭṭimayyanuṃ ... ḍa-svâmi
Śaṅkarayyanu sênabûva-Śaṅkaraiyyanu chalad-aṅka-Râmaṃ maṇigâr̤a Nâgi-Seṭṭiyum antu sama-
sta-nagaramu mummuri-daṇḍamuṃ Mandâra-Baladêva-Seṭṭiyu Mêhari-Kâṭayanu Biṭiyaṇṇanu
Bhattakêriya Kâḷi-Seṭṭiyuṃ jagatî-samûhaṃ berasi nâlvar vvôvugaḷum ar̤uvattu-kottaḷiyuṃ naga-
rada vaśa-varttigaḷum ir̤du ǁ

lg.l: dhareg eseva śakti-pari(r)shege | karam agraṇi yenipa parvvatâvaḷiyoḷ Mû- |
varakôṇeya-santatig â- | bharaṇaṃ Kêdâraśakti-muni-pati negar̤da ǁ
ê mâto Lâkuḷîśar | ttâm ene sarvva-jña-kaḷpar esedar aḷumbaṃ ǁ

div.p:
â-munipana śishyar svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-prâṇâyâma-pratyâhâra-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mau-
nânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar siddhânta-tarkka-vyâkaraṇa – kâvya-nâṭaka-bharatâdy-
anêka-sâhitya-vidyâ-pravîṇarum appa dakshiṇa-diśâ-bhâgada Tâvareger̤eya Nakharêśvara-Dêvar-
âchâryyaru Sômêśvara-Paṇḍita-Dêvargge svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 18 neya Śrî-
mukha-saṃvatsarada Pâlguṇad Amâvâsye-Âdivâra-sûrya-grahaṇad andu dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ
khaṇḍa-sphuṭitakkam alliya vidyârtthi-tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkam endu kâlaṃ-karchchi dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi (after details of gift) int inituman aśêsha-nagaraṃ neradiddu koṭṭaru ǁ î-dhar-
mmakke Châvvoṇḍabôvaṃ anukûḷa-sahâya ǁ

lg.l: ivan îy-andadoḷ eyde rakshisidavaṅg ishṭârttha-saṃsiddhi saṃ- |
bhavikuṃ pûṇd aḷipaṅge Gaṅge Gaye Kêdâraṃ Kurukshêtram em- |
b ivar̤oḷ pêsade pârvvaraṃ kavileyaṃ strî-bâḷaraṃ liṅgiy-a- |
ppavaraṃ kondan avaṃ sva-gôtra-sahitaṃ bîḷguṃ mahâ-ghôradoḷ ǁ

div.head:
95
At the same place, on a fifth stone.

lg.l: Pañcha-gôr nnidhanaṃ sômaṃ vandê Nyaṅkv-aṅka-śêkharaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Gûrjara-
vâraṇâṅkuśaṃ Mâḷaviya mallaṃ Teluṅga-râya-śiraḥ-kamaḷa-sa-mûḷôtpâṭana-karaṃ ari-râya-jaga-
jhampaṃ râya-Nârâyaṇa śrî-Siṃhaṇa-Dêvana pratâpav ent endaḍe ǁ

tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sarvvâdhikâri mahâ-parama-viśvâsi râya-nâyaka-
Nârâyaṇaṃ śrî-Mâyi-Dêva-Paṇḍitara prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: byâpârêṇa su-niśchitêna satataṃ yêna prajâ rañjitâḥ |
prâyô’râti-gaṇân vijitya sakaḷân âstê bhuvaṃ dhârayan ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant alliya śrîmanu mahâ-pasâytaṃ sarvvâdhikâri parama-viśvâsi gaṇḍa-peṇḍâra Hemmayya-
Nâyakana prabhâvav ent endade ǁ

lg.l: hṛidayê kamaḷâṃ dṛishṭvâ jihvâyâṃ cha sarasvatîṃ |
kîrttis sâpatnya-khinnêva yasya yâti dig-antaraṃ ǁ

div.p: âtana satiya prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: vommiṅge sariy Arundhatiy | immiṅg â-Lakshmi-dêvi sarisaman akkuṃ |
hemmeyalu saradhi nâyaka- | Hemmana sati Ruppubâyig itarar ssariyê ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ ant â-dampatigaḷ irbbaruṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ Baḷigâvege band-irdd â-stha-
ḷakk adhideyvam appa śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: namata Śivam amêyaṃ taṃ chidânanda-rûpaṃ ǁ
Vâmaśaktir yyathâ pûrvvam Upamanyur mmahâ-tapâḥ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant alliya dêva-bhôgamaṃ âchâryya-Śrîkaṇṭha-Dêvara śishyar appa mahâ-brati Vâmaśakti-
Dêvara vidyâ-samagrateyaṃ bratitvamaṃ kaṇḍu Kêdârêśvara-dêvara nandâ-dîvige-gandhâkshate-
pushpa-dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdya-tâmbûḷa-Chaitra-pavitra-Śivarâtri-śîtâḷagaḍuge-pañcha-pavva-graha-
ṇa-kâraṇaṃ 137 neya Yuva-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapadad Amâvâsye-Bṛihaspativâradandu Hemmay-
ya-Nâyakaru Banavâse-nâḍa suṅkâdhikâradaliy â-sthânâchâryya Vâmaśakti-Dêvara pâda-prakshâ-
ḷanaṃ geydu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi hejjuṅka-manneya meyder̤e-vokkalu-der̤e-mukhya kir̤ukuḷa-
suṅka-voḷagâgi muttu mâṇika paṭṭe davasav êna hêr̤idaḍaṃ sarvvamânyavâgi biṭṭa sthaḷada ettu
25 Sirivoḷala-sthaḷada gâṇa 2 (final phrases)

suṅkadavan âgali aras âgali adhikâriy âgali yî-śâsanada mariyâdege aḷidâtana (usual im-
precatory phrase.)

div.head:
96
At the same place, on the sixth stone.
div.p: ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

namô râja-guravê svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabba mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara
parama-bhaṭṭâraka Kâḷañjara-pura-varâdhîśvara suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirg-
ghôshaṇa Kaḷachurrya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa mâna-Kanakâchaḷa subhaṭar-âdi-
tya kaligaḷ-aṅkuśa gaja-sâmanta saraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara pratâpa-Laṅkêśvara para-nârî-sahôdara
Śanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava niśśaṅka-mallâdi-ya-
thârttha-nâma śrîmad-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla-Bijjaṇa-Dêvaṃ mahî-vallabheyan
anudinam anubhavisidan ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: pṛithvî yâ Pṛithunâ purâ chirataraṃ mûḍhêna gôtvaṃ gatâ |
ratnaṃ dêva tathaiva bhâti jaḍadhau vêḷâdhipâthas-sthaḷê |
Vishṇôr vvakshasi kaustubhaṃ nṛipa-vara prauḍhêna sâ ślâghatâ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ ant enisida râjâdhirâja-priya-tanaya-pratâpamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: ripu-bhûpâḷa-tamaugham ôḍe kumuda-brâtaṃ karaṃ perchche tad- |
nṛipanê Sôṃan enalke Bijjaṇa-mahîpâḷâbdhiyoḷ puṭṭida ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ antu puṭṭi kshôṇî-taḷav ellavan êka-chchhatradind âḷda Râya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêvânujan âḷdan
ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: tat-samanantaradoḷ dhare- | g utsavamaṃ mâḍi satya-śaucha-bratada Sa- |
ritsuta-doreyaṃ nava-Puru- | kutsaṃ Saṅkamma-Dêvan âḷdaṃ dhareya ǁ
Lâḷana bâḷakan ariyir endu charar sale binnapaṅgaḷaṃ |

div.p:
ant anêka-prakâradiṃ vasudhâ-vaḷayavaṃ nish-kaṇṭakaṃ mâḍida mahârâjâdhirâja chakrêśvarana
râjya-pradhânâṅgaṅgaḷe mahâ-pradhânar âdar enisida piriya-daṇḍa-nâyakaṃ Lakmi-Dêvanuṃ bâ-
hattara-niyôgâdhishṭhâyakaṃ Chaṇḍuṅgi-Dêvanuṃ vasudhaika-bândhavaṃ Rêchaṇayya-daṇḍanâ-
yakanuṃ sarvvâdhikâri Sôvaṇayya-daṇḍanâyakanuṃ samasta-sênâgrêsaraṃ Kâvaṇayya-daṇḍanâ-
yakanuṃ voḷagâgi samasta-pradhânasahitaṃ vinôdadiṃ dakshiṇa-diśâvarakke vandu Banavase-
pannir-chchhâsirad adhishṭhânaṃ Baḷḷigrâmeya śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara tri-kûṭa-
prâsâdamumaṃ latâ-maṇṭapamumaṃ ratna-pûjânêka-svarṇa-kaḷaśaṅgaḷumaṃ vidyâ-dânânna-dânâ-
dy-anêka-śrî-kâryyamaṃ nôḍi yathârtthaṃ dakshiṇa-Kêdârav illi nâv ênânuṃ dharmma-kâryya-
maṃ mâḍalvêl̤kuv endu tadîya-sthânânhâryyar appa śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvaraṃ kaṇḍ avara
tapaḥ-prabhâvâdi-sâmartthyakk âścharyyadiṃ nîḍuṃ nôḍi ǁ

lg.l: nâṭyâdau Bharatê muniś cha Bharataḥ kâvyêshu Mâghas svayaṃ |
siddhântê Nakulîśvaraś Śiva-padê Skandas svabhâvair gguṇais |
sô ‘yaṃ râja-gurus sadâ vîjayatê śrî-Vâmaśaktir yyatiḥ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ svasti śrîmat-Saṅkama-Dêva-varshada 5 neya Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-mâsad amâvâsye-
Sômavâra-Vṛisha-saṅkramaṇa-vyatîpâtad andu śrîmat-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhô-
ga-khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ tapôddhana-brâhmaṇar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ | Jiḍḍul̤igeya
kampaṇaḍa bal̤iya bâḍaṃ Kir̤u-Baḷḷigâveyaṃ śrîmat-Saṅkama-Dêva-chakravartti | tadîya-sthânâ-
châryyar appa śrîmad-râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍiy
â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ sarvva-namaśyaṃ salvantâgi koṭṭan î-dharmmaman âvan orbbaṃ
paripâlisidaṃ śata-kratuvaṃ mâḍidavan ǁ î-dharmmaman aḷidavaṃ śata-kratuvuman tadîya-dvija-
ruvan aḷidantaha narakakke vôhan |

svasti śrîman-maha-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Tailaha-Dêvanuṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Yer̤aharasanuṃ
bandu dharmmamaṃ nôḍi yidu namm anvayânugatav appa guru-kuḷa-sthânav illi nâvuv ênânuṃ
dharmmavaṃ mâḍal-vêl̤kuv endu dharmma-buddhiyan tandar avara pratâpamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: kadanakk ugrâriy ammal tridaśa-bhuvanavaṃ prîtiyiṃ bandu kâṇbaṅg |
odavidd aiśvaryamaṃ bhîtarig asu-gatiyaṃ mâl̤panê nôl̤pav endaṅg |
ide dal mâl̤paṃ kar̤utt Ekkala-nṛipa-tanayan Tailapa-kshôṇipâḷaṃ |
madadindaṃ prîtiyindaṃ hṛidayada kṛipeyiṃ sâdu mechchalke nichcha ǁ
dhuradoḷag ôḍida ripu-nṛipa- | r arasiyara kaṭâksha-ruchiyan îkshisar innuṃ |
dhareyoḷag Er̤aharasana posa- | karavâḷina beḷage poḷayit emb ati-bhayadiṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant anêka-prakârada pogaḷtegaṃ negaḷtegan tâve neley enisi śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ
Tailaha-Dêvanuṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Yar̤aharasanuṃ śrîmat-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara mahâ-
naivêdyakkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ prâg-likhita-viśishṭa-tithiyoḷ tadîya-sthânâchâryyar appa śrîmad-
râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Jiḍḍul̤ige-nâḍa bal̤iya
bâḍaṃ Kir̤u-Baḷḷigâveya manneyumaṃ kir̤u-kuḷâya-dâya-sahitaṃ sarvva-namaśyav â-chandrârkka-
târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi koṭṭar (usual final phrases) îy-artthada sâkshitvêna smṛiti | ślôka |
sva-dattâṃ &c. ǁ

div.head:
97
On the same stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-Saka-varsha 1108 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-ba 5 Va śrîmat-Kêdâra-
dêvara maṇṭapaman avadhiyal nirvâṇaṃ mâḍidakke śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvar mmechchi Kir̤u-Baḷ-
ḷigâveya hâlanalli Râvaleger̤eyin teṅkal Hâḷigûṭada keyi kammaṃ nûr̤-ayvattaṃ Bisadôja | Châvô-
ja | Siṅgôjan int î-mûvarggav â-chandrârkkaṃ sarvva-namaśyaṃ salvant âgi koṭṭar ǁ mattam â-
Beḍugey-eppattar̤a baḷiya bâḍaṃ Siruvoḷalumaṃ sarvva-namasyavâgi tri-bhôgâbhyantara naḍe-
vantâgi koṭṭaru sosti astu Siva-sâsana

div.head:
98
At the same place, on a seventh stone.

lg.l: sura-danujârâdhyasya cha yasya sa vaḥ pâtu Pârvvatî-ramaṇaḥ ǁ
dvat-pûjyaṃ guṇa-ratna-sa | ritpatiy enisidan Anantapâḷa-chamûpaṃ ǁ
pati-hitaroḷ ellam aggada | pati-hitan ati-śuchigaḷ ensi negaḷdavaroḷ mikk |
ati-śuchi dakshar enipparo- | ḷ ati-dakshan Anantapâḷa-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ ǁ
ttarisidano lôkadoḷ bhâ- | sura-yaśaman Anantapâḷan âha ... ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ |
ripu-pura-Tripura-Hara-sâyakaṃ | sakaḷa-naṭa-nagna-bhugna-gâyaka – vandi-brinda-santarppaṇa-
samarttha-vitaraṇa-viḷâsaṃ | vîra-lakshmî-nivâsaṃ | virôdhi-Pañchânanaṃ | vivêka-Chaturâna-
naṃ | guṇa-ratna-mâḷikâḷaṅkâraṃ | budha-janâdhâraṃ | Lâṭa-kuḷa-kumuda-vana-vidhu-karaṃ |
Hara-charaṇa-sarasiruha-madhukaraṃ śrîmad-Anantapâḷa-daṇḍanâyakan eraḍ-Ar̤u-nûr̤umaṃ Bana-
vase-pannirchchhâsiramuṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷamuṃ perjjuṅkamumaṃ paḍedu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
pratipâḷisuttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: ḷâ-vilasitan ên esedano | Gôvindaṃ sakaḷa-vibudha-janatânandaṃ ǁ
anatârâtiyan ôvad ikki jayamaṃ tâḷdal samartthâtman â- |
vano Gôvindane sârdda śishṭar-eḍar̤aṃ tûḷdalke sâlvannan â- |
vano Gôvindane kîrttiyaṃ paḍedu jîy ayy embinaṃ sandan â- |
vano Gôvindane matte matte per̤araṃ kâṇeṃ dharâ-chakradoḷ ǁ
śaraṇ emag endu bandaḍ ar̤iyeṃ maled ântaḍe bhâladoḷ podal̤d |
karam ene tôr̤uguṃ samara-raṅgadoḷ î-raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ ǁ
uriv Urigaṇṇa nîḷd urivol âge bhayaṅkara-kôpa-vanhi bhî- |
kara-kara-śûḷamaṃ karam agurbbisut irppa karâsi tâne pôlt |
ire gaṇam âge sad-bhaṭa-gaṇaṃ ripu-sênege pôlkum ugra-saṅ- |
mur̤iv ur̤adinda per-bbuliya mîseyoḷ uyyalan âḍuv ondu pê- |
rar̤ikey bîrar ântaḍam ad ê-vesagoṇḍape nettaraṃ nela-
chchariy enal êr̤isuvaṃ saṅ- | garadoḷ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ Gôvindaṃ ǁ
birudara Javan adaṭara gôḷ- | muri malevara mâri gaṇḍa-vachcharadoḷ ma- |
chcharisuvara mirttu sauryyâ- | bharaṇaṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ Gôvindaṃ ǁ
graṇiy ene negardirddaṃ dhâ- | raṇiyoḷ Gôvindan ahita-danuja-Mukundaṃ ǁ
adaṭinoḷ aṇminoḷ âyado- | ḷ odavida nichchaṭikeyoḷ per̤ar ssaman ill em- |
budan enisuva su-bhaṭaṃ jita- | kadanaṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ Gôvindaṃ ǁ
sura-kîrtti-priyan âgi sanda guṇa-ratnaṃ Dâsi-Râjaṃ Parâ- |
kare Sômâmbike tân enalke jagadoḷ Gôvindan êṃ dhanyanô ǁ

div.p: vachanaṃ ǁ mattam â-mahânubhâvan-audâryya-prabhâvamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: esakaman ântavaṅge pesar âvud ad êtar̤a mêle bir̤du tân |
oseyisuvaṃ priyaṃ muḷidaḷaṃ kivig êṃ pesar ârppin-êḷgeyiṃ |

div.p: Kali-kâla-Karṇṇaṃ ǁ

vachanaṃ ǁ â-samasta-guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇanuṃ | vibhuda-jana-śaraṇanuṃ | nija-viśuddha-kîrtti-
chandrikâ-prabhâva-vikasita-jagad-vaḷaya-kairavanuṃ | raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavanuṃ sakaḷa-su-kavi-
jana-kaḷpa-bhûjanuṃ | viśhama-haya-Vatsa-râjanuṃ | vîra-lakshmî-nivâsanuv | Anantapâḷa-pra-
sâdâsâditâdhikâra-lakshmî-viḷâsanum enisida śrîmad-daṇḍanâyaka-Gôvindarasar Mêlvaṭṭeya
vaḍḍa-râvuḷamuv eraḍuṃ bilkoḍeyuṃ perjjuṅkamumaṃ paḍedu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ prati-
pâḷisuttam ire ǁ

lg.l: dhareg eseva Sakti-parshege | karam agraṇiy enipa Parvvatâvaiḷiyoḷ Mû- |
vara-kôṇeya santatig â- | bharaṇam Kêdâraśakti-yatipati negal̤daṃ ǁ

div.p: â-mahânubhâvana śishyan ê-doreyan endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: kkelabar vyâkaraṇajñar int initumaṃ bâpp intu viśvambharâ- |
taḷadoḷ ballavar âr enalke negal̤daṃ vidyâbdhi-Sômêśvaraṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhyâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannaṃ |
vibudha-jana-prasannaṃ | nyâya-śâstra-vistṛita-sarôja-vana-divâkaraṃ | Vaiśêshika-vârddhi-var-
ddhana-śarat-sudhâkaraṃ | Sâṅkhyâgama-pravîṇa-mâṇikyâbharaṇaṃ | guru-charaṇa-sarasiruha-
shaṭcharaṇaṃ | śabda-śâstra-sahakâra-vana-Vasantaṃ | prajñôdayôdbuddha-Lâkuḷa-siddhântaṃ |
nirupamôpanyâsa-Dêva-nadî-pravâhaṃ | nija-datta-mantra-prabhâva-saṃvarddhita-śishya-sandô-
haṃ | sâhitya-vidyâ-mahâ-nadî-pravâha-nimnagâdhîśvaraṃ | bhakti-prabhâva-paritushṭa-Paramê-
śvaraṃ | niravadya-nirmmaḷa—tapô-guṇaika-niḷayaṃ | kîrtti-kaumudî-mudita-mêdinî-vaḷayaṃ |
nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmat-Sômêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvar ǁ

lg.l: ene negar̤d â-muni-nâthaṃ | tanag ar̤ipi yaśôrtthi Kṛishṇa-Râjânujan oḷ- |
pina-kaṇi Gôvindaṃ pada- | vinatâhita-bṛindan akhiḷa-vibudhânandaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam iral Kalyâ-
ṇada nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire | śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-
varshada 27 neya Chitrabhânu-saṃvatsarada Paushya-śuddha 13 Budhavârad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrâ-
ntiyandu ǁ Kuntaḷa-dharitrî-kânteya viḷôḷa-kuntaḷa-kaḷâpadant eseva Banavase-pannirchchhâsi-
rakk aḷaṅkâram âgi tôrppa Baḷḷigâveya Tâvareger̤eya dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara sthânad
âchâryyar appa Sômêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi śrîmad-daṇḍa-
nâyakaṃ Gôvindarasar śrîmat-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara dhûpa-dîpa-nivêdyakk endu | âv-âgardoḷ piḍid
alli mâr̤uvaḍam er̤aḍu-lakkav-aḍakege perjjuṅkamuṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷamum eraḍuṃ bilkoḍeyuṃ sarvva-
namasyam endu biṭṭar ǁ

lg.l: ivan îy-andadoḷ eyde pâḷisidavaṅg ishṭârttha-saṃsiddhi sam- |
bhavikuṃ pûṇd al̤idandu Gaṅge Gaye Kêdâraṃ Kuru-kshêtram em- |
b ivaroḷ pêsade pârvvaraṃ kavileyaṃ strî-bâḷaraṃ ḷiṅgiy a- |
ppavaraṃ kondan avaṃ sva-gôtra-sahitaṃ biḷguṃ nigôdaṅgaḷoḷ ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse.)

lg.l: sanam âdud embinaṃ śâ- | sanaman idaṃ baredan âśu-kavi Niṭalâkshaṃ ǁ
parikise Malli-dêva-vibhug âr ssaman irbbarum ir-kkelaṅgaḷoḷ |
bareduvan antyadiṃ bareva bâjipa bâjipa kabbam entuṭ ant- |
ire posa-gabbamaṃ nuḍiva bhâvisi kêḷva kathâ-chatushkamaṃ |
dhare parikarmmam end initumaṃ guṇiyippa mati-prabhâvadoḷ ǁ

div.p:
śrimat-sahaja-Sârasvata | vâchaka-Vârijâsanaṃ | nânâ-vidhâvadhâraṇâ-chakravartti Mallikârjju-
na-bhaṭṭaṃ kavi-Kañjasambhavaṃ ǁ

div.head:
99
At the same place, on an eighth stone.

row.cell: * So in the original. ślô ǁ

lg.l: iti Sômêśvarô’ paśyan munir vvâdi-manôharaḥ ǁ

div.p: śivam astu ǁ

lg.l: birudaṃ biṭṭ al̤ki kaṇḍirpp ati-bhaya-rasadin tamma tamm âḷva viśvam- |
bhareyaṃ biṭṭ adri-kuñjaṅgaḷoḷ ul̤id ul̤id irpp urkki mârântu yuddhâ- |
nered irpp udyôgamaṃ śâtravarge salisuvaṃ Vikramâditya-Dêvaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ enisi pogaḷteyuṃ negaḷteyum appukeyda samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha ma-
hârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-
Tribhuvanamalle-Dêvaṃ nija-vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrâr-
kka-târaṃ salal Kalyâṇada nelebîḍinoḷ parama-kalyâṇâbhyudaya-bhâgi samasta-dharâ-maṇḍaḷa-
man êka-chchhatradiṃ pâḷisuttaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadind ire ǁ

lg.l: jagadoḷ muṃ khyâtiyan tâḷdida mṛigadharan-âmnâyadoḷ râja-bhâvaṃ |
negaḷd âkhyâ-śâmyadind â-śaśige gata-kaḷaṅkâtmaroḷ tammoḷ entuṃ |
negaḷdatt ill arttha-sâdṛiśyadin enisi jasaṃ betta nânâ-kavîndrô- |
ktig aḍarppâd oḷpu tammoḷ negaḷe negaḷda Pâṇḍyarkkaḷoḷ puṇya-puñjar ǁ

div.p: va ǁ anêkar arasu-makkaḷ prabhavise |

lg.l: Kṛita-yugadoḷ Jamadagnige | kṛitakṛityaṅg ogedu Rêṇuki-patig aṅgî- |
kṛita-guru-vadhanaṃ vadhiyisi | Kṛitavîryyâtmajanan ati-baḷaṃ Paraśudharaṃ ǁ
dharaṇî-maṇḍaḷadoḷ dharâbhujaran irppatt oudu sûḷ kondu tad- |
baram itt alli dharâmara-svaḍoḷ iralk âg endu pôg-otti sâ- |
garamaṃ châpada korppinoḷ budha-nutaṃ śrî-Rêṇukî-nandanaṃ ǁ
kaṇa-mâtrôdakaman iralk | aṇam îyade paśchimâbdhi teged eḍeyoḷ Koṅ- |
kaṇa-saptakamaṃ Phaṇi-kaṅ- | kaṇa-varade nijâśrayârtthaṃ â-vibhu paḍedaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ antu Paraśurâma-sṛishṭiy enisida |

lg.l: Koṅkaṇa-dhâtrî-vaniteya | kaṅkaṇadant eseva Haiveyoḷ Sisugali sand |
aṅkada nâyaka-maṇivol | biṅkaṃ paḍed irkkum atuḷa-śôbhâ-sadanaṃ ǁ
pesar-arigaḷ alli puṭṭida | sisugaṃ kalitanaman ittu pande-tanakk â- |
vasatam enisirppar adar̤iṃ | Sisugaliy enisittu râjadhâni-śrêshṭhaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ alli palambaruṃ Pâṇḍyar arasu-geydu saluttam ire |

lg.l: janatâ-manô’bhinandana- | m ene kîrtti-jyôtsne beḷage jagadoḷage jalakk- |
ane Chandrâmnâya-payô- | vanadhiyoḷ udayisidan urvvarâ-pati-Chandraṃ ǁ
lalanâ-jana-ratnaṃ Kam- | mala-Dêvi janâbhivandyey â-Chandraṅg u- |
jvaḷa-chandrikeyant ant a- | ggaḷisidaḷ esed oḷpan âtma-saṅgatiyindaṃ ǁ
sutan ogedaṃ vibhu tad-dam- | patigaḷg Abdhijeyum Abdhiśayananum ivar î- |
kshitig enip avarg ati-subhagaṃ | chatura-strî-jana-manô’bhirâmaṃ Kâmaṃ ǁ
chature guṇa-rûpavati jana- | nute Bhâgala-Dêvi râja-putrî-ratnaṃ |
Rati tân î-Kâmaṅg î- | satiy enal â-vibhuge chitta-vallabhey âdaḷ ǁ
kalitanam ârggam î-kali kaṭâkshisuvannegam elliyuṃ bhujâ- |
salut iral akkum urbbid-adaṭ îy-adaṭaṃ bhrukuṭi-prabhâvamaṃ |
nelegoḷipannegaṃ mukhadoḷ embudu Chandra-narêndranaṃ jagaṃ ǁ
vanitâ-jana-vandye yaśô- | dhane Sâvala-Dêvi su-dṛiḍha-purusha-vratey ant |
enip â-Chandraṅg î-bhâ- | mini Rôhiṇi tân enalke vallabhey âdaḷ ǁ
â-vibhuviṅgaṃ Sâvala- | Dêvigam âdaṃ tanûbhavaṃ Bhava-bhakti |
śrî-varan a-maḷina-kîrtti- | śrî-vibhavaṃ Kâma-Dêvan adaṭara dêvaṃ ǁ
Ratig eṇeyâge bîra-siri mâdhavam âge mahâhavaṃ samû- |
tatig er̤agippa balme nijam âgire sanda samagran amba bâ- |
pp atiśaya-Kâma-dêvan ivan endapud urvvare Kâma-Dêvanaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant ensi Pâṇḍyânvayâvaḷiy emba mâniniya mogakke mûg irppante Pâṇḍya-pîṭhikeyoḷ ir-
dda | samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara | Gôkarṇṇa-pura-varâdhîśvara | Pâṇ-
ḍya-vaṃśa-chûḍâmaṇi | gaṇḍara dâmaṇi | parâṅganâ-Nadî-nandana | budha-jauânandana | Koṅ-
kaṇa-râshṭra-pâla | pusivara sûla | kîrttige nalla | Nigaḷaṅka-malla | śiraḥ-śêkharîbhûta-śrîmat-
Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâravinda | vîra-vṛitti-kandaḷî-kanda | nâmâdi-praśasti-sahita śrîmat-Tri-
bhuvanamalla-Kâma-Dêvarasar ssukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam irdd-ondu devasaṃ
Śiva-dharmma-kathâ-kathana-prasaṅgadoḷ |

lg.l: dhârmmikâd aparô nâsti vandyô jagati kaśchana ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ emba Śiva-dharmmânuśâsanaman âtmârâdhyar appa Sârasvata-mahôdaya śrîmat-Sômêśvara-
paṇḍita-dêvara divya-vachanadindam avadharisi Śiva-dharmma-kâryya-tâtparyya-tad-gata-chi-
ttan âgi |

lg.l: vana-pâḷan akhiḷa-vidvaj- | jana-pâḷan Anantapâḷan adhipatiy îyal ǁ

div.p: va ǁ paḍedu niyôgise tan-niyôgadiṃ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: guṇan aṇṇan-aṅka-kâr̤aṃ | praṇuta-yaśaṃ Kṛishṇa-Râjan-aṇugina tammaṃ ǁ
maleyade besakeyva besaṃ | maleyad enal pâḷisuttam ire Banavaseyaṃ |
malapara jûjû sudhâ-ni- | rmmala-parama-yaśaḥ-prabhâva-nidhi Gôvindaṃ ǁ
Banavase-nâl̤k idu bhûshaṇa- | m ene sogayipa râjadhâni Balipuradoḷ tâ- |
j-janapaṃ paṭṭaṇasâvi dal | ene pesar vaḍed irdda Mêchi-Seṭṭiya sutana ǁ
Bhuvanaika-Seṭṭiy-âtmô- | dbhavan enisida Mêchi-Seṭṭi kâl-garchch âg a- |
bja-vanad adhas-sthaḷad uṇ- | bal̤iy-avaniyan îyalke samuchita-vyavahâraṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ â-mahâ-râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveyoḷ uḷḷa ǁ

lg.l: anituṃ pañcha-maṭha-sthâ- | na-nagaramuṃ mûr̤u-ppuramum ar̤iyuttire ne- |
ṭṭane nûr̤a-pattu kammama- | n an-avadyaṃ mâr̤ugoṇḍu dhârâ-sahitaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ mattam â-mahâ-râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya pañcha-maṭha-sthânadoḷ piriya-maṭhad âchâryyar
î-Śântaśiva-paṇḍitaruṃ | Pañchaliṅgad âchâryyar kKriyâśakti-paṇḍitaruṃ | Tripurântakad-âchâ-
ryyar kKriyâśakti-paṇḍitaruṃ | Mûliga-Ponneya-jîyaruṃ | nagaradoḷ Eṇṭheyana Barmmi-Seṭṭi-
yuṃ | modal âge |

lg.l: anituṃ pañcha-maṭha-sthâ- | na-nagaramuṃ mûr̤u-puramum îyalk â-mê- |
diniyaṃ koṭṭu jagaj-jana- | vinutaṃ Tâvareyaker̤ege naḍev-uvvareyoḷ ǁ
Hari-diśeyoḷ Kêdârê- | śvaraṅge munt Amban itta tôṇṭaṃ Pitrî- |
śvara-diśeyoḷ Ponneya-jî- | yara tôṇṭaṃ mêrey âg iral tôr̤uvudaṃ ǁ
Saranidhi-nâyakana diśâ- | varad eḍeyoḷ naṭṭa kal Dhanêśvarana diśâ- |
varad eḍeyoḷ Pul̤igeya-Dê- | vara tôṇṭaṃ mêrey âg iral tôr̤uvudaṃ ǁ
dhareyaṃ kaykoṇḍaṃ Saṅ- | kara-nirataṃ nûr̤u-pattu-kammaman â-nâḷk |
aras enisida daṇḍâdhî- | śvara Gôvindaṃ jagaj-jana-stutan ar̤iyal ǁ

div.p: va ǁ antu kâl-garchchu vaḍedu |

lg.l: dhareyan adan akhiḷa-bâdhâ- | parihârade Mêchi-Seṭṭi sale kâd ûḍutt |
ire salipar akhiḷa-bâdhâ- | parihâraṃ mâḍi pañcha-maṭha-nagaraṅgaḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ emba dṛiḍha-vyavastheyaṃ paḍed alliṃ bal̤iyaṃ Parvvatâmnâyada Mûvara-kôṇeya-santâna-
da Śakti-parisheyoḷ negaḷte vaḍedu śishya-châtaka-varshâ-kâḷa-mukhar enisida Kâḷamukharoḷ ǁ

lg.l: pp ire jâmbûnadam appa poṅge kaḍu-gamp âyt embinaṃ sandan Î- |

div.p:
va ǁ enisid âtmârâdhyar appa | yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-
samâdhi-śîḷa-sampanna | budha-jana-prasanna | dhâraṇâ-Padmagarbbha | paṭûtpâdana-sanda-
rbbha | kavitâ-sarôjinî-makaranda | gamaki-mukha-mukurunda | vâdi-manôhara | vâgmitva-Vidyâ-
dhara | nir-avadya-tapô-guṇâbhyudaya | Sârasvata-mahôdaya śrîmat-Sômêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvaraṃ
dharmma-kâryya-pratigrahakk âgrahaṃ geyd anugrahaṃ paḍedu | Banavase-pannirchchhâsira-
kkaṃ taley enisida râjadhâni Baḷḷigâveya teṅkaṇa Tâvareger̤ey-êriya jagat-trayâdhîśvara śrî-
dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-devara dêva-kulada khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkam â-dêvara gandha-
pushpa-dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdyâdi-nânâ-vidhôpahârakkam alliya tapôdhanâdigaḷa âhârakkam endu
sarvva-namasyam âge ǁ

lg.l: berasiral uttarâyaṇadoḷ â-mahiyaṃ mahi baṇṇisal mahî- |
śvara-tiḷakaṃ mahî-ravi-jalâdi-mayaṃ vibhu tṛiptan appinaṃ ǁ
dbhâsiya kâlaṃ karchchi vi- | bhâsura-yasan ittan osedu dhârâ-sahitaṃ ǁ
liṅgigaḷuṃ beras aḷidaṃ | liṅgaman î-dharmmamaṃ kar̤utt aḷid adhamaṃ ǁ
kavilegaḷaṃ kôṭiyan osed | avanî-sura-kôṭig ittan î-dharmmakk u- |
dbhavamaṃ paḍedavan â-tî- | rttha-vitatiyoḷ ḷiṅga-liṅgi-jana-sannidhiyoḷ ǁ
sva-dattâṃ para-dattâṃ vâ yô harêta vasundharâṃ |

div.p: end intu |

lg.l: kavi-nutam enal ored ati-paṭu- | kavi-Sârasvata-mahôdayana kiṅkaran î- |
Śiva-dharmma-śâsanavan abhi- | navam âg ire Mallikârjjunâryyaṃ baredaṃ ǁ

div.p:
Gobbûra dhâraṇâ-sârvvabhauma Mallikârjjuna-bhaṭṭaṃ su-kavîndra-Shaṇmukhaṃ ǁ bhadram
astu Śiva-śâsanâya ǁ

div.head:
100
At the same place, on a ninth stone.
div.p: namaḥ Śivâbhyâṃ sânucharâbhyâṃ ǁ
avaroḷage ǁ

lg.l: raseyaṃ raseg uyd-asuranan | a-sama-bhujâ-baḷade samara-samayadoḷ ur̤e mar- |
ddisi tanda Chakriyaṃ nene- | yisuvaṃ bhuja-baḷa-mahatvadiṃ Taila-nṛipaṃ ǁ
śrî-lalanâdhipaṃ negarda Vikraman âtana tamman udvishad- |
bhû-lalanêśvaraṃ padedu pâḷisidaṃ Jayasiṃhan urvviyaṃ ǁ
sallalita-śauryyan Âhava- | mallaṃ tat-tanujan âtan-agra-sutaṃ bhû- |
vallabhan elliyum a-prati- | mallaṃ Bhuvanaikamallan alliṃ baḷiya ǁ
nirutaṃ kîḷpaṭṭu muṃ mânasikeya deseyaṃ biṭṭu Kûrmmâvatâraṃ |
beras int î-viśva-viśvambhareyan asadaḷaṃ tâḷdid andindam âd â- |
parivâdakk añji tâm mânasikeyan adhikaṃ tâḷdi mêlâgi viśvaṃ- |
bhareyaṃ niḥklêśadiṃ tâḷdida Hariy enipaṃ Vikramâditya-Dêvaṃ ǁ
oḷaviṃ tîrtha-jaḷâvagâhanaman âdaṃ mâḍut irppante nichch- |
alum irppaḷ jaya-lakshmi khaḍga-jaḷadoḷ Châḷukya-chakrêśana ǁ
aḷav-aḷid-arâti-bhûpati- | gaḷa baḷagaṃ tandu kuḍuva gaja-mada-dhârâ- |
jaḷada hayaṅgaḷa lâḷâ- | jaḷada ponalu bahuḷav â-nṛipêndrâlayadoḷ ǁ
pâḷakar añji berchchi besakeyd osed endudan endu râjya-sal- |
lîleyoḷ irppaḍ ân ar̤iyen alladoḍ âgaḷe dêva-râjya-saḷ- |
ḷîleyoḷ â-nṛipôttamaran eydipan ôvade Kuntaḷêśvara ǁ

div.p: enisida Permmâḍi-Râyaṅge ǁ

lg.l: ent amṛitâmburâśige sudhâkaran ent udayâchaḷakke tad- |
kântan udagra-têjan ene Sôma-mahîbhujan andu puṭṭida ǁ
puṭṭidud âvagaṃ negarda Bhâratig andu sa-nâthatôdayaṃ |
puṭṭidud endoḍ âr ddorege-vappa nṛipâḷakar â-nṛipâḷanoḷ ǁ
maṇiyad ari-nṛipara chûḍâ- | maṇiyuman â-nṛipara kumbhi-kumbhôttha-lasan- |
maṇiyuman aṇiyaram avan uḍe- | vaṇi gaṭṭal bagevan âtma-śaiśava-daśeyoḷ ǁ
naḍe-galal oḍarisal âtaṃ | naḍe-galal oḍarisidar ahitar aḍavige bhayadiṃ |
nuḍigalal oḍarise bêgaṃ | nuḍigalal oḍarisidar ari-nṛipar vvana-chararoḷ ǁ
poḍe-seṇḍ âḍuva padadoḷ | poḍe-seṇḍaṃ poḍeyal ollad ari-nṛipa-śiramaṃ |
poḍe-seṇḍ âḍuvan irad end- | oḍe bhuja-baḷad-aḷavan avanoḷ aḷevavan oḷanê ǁ
dudu nikhiḷôrvvig âyata-dṛig-utpaḷa-hâsam id embinam samant |
udaya-mahâ-mahîdharaman êr̤idan opp ire Sôma-vallabha ǁ
dhareyaṃ pott irddu bhârâvyapagama-vivaśaṃ bhôgamaṃ kâṇan enduṃ ǁ
nirutaṃ Bhôgîśan enduṃ tar̤edudu dhareyaṃ pottu beṃ Kûrmma-râjaṅg |
irad inn â-prâṇigaḷ viśramisuge sukhadind embavol viśva-viśvam- |
bhareyaṃ dôr-ddaṇḍadoḷ tâḷdidan atuḷa-baḷaṃ Sôma-Châḷukya-bhûpa ǁ
trî-kântaṃ tâḷdidaṃ śrîgaḷan atuḷa-baḷôdbhâsi Bhûlôkamalla ǁ
janam ellaṃ su-chakôrakâvaḷiy enal Sômâkhye bhû-chakradoḷ |
tanag anvarttham enal virâjisidapaṃ Sômêśvarôrvvîśvara ǁ
tu karaṃ samstutyan âg irppaḍam eseva vinirddôshanoḷ nish-kaḷaṅka- |
prakara-prakhyâtanoḷ tâṃ saman enipane pêḷ Sômanoḷ byôma-sôma ǁ
ari-bhûpara têjada daḷḷ- | uri magguvud omme tanna pesar-goḷal ên a- |
chchari vaḍedudo jagadoḷ bhî- | karatara-taravâri-vâri Sômêśvarana ǁ
Kuntaḷam âtma-vallabheya kuntaḷam oppuva Kâñchi kâñchi śu- |
antire suttaluṃ sale nimirchchi nijôgra-bhuja-pratâpam â- |
śântaman eyde pâḷisidan urvviyan orvvane Sôma-vallabha ǁ
nighnan êva janân asau na gamitas Svarṇṇâdrir artthârtthinaḥ |
Mainâkâdi-mahîbhṛitâṃ na śaraṇaṃ jâtô’ ham ity anvahaṃ

div.p:
va ǁ enisida Châḷukya-chakravartti Sômêśvarôrvvîśvaraṃ Bhûlôkamallaṃ dig-vijayaṃ geyyal
endu dakshiṇâbhimukhan âgi bandu Hulluṇiya tîrtthadoḷ bîḍaṃ biṭṭu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
dharmma-prasaṅgamaṃ mâḍuttam irpudum avasaraṃ-baḍedu ǁ

lg.l: ḍâmaṇi vidvaj-jana-chin- | tâmaṇi dhairyya-prasiddha-śailaṃ Taila ǁ

div.p: va ǁ erddu nind irddu kara-kamaḷaṅgaḷaṃ mugidu Dêva binnapav end int enda ǁ

lg.l: janapada-kôṭiyoḷ negarda Kuntaḷa-dêśame sârav alli tâṃ |
Banavase-nâḍu sârv adar̤oḷ paribhâvise Baḷḷigâve saj- |
jana-nidhi paṭṭaṇaṅgaḷa tavar-mmane sâram enippa kîrtti tad- |
vananidhi mêrey âge sale parvvidud urvvi samasta-dhâtriya ǁ
adu Dhanada-prasêvyav Aḷakâpurad-ant ene Baḷḷigâveg â- |

div.p: va ǁ alliya nagara-janaṅgaḷa guṇaṅgaḷaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: para-hitar êka-vâkyar ar̤iviṅge tavar-mmane dharmmad âgaraṃ |
kiḍuv-oḍameyan ondane ko- | ṭṭ eḍe maḍagad iham-paraṅgaḷ emb eraḍuman aṅ- |
gaḍiyoḷ kiḍad oḍameyan aḍi- | g aḍig ârjjipar alli negarda nagara-janaṅgaḷ ǁ
dharar Ahirâjanante nikhiḷa-kshameg âspadar endoḍ îgaḷ âr |

div.p: â-nagara-janakke ǁ

lg.l: karige radanaṃ bhayaṅkara- | tara-daṃshṭrâṅkuram ibhârig unnata-pakshaṃ |
sarabha-ripug âdud embant | iral esevar prabhugaḷ alli tat-pattanadoḷ ǁ

div.p: mattam alli ǁ

lg.l: dhareg eseva pañcha-saradant | ire pañcha-maṭhaṅgaḷ esevuv â-paṭṭaṇadoḷ ǁ

div.p: mattam alli ǁ

lg.l: mûr̤uṃ puraṅgaḷ alliya | mûr̤uṃ kaṇgaḷ samagra-Lakshmige mêṇ â- |
nîr̤eya koraloḷ nelasida | mûr̤uṃ muttina saraṅgaḷ embant irkku ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ intu sakaḷa-saundaryyakkaṃ sakaḷa-dharmmakkaṃ tavar-mmaney enisida Baḷḷigâveyoḷ dak-
shiṇa-dik-taṭa-nikaṭa-vartti maṇḍita-puṇḍarîka-shaṇḍôpântam uṇṭ alli nagara-janaṅgaḷ ârjjisid
agaṇya-puṇya-puñjame Śiva-bhavanav âdante Nagarêsvaram enisi pesar-vaḍedu sogayisuttam
irppudu ǁ

va ǁ mattam alli pariva-tîrttha-naḷinî-jaḷa-pravâham adu Kêdâra-Gaṅgâ-jaḷa-pravâhaman anukari-
seyum abhraṃ-liham enipa vibhramaman ârdda Śiva-bhavanam adu Kêdâra-mahâ-mahîdharaman
anukariseyum-alli tapaṃ geyva divya-tapôdhanare duśchara-tapaś-charaṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇar
appa Kêdâra-divya-tapôdhanaran anukariseyum int apûrvva-Kêdâramuṃ Śiva-liṅga-pûjâ-puḷaka-
sasya-sa-rasa-kêdâramum enisi Paramêśvara-sthânam irppud alli ǁ

lg.l: śrî-pâdâmbhôja-lakshmîr vvirachayati sa vaḥ pâtu Chandrârddhamauḷiḥ ǁ

div.p: mattam â-puṇya-sthânadoḷ ǁ

lg.l: Kali-kalusha-khaḷara bhayadiṃ | balid irddapan illi Kṛita-yugâdhipan int î- |
Kaligôṭeya baladin enalk | alaghu-guṇâkâram esevud â-prâkâra ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ mattam â-maṭhaṃ Kamaṭhanante sakaḷa-janâdhâramuṃ | Purushasimhanante hiraṇya-kaśi-
pu-dâna-saṃśôbhitamuṃ | Kurukshêtradante Sarasvatî-viḷasitamuṃ | Khachara-lôkadante vidyâ-
dharâdhîśvara-parivṛitamuṃ | Mandara-mahâ-mahîdharadante sarvva-dik-sârabhûtamuṃ | Vâsu-
dêvanant akrûrôkti-śravaṇa-ramaṇîyamuṃ | Bhavânî-bhavanadante brahmachâri-sadâchâra-sam-
bhâvitamuṃ | vivêkiyante vidyâbharaṇa-virachita-saundaryyamuṃ | Gôdâvarî-tîradante Gautamâ-
ryya-paricharyyâ-parikaramum enisi sogayisuvud â-maṭhada guru-kula-kramamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: Śrîkaṇṭhaṃ mauktika-mâ | ḷâkaḷpita-kaṇṭham eseva Sarasatig ene vi |
dyâ-kanaka-nikashan ânata- | lôkaṃ tach-chhisyan esedan alliṃ baḷiya ǁ

div.p: tad-anantara ǁ

lg.l: â-Bhârabhûtig eṇey eni- | p â-bhagavan-munipan-anujan esad irddaṃ Vi- |

div.p:
va ǁ enisid â-Vidyâbharaṇaṃ vidyâ-bharaṇa-vyâsaṅgav allad itara-vyâsaṅgaman ollade maṭha-
vyâsaṅgamaṃ nijâgra-śishyanuṃ guru-kula-samuddharaṇa-vâma-śaktiyum enisida Vâmaśakti-
munîśvaranoḷ niyôgisid-âgaḷ ǁ

lg.l: ḍaḷadin anârataṃ beḷagi sôman ati-śramadinde mâṇbud êṃ |
naḷina-sakhaṃ sahasra-karadiṃ beḷapandav enippud âytu ni- |
rmmaḷa-mati-Vâmaśakti maṭhamaṃ parirakshisal endu nilvudu ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ endu binnapaṃ geyvuduṃ maṭhada dharmmada permmeyumaṃ tan-maṭhâchâryyara
dharmma-vidyâ-tapaś-śîlateyumaṃ kêrddu rômâñcha-kañchukita-gâtranuṃ prasanna-nêtranum âgi
Kâdamba-kaṇṭhîravana mogamaṃ nôḍi nâv ênânuṃ dharmmaman â-sthânadoḷ mâḍal vêrkkuv
allige samîpaṅgaḷ app ûrggaḷ âvuv endu besagoḷvuduṃ Dêvar bbêr̤e dharmmaṃ mâḍal vêḍ
ênânuṃ dharmmaman ân alli Dêvara vjjaya-râjyâbhivṛiddhi-nimittav âgi mâḍiden adaṃ Dêvar
sva-hastadiṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi dharmmaman â-chandrârkka-stâyiyâgi mârppud embuduṃ
adane manade goṇḍ alliya khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ
vidyâ-dânakkaṃ dêvatâ-pûjegav endu svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Bhûlôka-varshada 3 neya Kîlaka-
saṃvatsarada Mâghad-amâvâsye-Bṛihaspativâra-vyatîpâtad andu Vidyâbharaṇa-dêvaraṃ barisi
kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Jiḍḍuḷige-nâḍoḷagaṇa Tadavaṇaleyuman â-nâḍoḷage sthaḷa-
vṛittiy âgi hakkaḷeya holanumaṃ trî-bhôgâbhyantaravâgi koṭṭu mattav eley aḍake dhânyav emb
î-vastugaḷu-modalâgi kraya-vikraya-yôgyaṅgaḷ app-avarkk ellaṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷaṃ hejjuṅkam emb
ivu modalâgiy uḷḷant appa suṅkaṅgaḷ ellamaṃ biṭṭu sarvva-namasyavâgi koṭṭâgaḷ ǁ

lg.l: gâvahav end adan êḷisi | bhû-vinuta-nijâgra-śishya-Gautama-muniyoḷ ǁ

div.p: maṭhâdhipatyamaṃ niyôjisidâgaḷ ǁ

lg.l: viḷasita-kîrtti dal beḷagidaṃ dhare kai mugid oldu jîy enal ǁ
sarvvâm urvvîṃ tatô ‘nu prabhavati phaḷitâ Gautamâchâryya-varyyât ǁ

div.p: (usual final phrases and verses).

div.head:
101
At the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmad-râja-guru Vâmaśakti-dêvaruṃ tach-chhishya Jñânaśakti-dêvaruṃ | Plava-saṃvatsa-
ra-Mârgaśira-ba 1 Sô | pâtrada ........ Mallavegav â-maddaḷe-Mâdigaṃ dêvatâ-
vṛittiyâgi sthaḷa-vṛitti-hakkaḷeyal koṭṭa gadde mattar eraḍu rokka ga 10 puradoḷ mane-mûrakav
â-chandrârkkan naḍevar ǁ

div.head:
102
At the same place, on a tenth stone.
div.p: ôṃ namaś Śivâya ǁ

lg.l: vêdô mûlam athô vṛitir dṛiḍhatara-nyâyâdi-śâstraṃ khalu
smṛity-âdir vviṭapas satâṃ kisalayô dharmmô ‘nurâgaḥ kriyâḥ |
dharmmaḥ kalpa-taruḥ karôtu bhavataḥ śrî-Vâmaśaktêr munêḥ ǁ
dôr-ddaṇḍair vviṭapaiḥ karaiḥ kisalayaiḥ pushpais smitair mmaṅgaḷaiḥ
śrîmad-Bijjala-bhûpatêḥ pratidinaṃ kuryyâd abhîshṭaṃ phaḷaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ mahâ-sâmanta-makuṭa-mâṇikya-
mañjarî-puñja-rañjita-pâda-pîṭhaṃ Kâḷañjarapura-varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ
ḍamaruga-tûryya-nirghôshaṇaṃ Kaḷachuryya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ kadana-prachaṇḍaṃ mâna-
Kanakâchaḷaṃ su-bhaṭar-âdityaṃ kaligal̤-aṅkuśaṃ gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ pra-
tâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ | para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ | Sanivâra-siddhi | Giridurgga-mallaṃ chalad-aṅka-Râ-
maṃ | vairîbha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ | niśśaṅka-mallaṃ nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-bhuja-bala-cha-
kravartti Tribhuvanamalla Bijjala-Dêvarasara pratâpa-prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: prasarav aśêsha-bhûtaḷaman illa mahîbhujar anyar embinaṃ |
pesarvaḍed îga Bijjala-mahîbhujan orvvane tâne tâḷdidaṃ ǁ
kedar̤id arâti-bhûpara śirô-maṇigaḷ negaḷd âli-kalgaḷ ur- |
vvada bhaṭa-śastra-sañchayada miñchugaḷ oppuva miñchugaḷ samant |
odavida rakta-jâḷa-jaḷa-dhâregaḷ âg ire varsham intu hôlt- |
surida karuḷ karuḷ toḍare birdda bhaṭar bbhaṭa-śastra-ghâtadind |
uruḷda hayaṃ hayaṅgaḷ eḍeyoḷ kuṇiv-aṭṭegaḷ aṭṭeyaṃ bhayaṅ- |
karatarav âge nôrppa maruḷ â-maruḷaṃ gele sôva tan-niśâ- |
chariyar enalke nôḍal arid âytu raṇaṃ Giridurgga-mallana ǁ
eḍar̤ina kêḍu kâdane śaraṇ-bugutanda nṛipânvayakke bem- |
biḍid a-jarâmaratvav enal innanan anya-narêndraroḷ samaṃ |
nuḍiyad ir aṇṇa Bijjala-mahîpanan âhava-raudra-rûpana ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ intu pogarttegaṃ negaḷtegaṃ tâne mûla-sthânam âda Bijjala-Dêva-mahîpâḷana śrî-pâda-
padmôpajîviy enisida Kasapayya-Nâyakana guṇaṅgaḷaṃ pogaḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: kasav enit irddaḍaṃ nija-nirikshaṇa-mâtrade tat-kshaṇaṃ karaṃ |
bharaṇaṃ su-bhaṭa-janaikâ- | bharaṇaṃ kêvaḷame Kasapayaṃ vasumatiyoḷ ǁ
itarar-adhikâradiṃ nâ- | śita-dêśaman akkaṭikkeyiṃ kaikoṇḍ û- |
rjjitav âgi mâḷpan ene para- | hita-kâryyadoḷ âro Kasapayaṅg eṇe-vappar ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-mahânubhâvan-anumatadiṃ Banavâse-nâḍan âḷvaṃ Bammarasan âtana guṇâtiśayav ent
endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: tann-adhikâram emb amṛita-vṛishṭigaḷiṃ baḷayippan eyde vi- |
pannanan oldu kai-mugidu Barmmanan âśrita-śarmma-karmmanaṃ ǁ
adhikârigaḷ arebar bbudha- | rg adhikârigaḷ enipar allad int îtanavôl |
adhikârigaḷ enipavar âr | bbudharg enipaṃ Barmman akhiḷa-budha-jana-śarmma ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-Bammarasana adhikâra-lakshmiya abyabhichâradallig adhyakshamuṃ râjâdhyakshamum
enisi Śrîdhara-Nâyakaṃ Âchaṇa-Nâyakaṃ Chaṭṭimayya-Nâyakaṃ Malliyaṇa-Nâyakaṃ Tikkima-
yya-Nâyakan end int ayvar-kkaraṇaṅgaḷ â-Bijjala-Dêva-mahîpâḷan-ayduṃ-karaṇaṅgaḷ-ante rañji-
suttam irppar avara guṇâtiśayav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: śvara-pada-bhakti-dhuryyar enipar kkaraṇaṅgaḷ id ê-mahâtmarô ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ mattm mattam â-Bammarasana piriya siriya mukha-kamaḷa-vikâsakke raviy enisida Ravi-Dêva-mahâ-
pradhânana guṇâtiśayav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: lalita-vilôchanôtpaḷav id achchari nôrppaḍ aśêsha-dhâtriyoḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ int inibarum ondâgi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadind ondu-divasaṃ dharmma-prasaṅgadindam
irddu dakshiṇa-Kêdâra-sthânamuṃ Śiva-liṅga-pûjâ-puḷaka-sasya-sa-rasa-kêdâra-sthânamuṃ naish-
ṭhika-brahmacharyya-Śiva-muni-janânushṭhâna-nishṭhita-sthânamuṃ sâṅga-Ṛig-Yajus-Sâmâtha-
rvva-chatur-vvêda-svâdhyâya-sthânamuṃ Kaumâra-Pâṇinîya-Śâkaṭâyana-śabdânuśâsanâdi-byâka-
raṇa-byâkhyâna-sthânamuṃ Nyâya-Vaiśêshika-Mîmâmsâ-Sâṅkhya-Bauddhâdi-shaḍ-darśana-byâ-
khyâna-sthânamuṃ Lâkuḷa-siddhânta-Pâtañjaḷâdi-yôga-śâstra-byâkhyâna-sthânamuṃ ashṭâ laśa-
purâṇa-dharmma-śâstra-sakal̤a-kâbya-nâṭaka-nâṭikâdi-vividha-vidyâ-sthânamuṃ dînânâtha-paṅ-
gv-andha-badhira-kathaka-gâyaka-vâdaka-vâṃśika-narttaka-vaitâl̤ika-nagna-bhagna-kshapaṇakai-
kadaṇḍi-tridaṇḍi-haṃsa-paramahaṃsâdi-nânâ-dêśa-bhikshuka-janânivâryyanna-dâsa-sthânamuṃ
nânânâtha-rôgi-jana-rôga-bhaishajya-sthânamuṃ sakala-bhûtâbhaya-pradâna-sthânamum âgi
Kôḍiya-maṭhav irppud â-sthânadoḷ ênânum ondu-dharmmamaṃ mâḍi namma vṛittamumaṃ vitta-
mumaṃ tri-sapta-kulamumaṃ pavitraṃ mârppam emba bageyiṃ bagevut irpduduv annegaṃ dak-
shiṇa-dig-bhâgamaṃ sâdhisal endu Bijjala-mahârâjaṃ bijayaṃ-geydu Baḷḷigâveyoḷu bîḍaṃ biṭṭu
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadindav irppudum anibarum ondâgi bandu kuḷḷirddu Kôḍiya-maṭhada dha-
rmma-prasaṅgamaṃ mârppudum â-prastâvadoḷu Kasapayya-Nâyakan erddu nind irddu tan-
mahârâjaṅg abhimukhan âgi kara-kamaḷaṅgaḷa mugidu Dêva binnapav end int enda ǁ

va ǁ ad alladeyuv â-maṭhaṃ purâṇa-Kamaṭhan-ante sakaḷa-lôkâdhâramuṃ Purushasimhan-ante
hiraṇya-kaśipu-dâna-saṃśôbhitamuṃ Kurukshêtrad-ante Sarasvatî-viḷasitamuṃ Khachara-lôkadan-
te vidyâdharâdhîśvara-parivṛitamuṃ Mandara-mahâ-mahîdharad-ante sarvva-dik-sârabhûtamuṃ
Vâsudêvan-ant akrûrôkti-śravaṇa-ramaṇîyamuṃ Bhavânî-bhavanad-ante brahmachâri-sadâchâra-
sambhâvitamum âgirppud â-maṭhada guru-kula-kramâyâta-Gautamâchâryya-śishyaṃ Vâmaśakti-
munîśvarâchâryyan â-munîśvarana mahimeyaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: skara-kiraṇaṅgaḷ-ante beḷapaṃ dhare kai-mugid oldu jîy-enal ǁ
Madanaharaṅg ene bhûtaḷa- | vidita-yaśaṃ Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-dêva ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ adu-kâraṇadin â-maṭhadoḷ ênânuṃ-dharmmamaṃ Dêvar mmâḍidoḍ adu chandrârkka-sthâ-
yiyâgi naḍevud embuduv adane manade-goṇḍu Bijjala-mahîpâḷaṃ dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvar-
aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ vidyâ-dânakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâra-
kkaṃ śishṭêshṭa-santarpaṇakkam end â-6 neya Vishu-saṃvatsarada Pushya-mâsad-amâvâsye-
sûryya-grahaṇad andu Gautamâchâryya-śishyar appa Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ khrchchi
Nûr̤uṃ-bâḍadoḷagaṇa Kir̤ugêriyaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭan (usual
final phrases and verses) Pâṇḍya-râjyada baḷi Chiṭṭûrumaṃ Gutoḷala-kampaṇadoḷu Ayiraṇeyumaṃ
Kâlaḍi-tombhattar̤oḷu Kôṇeya-Nêr̤iligeyumaṃ Sattaḷigeya-kampaṇadoḷu Siḍiyanûru-dîvigeyumaṃ
tri-bhôgâbhyantara-sahita dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi koṭṭaru mattaṃ Bâsûra-kampaṇadoḷu Chaṅgûru
Mattiyahaḷḷiyuma Nâgarikhaṇḍeyad-oḷagaṇa Jâvaḷiyumaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantara-sahitavâgi śrîmad-
râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ mattam â-prastâ-
vadoḷu Bandaṇikeya Sôyi-Dêvarasaruṃ Chaṇḍugi-Dêva-Lakumi-Dêva-daṇṇâyakaruṃ binnapaṃ
geyyalu Kôḍiya-maṭhada śrîmatu dakshiṇa-Kêdârêsvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ śrî-Sômanâtha-
dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ Abbalûra Brahmêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ Nâgarakhaṇḍeyada kam-
paṇadoḷu Karinele Maruvase Mutiganahaḷḷi Kundaṅgiyumaṃ Hânugalla-kampaṇadoḷu Chikka-
Kaṇṇugeyumaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantara-sahitaṃ sarvva-namasyav âgi koṭṭaru svasti śrî ǁ

div.head:
103
At the same place, on an eleventh stone.
div.p: ôṃ namaś Śivâbhyâṃ sânucharâbhyâṃ ǁ

lg.l: vêdô mûḷam athô vṛitir ddṛiḍhataraṃ nyâyâdi-śâstraṃ khalu
smṛity-âdir vviṭapas satâṃ kisalayô dharmmô’bhirâgaḥ kriyâḥ |
dharmmaḥ kalpa-tarus samastu phaḷa-daś śrî-Gautamâchâryya tê ǁ
d-Vârijabhava-bhuja-jâtar | ddhâraṇiyoḷ Śântarêśvarar ppalar esedar ǁ
śśânta-bhaya-lôbhar adar̤iṃ | Śântara-vesar âdud avarge bhû-maṇḍaḷadoḷ ǁ

div.p: avaroḷage ǁ

lg.l: a-nata-ripu-nṛiparan enduda- | n enisal nija-bhuja-parâkrama-kramame samar- |
tthan enalk Ammaṇa-vesariṃ | jana-pati dhâriṇiyoḷ esedan orbban apûrvvaṃ ǁ
âtana sahajâtaṃ jaga- | tî-taḷa-varttita-bhuja-pratâpaṃ sale dhâ- |
trî-taḷa-pati-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ | khyâta-guṇaṃ Siṅgi-Dêvan embaṃ pesariṃ ǁ
â-vibhuvina vadhu Bijjala- | Dêvi jagan-nûte Śîte tân ene pati-sam- |
bhâvana-guṇadoḷu taḷedaḷu | bhû-vaḷeyadoḷ amaḷav enipa-jasad unnatiya ǁ
pravivêka-yôgadiṃ pu- | ṭṭuvavol Jagadêvan emba Śântara-bhûpaṃ ǁ

div.p: âtana guṇaṅgaḷaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: shâvaḷiy endoḍ âr ddorege vandapar î-Jagadêva-bhûpanoḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-Jagadêv-arasana jananiy enipa Bijjala-Dêviy-oḍavuṭṭida Chaṭṭala-Dêvigaṃ Vijayâditya-
Dêvaṅgaṃ Jayakêśi-Dêvan emba pavitra-kshatra-putraṃ puṭṭi taj-Jagaddêvaṅg agrajanman eni-
sidan â-râjôttamana râja-dharmma-guṇaṅgaḷaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: ḷv-ar̤ikeya bîrar illa tanag embinegaṃ Jayakêśi-bhûbhujaṃ |
ner̤eda nṛipâḷa-nîti-guṇad unnatiyiṃ jasamaṃ nimirchchida ǁ
châgaman îsikoḷḷada vanîpakar ill avanîpakar mmadô- |
dyôgaman okku bâḷadavar illa jayôtsukan âgi pôge kôḷ- |
pôgada dêśam ill enisuv â-Jayakêśi-nijâgrajâtan â- |
śâ-gaja-vartti-kîrttiy enal âr jJagadêvanavol yaśasvigaḷ ǁ
â-Jagadêvana tammaṃ | râja-śirômaṇiy enippa pempaṃ taḷed int |
î-jagadoḷ budha-jana-sura- | bhûjâtaṃ Siṅgi-Dêvan ene pesarvaḍegu ǁ
uguḷ uguḷ endu nañjan uguḷippan udagra-vishâhi-kaṇṭhamaṃ |
tegedu nijâgrajaṅg eseva tôḷvaṇiy âg ire mâḷpan endoḍ âr |
ppogaḷaro Siṅgi-Dêvana parâkramad unnatiyaṃ dharâgradoḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ intu kîrtti-śrîgaṃ śrîgam adhinâthan enisid â-Jayakêśi-Dêvaṅge priyânujanu Siṅgi-Dêvaṅge
priyâgrajanum enisida samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Paṭṭi-Pombuch-
cha-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Padmâvatî-dêvî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ kastûrikâmôdaṃ nîti-śâstra-jñaṃ
sâhitya-sarbbajñaṃ aras-aṅka-gâḷaṃ birudara śûḷaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvana-malla Jagadêv-arasaṃ
Sêtuvina bîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyṃ geyyuttam irdd ondu-devasaṃ chatura-budha-
jana-parivâraṃ berasu dharmma-prasaṅgamaṃ mâḍuttam int enda ǁ
va ǁ embudum â-prastâvadoḷ ǁ

lg.l: mâḍidavaṅge nuṅguva Javaṃ śaraṇâgatan appavaṅge kay- |
gûḍida vajra-sannahanam îtane dal per̤ar âr enippa nâ- |
ḍâḍiya rûḍiyaṃ miguva rûḍiya Bammarasaṃ samâhita ǁ

div.p: va ǁ mukuḷîkṛita-kara-kamaḷan âgi binnapam end int enda ǁ
va ǁ â-Kêdâra-sthânad âchâryya-varyyaṃ Gautamâryyana guṇaṅgaḷaṃ pêḷvade ǁ

lg.l: viḷasita-kîrtti dal beḷagidaṃ dhare kaymugid oldu jîy enal ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ adar̤ind alliy ênânuv ondu dharmmamaṃ mâḍidoḍ ad akshayamuṃ nikhiḷa-pâpa-kshaya-
kâraṇamum appud endu binnavaṃ geyvudum adane manade-goṇḍu Baḷḷigâvege bandu svasti
śrîmach-Châḷukya-pratâpa-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-varshada 13 neya Śukla-saṃvatsa-
rada Kârttikada paurṇṇamâsye-Sômavâra-sôma-grahaṇadandu śrîmad-Dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-
dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-padma-sannidhiyoḷu Jagadêv-arasanuṃ tanna kumâraṃ Bammarasanum
ondâg irddu śrîmad-vâdi-Vidyâbharaṇa-paṇḍita-dêvara śishyar appa śrîmad-Gautama-paṇḍita-
dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi dêvara naivêdyakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâ-
rakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ vidyâ-dânakkav endu Śântaḷige-sâyiradoḷagaṇa Koḍanâḍa
30 r̤a baḷiya bâḍaṃ Kundûraṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantara-sahitaṃ sarvva-namaśyam âgi koṭṭu mattaṃ
Maḍumbada holad aiśânyada deseya Kabbila-Kêtanaker̤eya kîḷ-êriya gardde mattar eraḍumaṃ
sarvva-namasyamâgi koṭṭar (usual final phrases) mattam â-prastâvadoḷu Koḍanâḍa kampaṇadoḷu
Abbaseyumaṃ Hosavaḷḷiyumaṃ sarbba-namasyavâgi Muduvaḷala-kampaṇadoḷu Gôvindana-
haḷḷiyumaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaravâgi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru svasty astu Śiva-śâsanâya ǁ

div.head:
104
At the same place, on a twelth twelfth stone.
div.p: śrî ôṃ namaś Śivâya ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ śrîmach-Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ Trailôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-
samayadoḷ | svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâḷañjara-pura-varâ-
dhîśvaraṃ | suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ saundaryya-Makaradhvajaṃ | ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirg-
ghôshaṇaṃ | bhûpâḷa-maṇi-bhûshaṇaṃ | Kaḷachuriya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | kadana-prachaṇ-
ḍaṃ | mâna-Kanakâchaḷaṃ subhaṭar-âdityaṃ | kaligaḷ-aṅkusaṃ | gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vajra-
pañjaraṃ | pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ | para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ | Śanivâra-siddhi | Giridurgga-mallaṃ |
chalad-aṅka-Râmaṃ | vairîbha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ | niśśaṅka-mallaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Bijjaṇa-Dêvarasaru sakaḷa-dêśaṅgaḷmaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pra-
tipâḷanadind âḷuttam ire tan-mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ vairi-bhaya-dâyakaṃ | nir-ṇṇimitta-
-bhuvana-jana-mitraṃ | gôtra-pavitraṃ | chatura-jana-sarasa Mahadêv-arasaṃ Banavase-pann-
ir-chchhâsiramumaṃ śrî-Bijjaṇa-Dêvântaḥkaraṇa-rûparuṃ | sakaḷa-budha-jana-manas-sarôjanî-
râjahaṃsaruṃ svâśrita-jana-chintitârttha-prada-chintâmaṇigaḷuṃ | dînânâtha-jana – dâridrya-
tamô-vighaṭṭana-dyumaṇigaḷuv enipa Pôtarasa-Chaṭṭimarasa-Padmarasa-Sôvarasar int î-nâlvar
kkaraṇaṅgaḷ-oḍagûḍi sukhadin âḷuttam ire | tan-mahâ-pradhânaṃ | pradhâna-jana-maṇimayâḷaṅ-
kâraṃ Makaradhvajâkâraṃ | Hara-charaṇa-sarasiruha-shaṭcharaṇaṃ | budha-janaika-śaraṇaṃ |
śrîmad-Râyanârâyaṇa-pura-tantra-mânya-sahavâsy-Ânanda-bhaṭṭôpâdhyâya-priya-tanûjaṃ | san-
tarppita-budha-samâjaṃ | Vṛisha-gaṇa-gôtra-pavitraṃ | Gaurala-Dêvî-priya-putran ity-âdi-nâmâ-
vaḷî-virâjamânaṃ Mâyi-Dêvarasan esedan antum alladeyu ǁ

lg.l: kudid ell-andadin andu Nanda-kulamaṃ geld âtma-mantrakke nâṇ- |
chade Châṇakkyan ad êke mantriy enipaṃ pêḷ end anâyâsadin- |
de dṛiḍhârâti-kulaṅgaḷaṃ tavisi tanna svâmig aty-unnatâ- |
bhyudaya-śrîyan oḍarchchut ippan olaviṃ śrî-Mâyi-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
viditaṃ kayy ântu tannaṃ paded ereda budhaṃ pôgi matt-orvvanaṃ bê- |
ḍidaḍaṃ saṅgrâmadoḷ nirjjita-madan enipaṃ pôgi matt omme bil voy- |
d idiroḷ band ântaḍaṃ dânada bhuja-baḷad urvv alt ad end endu nichchaṃ |
mudadim va .. lvan end and itara-jana-sama-skandhanê Mâyi-Dêva ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ enisida mahâ-pradhânaṃ Banavase-pannirchchhâsirada vaḍḍa-râvuḷa-hejjuṅkada heggaḍe-
daṇḍanâyakaṃ Mâyi-Dêvarasar râjadhâni-Baḷḷigrâmeya nelavîḍinoḷ sukhadin irddu ondu-diva-
saṃ sakaḷa-budha-jana-parivâra-parivṛitan âgirddu dharmma-prasaṅgamaṃ mârppudum avarga-
ḷum adane manade-goṇḍ int endar ǁ

mattam â-maṭhaṃ purâṇa-Kamaṭhanante sakaḷa-lôkâdhâramuṃ kshîra-nîrâkaradante nija-
lakshmî-paritôshita-purâṇa-purushamuṃ Bhavânî-bhavanadante brahmachâri-sadâchâra-sambhâ-
vitamuṃ Kurukshêtradante Sarasvatî-viḷasitamuṃ Khachara-lôkadante vidyâdharâdhiśvara-pa-
rivṛitamuṃ śrî-Kailâsadante Vâmaśakti-dêva-paripâḷitamum âgirppudu mattav â-maṭhada guru-
kuḷa-kramamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: âvirbbhavisidan amaḷa-ya- | śô-vibhava-vinûtan enipa Gautama-munipa ǁ
sarvvâm urvvîṃ tatô ‘nu prabhavati prasitâ Vâmaśaktêr munîndrât ǁ
Madanaharaṅg ene bhû-taḷa- | vidita-yaśaṃ Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-dêvaṃ ǁ

div.p:
adar̤indav illiy ênânuv ondu dharmmamaṃ mâḷpud endu pêḷvuduv adane manade-goṇḍu
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Traiḷôkyamalla-varshada 6 neya Yuva-saṃvatsarada Mâghad-amâvâsyey
uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-Sômavâra-vyatîpâtadandu svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-
maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-guṇa-sampannar vvudha-jana-prasannaruṃ śrîmad-râjadhâni-
Balipura-Dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara sthânad-âchâryyarum appa śrîmad-Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-
dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâdi tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ dêvara nivêdyakkaṃ
khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkav endu śrî-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara tôṇṭadalu puṭṭuv âvu pannada
gôṇṭ-aḍakeya vaḍḍa-râvuḷa hejjuṅkav eraḍuṃ bilkoḍeya suṅkav initumaṃ mattav â-tôṇṭad eleya
pannâyad ellâ-suṅkamumaṃ sarvvâ-bâdhâ-parihâravâgi naḍavantâg iralu biṭṭu koṭṭan (usual
final phrases-not completed).

div.head:
105
In the same place, on a thirteenth stone.
div.p: namaś Śivâya |

lg.l: Sômaḥ sômârddha-dhârî sa bhavatu bhavatâṃ bhûtayê Bhûtanâthaḥ ǁ
nâbhau Paṅkaja-sambhavaṃ vasumatîṃ paśchât pradêśê sthirâṃ |
râjîva-śrîyam akshishu sthirataraṃ têjas tanau śâśvatê
dhattê sô’stu sukhâya sarvva-jagatâṃ Vishṇur Yadûnâṃ patiḥ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bha-
ṭṭârakaṃ Yâdava-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Hoysaḷâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dê-
vara vaṃśânvayav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: sô’yaṃ vîra-Nṛisiṃha-bhûpatir abhûd bhûmau pratâpânvitaḥ ǁ
kurvan saukhyam aśêshataḥ trî-jagatâṃ bhû-chakra-Chakrî svayaṃ
muni munid îṇṭad abdhi maran allad kalpa-kujaṃ Surâri-sû- |
danan adaṭindav eḷtid atibhaṅgadoḷ on[da]da Mandarâdri ne- |
ṭṭane mṛiga-rûpamaṃ taḷedu huṭṭada kêsari guṇpin-ârpinoḷ |
vinutav enippa biṇpina parâkramadoḷ Narasiṃha-bhûbhuja ǁ
teraḷad arâti-bhûbhujara niṭṭ-eluvaṃ sale têdu boṭṭan i- |
ṭṭ uruḷva śiraṅgaḷaṃ balu-garuḷgaḷoḷ âgaḍe kô(y)dudu kaṇṭhadoḷ |
dharisi kapâlamaṃ piḍidu nettaran înṭi manônurâgadiṃ |
dhuradoḷu khaḍga-kâḷi kuṇid âḍuvaḷ î-Narasimha-bhûpana ǁ

div.p: va ǁ â-bhûpâḷakana pratâpa-prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: tyaktvâ naktam agân nagâgra-śikharaṃ bhîtyâ sa-sainyas svayaṃ |
Lâḷaṃ bêḷâgi ninḍaṃ Magadhan agidan ant Andhran ant andhan âdaṃ |
Gauḷaṃ sauḷ âdan â-Koṅkaṇa-nripati bhayâśaṅkan âgirddan â-Nê- |
pâḷaṃ châpa-chyutaṃ Mâḷava madav aḷiduṃ mâḷavaṃ bokku bil̤daṃ |
Chôḷam gôḷuṇḍe-goṇḍaṃ jaḍidaḍ asiyan â-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva ǁ
nija-râjya-chyutar âgi bal̤dapev enuttuṃ bhîtiyiṃ vairigaḷ |
kujav êr̤ ôḍi bahitrav êr̤e kelabar putt êr̤e bhûpâḷaka- |
brajav ellaṃ giri-durgav êṛe su-bhaṭar śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-bhû- |
bhujan ant arthiyoḷ êr̤idaṃ ripu-kuḷa-dhvântâri vaihâḷiya ǁ
sô’yaṃ jîbyâd Er̤eyaṇa-chamû-nâyakô yâvad urvvî ǁ
udbudhyan parivarddhayan pratidinaṃ pushyan mudâ prîṇayan
pṛithvyâm adbhuta-kîrttimân Er̤eyaṇô vidyôtatê chandravat ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-chamûnâthaṃ Banavase-pannir-chhâsiramumaṃ Sântaḷige-sâyiramuman êkâdhisṭhitaṃ
mâḍiy âḷuttam irdd ondu-devasaṃ dharmma-prasaṅgadiṃ śrî-Kêdâra-dêvara staḷamumaṃ tadîya-
sthânâchâryyar appa śrîmad-râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara tapaḥ-prabhâvamumaṃ nîḍuṃ nôḍiy â-
mahânubhâvara yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi – śîla-
sampannaruṃ (y)ashṭâṅga-yôga-nishṭhâ-pratishṭhita-naishṭhika-chhâtra-santati-sañchhannaruṃ
samasta-vastu-vistîrṇṇârṇṇava-mêkhaḷâḷaṅkrita-sakaḷa-dhâtrî-samuddharaṇa-daksha-dakshiṇa-kau-
kshêyaka-virâjamânânamra-kamra-kshôṇîśa-mauḷi – kîḷita-harinîḷa-rôḷamba-jâḷa – parirañjita-nija-
pada-payôjaruṃ kavi-gamaki-vâdi-vâgmi-pramukha – vividha-vidvaj-janânanda-kâraṇa-jaṅgama-
kaḷpa-bhûjaruṃ vêdânta-siddhântâgama-shaṭ-tarkka-sakala-vyâkaraṇa-nirmmaḷa-dharmma-śâstrâ-
dy-aśêsha-śâstrârttha-nirṇṇaya-nirṇṇiktaruṃ para-vâdi-parvvata-pêṭana-pâṭana-paṭutara-vividha
.. ṇḍa-prakhyâta-yukti-yuktaruṃ anavarata-nata-niḷimpâdhîśa-maṇi-makuṭa-ghaṭṭita-prabyakta-
muktâ-phaḷa-sphâra-târâ-râjita-Chandrachûḍa-charaṇa-nakha-kiraṇa-hariṇâṅka-chandrikâ-chakô-
raruṃ sakaḷa-su-kavi-nikurumbâdhâraruṃ anna-dânâ-suvarṇṇa-dâna-kanyâ-dâna-gô-dâna-bhû-dâ-
nâbhaya-bhaiśajyâdy-anêka-dâna-prasaṅgaruṃ Hara-charaṇa-sarôja-bhṛiṅgaruṃ śârada-nîrada-
pârada-târâchaḷa-khsîra-nîrâkara-śarad-indu-chandra-chandrikâ-sphaṭika-malayaja-smêra-gô-kshî-
ra-nîhâra-śaṅkha-Śaṅkarâṅga-viśada-yaśas—sudhâ-dhavaḷita-daśa-diśâ-vaḷayaruṃ tapas-śrî-kântâ-
kamanîya-niḷayaruṃ dâruṇa-dâridrya-dâva-pâvakôpahata-vividha-vandi(ta)-sandôha-kântârânta-
santarppaṇa-karaṇa-kâraṇa-kanaka-varshâ-kâla-mêgharuṃ durîkṛita-duritaugharuṃ asatya-dô-
sha-durllabharuṃ âśrita-jana-vallabharuṃ anâdi-paṭṭaṇa-râjadhâni-Balipurada śrîmad-Dakshiṇa-
Kêdârêśvara-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakaruṃ visishṭa-nânâ-mantra-sâdhakar appa śrî-
mad-râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara guru-kuḷa-kramav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: śrî-Gautamô munir abhûd bhuvanê vichitraṃ ǁ
toḍavaṃ kaustubhamaṃ Sarasvatiyumaṃ dêvâdigaḷ munn ivaṃ |
paḍed ant î-satu-putranaṃ su-jananaṃ dharmmajñanaṃ dhanyanaṃ |
âjñâ râjñâṃ śirasi vibhavô vidvatâṃ mandirêshu
lâlityôtthaṃ vidhâtuṃ prabhavati bhuvanê Vâmaśakti-bratîndraḥ ǁ
tasyânyô vâkya-bhâvaṃ ghaṭayati kurute chârttha-sampattim anyaḥ |
êtach chitraṃ vidhattê ghaṭayati kurutê bôdhayaty aprabuddhân
êkaś śrî-Vâmaśakti-vrati-patir aparô Vyâsavad byâpipartti ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-chakrêśvaran uttara-dig-bhâgakke bijayaṃ geydu Lokkiguṇḍiya nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅka-
thâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sar-
vvâdhikâri mahâ-pasâyitaṃ Yâdava-kaṭaka-raksha-pâḷakaṃ ripu-nṛipa-bênṭekâr̤aṃ para-maṇḍaḷa-
sûr̤ekâr̤aṃ śrî-Viśvanâtha-dêva-divya-śrî-pâda-padmârârâdhakaṃ para-baḷa-sâdhakaṃ vairi-gha-
raṭṭaṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ vairi-bhaya-dâyakan appa Yar̤e-
yaṇṇana nirmmaḷa-vaṃśânvayam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: gane pati-bhakte kômaḷe lasad-guṇi Nâgala-Dêviyargge Bar- |
mmanu guṇa-varmman âda sutan âtana tamman udâtta-kîrtti-sañ- |
janakan enalke pêḷ Er̤agan-annanam âvaḷô pettaḷ urbbiyoḷ ǁ
mêl enisida balavantaṃ | Bâliya baḷiyaṃ pavitra-mâḍaḷu piriduṃ |
ḷîleyoḷe puṭṭidaṃ budharg | âlayav enisalke dhareyoḷ Er̤aga-chamûpa ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-chamûnâthaṃ Banavase-pannirchhâsirada râjadhâni-Balipurada srîmad-Dakshiṇa-Kêdâ-
rêśvara-dêvara pûje-naivêdya-nandâdîvige-Chaitra-pavitrâdy-anêka-bhôgakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâ-
ra-dânakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârav int initakkaṃ tann âḷkeya Sântaḷige-nâḍa Muddha-
Kundâniya vṛittiyoḷagaṇa Chîyana-Sâlivûraṃ potthada modala gadyâṇaṃ hadineṇṭakke sarvva-
namasya-kaṭṭu-guttige piṇḍâdâna-sarvva-bâdhâ-parihârav â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi saluvant âgi
Saka-varsha 1114 neya Paridhâvi-saṃatsarada Pushya-bahuḷa 5 Śukravâra-vuṭṭarâyaṇa-saṅkra-
maṇad andu srîmad-râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara śrî-pâda-prakshâlanaṃ gaidu tan-mahârâjaniṃ
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍisi koṭṭaru ǁ î-dharmmamaṃ pratipâlisidaṅge Gaṅgâ-Yamnâ-saṅgamadalu
vêda-vêdâṅga-vittamar appa brâhmaṇargge kôṭi-gôvugaḷaṃ svarṇṇa-ratnâlaṅkâra-sahitav âgi
koṭṭa-phaḷav akku ǁ (usual final imprecatory phrases and verse).
kavirâjara paṇḍita Mâḷeyana kavite kallôja-Chaṭṭeyana likhita ǁ

div.head:
106
In the same place, on a fourteenth stone.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ srî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraaṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salluttam ire tat-pâ-
da-padmôpajîvi svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-
daṇḍanâyakan âsthâna-vastu-nâyaka vipra-kuḷa-kumudinî-sudhâkara satya-ratnâkara niyôga-
Yôgandhara kadana-kêḷî-dhurandhara srîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdârâdhaka para-baḷa-
sâdhaka nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânan antaḥpurâdhyakshaṃ sahavâ-
sigaḷ-adhishṭhâyakaṃ heri-Lâḷa-Kannaḍa sandhi-vigrahi mane-verggaḍe srîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ
dâṇḍanâyakaṃ Bhîvaṇayyaṅgaḷa deśeyiṃ svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ
daṇḍanâyakaṃ Padmanâbhayyaṅgaḷu Banavase-pannirchhâsiramuṃ sukhadiṃ pratipâḷisuttam
ire tad-râjadhâniya vistâram ent endade ǁ

lg.l: Kontiya basir̤alu Pâṇḍavar- | ant ayvar ppempu-vettu dhâriṇiyoḷ |
Kantu-nripa-rûpa-sannibhar | ant ayvar ppuṭṭidar Chikakabbeya basur̤al ǁ

div.p:
antu Bammadêvarasaniṃ kir̤iyaṃ Nâgadêvayya-Nâyakan âtaniṃ kir̤iyaṃ Tikarasan âtaniṃ kir̤i-
yan enisiyuṃ Lôkarasaṃ Jôgarasan ant irbbaruṃ dharmma-chittadoḷaṃ prabhutvadolaṃ vîratva-
doḷaṃ parôpakârârtthadoḷaṃ kîrttiya negarttey-artthitvak anurûpam âda pursha-ratnâkarar
enisida tamm-irbbaruṃ śrîmad-râjadhâni-Baḷḷigrâmeya dakshiṇa-diśâ-bhâgada Tâvareger̤eyiṃ
baḍagaṇa-deseyoḷu srî-Lôkêśvara-dêvarumaṃ śrî-Jôgêśvara-dêvarumaṃ pṛatishṭheyaṃ mâḍiy
â-dêvar-aṅga-khôgakaṃ Chaitra-pavitrakkaṃ nivêdyakkaṃ alliya pûjâriya grâsakk endu paṭṭaṇa-
sâvi Hanumanta-Seṭṭiyuṃ Bammi-Seṭṭiyuṃ Mêchi-Seṭṭiyuṃ paṭṭaṇasâvitanaṃ geyyuttaṃ sukha-
din ire Lôkarasanuṃ Jôgadêva-Nâyakanuṃ Bammi-Seṭṭige honnaṃ koṭṭa ây-ayyan-uṃbaḷiya
bhûmiyoḷage dêguladiṃ mûḍalu śâlêya-bhumiyiṃ paḍuvalu teṅkalu Bammi-Seṭṭiya keyiṃ baḍa-
gaṇa-dese baḍagalu Kommajjana tôṇṭadiṃ teṅkaluy intu chatus-śîme-mêreyâgi naḍuve koṇḍu
koṭṭa bhûmi paṭṭaṇasâvi-mukhyam âgi samasta-nagaraṅgaḷuṃ Gammaṇḍa-sâvi Saṅkarayyanuṃ
sênabôva-Saṅkarayyanuṃ Saudhore Chiṭṭimayyanuṃ pir̤iya-maṭha-Bhêruṇdêśvarad âchâryya-śrî-
mad-Gauḷa-paṇḍita-dêvaruṃ Pañcha-Liṅgad-âchâryyaru Śrîkaṇṭha-paṇḍita-dêvaru śrîmat-Tri-
purântakad âchâryyar chChaturânana-paṇḍitaru śrî-Mûlasthâna-mukhyam âgi pañcha-maṭhad
âryya Mûliga Honneya-jîyaruṃ śâlêya-parsheyuṃ Bauddhâlyada sâvâsi Nâgiyakkanuṃ paṭṭaṇada
(sama) samasta-Brahmapuriya mahâjanaṅgaluṃ maṇigâra-Nâgi-Śetṭiyuṃ Togara Mâchi-Śeṭṭiyuṃ
minda-guddali Nâmi-Seṭṭiyuṃ samasta-mummuri-daṇḍagaḷum intu paṭṭaṇam aśêshada sanni-
dhânadalu srîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 22neya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada Pushyad amâ-
vâśyey-Âdityavâram uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti – vyatîpâtad andu Lôkarasaṅge Bammi-Seṭṭi tann
umbaḷiyoḷage dêvargge koṭṭa keyi kammmav kammav ayvattu intu î-dharmmamaṃ tappade pratipâḷisida-
vargge Prayâge Vâraṇâsi Kurukshêtram Arghyatîrtham emba pu[ṇya]-tîrthaṅgaḷoḷu sahasra-kavi-
legaḷaṃ kôḍuṃ koḷagamuṃ ponnalu kaṭṭisi sahasra-chatur-vvêda-pâragar appa brâhmargg aḷan-
kâra-sahitaṃ koṭṭa-puṇyamantar apparu î-dharmmaman aḷida mahâ-pâtakaṅg â(haṃ)-tîrthaṅga-
ḷoḷu sahasra-kavilegaḷmaṃ chatur-vvêda-pâragar appa brâhmaṇarumaṃ ekôṭi-tapô-dhanaruman
aḷida mahâ-pâtakar apparu ǁ (usual final verse).

div.head:
107
In the same place, on a fifteenth stone.

lg.l: bhûyâd Bhûta-patir vvibhur ddivibhuvâṃ vô bhôgabhṛid-bhûshaṇô
Śambhus sa ... ṇimâdi-bhûtir abhavô Bhîma-svayambhûr Bhavô
Bhûbṛidbhû-prabhur âtma-bhakta-bhaya-bhid Bharggô bhṛiśaṃ bhûtayê ǁ
kuḷa-paṅkêjâta-shaṇḍakk amard eseye vikâsaṃ tri-ḷôkaṅgaḷ ellaṃ |
ḍôllasita-têjan aprati- | mallaṃ Jayasimha-bhûpan achaḷita-kôpa ǁ
stakar ittuṃ tettum irddar ssukhadin ahitar ugrâjig ettânum uttâ- |
mmuka-hastaṃ vakshadoḷ tettisi beḷeyisane bennoḷ ambaṃ Noḷamba ǁ
.. doḷ imbaṃ Bhârati-nârige vadanadoḷ imbaṃ jaya-śrîge dôr-daṇ- |

div.p:
..... prachaṇḍa-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ jana-vinutaṃ biṇpina tiṇpina guṇpina kaṇija ....
... maḍi Bhṛigu-puṅgavaṅge Châṇakyaṅg ainûrmmadi Sakaṭâ .. ge sâsirmmadi ....
..... kaṃ Draviḷa-pañchakamuṃ beras aḷki baḷkuvaṃ biṅkada poṅkamaṃ bisuṭu ..
...... hasta-gatam âdudu chakrige sapta-Koṅkaṇaṃ kaṅkaṇadante daṇḍa-pati ...
...... noḷ besam-baḍedu kôpâṭôpadind eyde saṇṇisidaṃ kû .........
.. samudraṃ biḍid ôḍi kôḍi ḍseḷedaṃ dôr- ggarbbad urbbinde tettisidaṃ ........
.. stambhama ǁ

lg.l: satataṃ lôkam or̤aldu baṇṇisutam irke .. dana . |

div.p:
. śô-viḍambita-sudhâkṛid-bimban-ante .. Śântaḷige ........... âḷutti-
re sukhadiṃ Tamba-chamûpan ahita-hutavaha-kôpa ǁ

lg.l: vara-kôṇeya-santatig â- | bharaṇaṃ Kêdâraśakti-muni-pati negarda ǁ
dhâmaṃ Lâkuḷa-samaya-la- | lâmaṃ Rudrâbha-mûrtti Rudrâbharaṇa ǁ

div.p:
kshitige Vikrama-kâladâ ....... tad-anvita-Pushya-mâsada kṛishṇa-pañchami ..
.. doḷ uttarâyaṇada ........ kriyoḷ paḍed artthiyiṃ dvija-puṅga ... śab-
da-mahâ – sâmantâdhi ..... sakaḷârtthi-sârttha ............ raṃ
sâhasa-Vṛikôdaraṃ .... ḷa-charitraṃ dha ...... samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ
srîman-mahâ-pradhâ ........... ḷaka-nṛipa-sandhi-vigrahi ....... dant eseva Kun-
taḷa-vishayakk aḷaṅkaraṇam enisida Banavâse-nâḍa ......... pa-nivêdyâdi-bahu-
vidhârchchanegaṃ mâṭakûṭa-prâsâda-kha ........ Tâvarager̤eya keḷagaṇa-taḷa-
doḷ koṭṭa tôṇṭaṃ ............ Jiḍḍuḷige-yerppattar̤a baḷiya bâḍaṃ ..
............ mâḍittaṃ mêdiniy ar̤iyalke ........ (usual final
verses) ........ bhakti-samudbhavô’stu ǁ (rest gone).

div.head:
108
In the same place, on a sixteenth stone.
div.p: ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ
Harayê namaḥ ǁ

lg.l: Śrî-kântâ-Girijâ-yutau muni-nutau prîtau cha gîtau śrutau
pâtâṃ tvâṃ satataṃ chamûpati-Mahâdêva tvad-ishṭârtthadau ǁ
tîvire kûrttu rakshisutav irkk Agajêśvaran Îśvaraṃ Mahâ- |
âtana tanujaṃ dhairyyô- | pêtaṃ Satyâśraya-kshitîśaṃ bhuvana- |
khyâtaṃ negaḷdaṃ tat-tanu- | jâtaṃ Vikrama-mahipan apratirûpa ǁ
ati-baḷan âtana tammaṃ | kshitipati-Daśavarmman âtan-âtmabhavaṃ bhû- |
nuta-Jayasiṃha-nṛipaṃ tat- | sutan apratimallan enipan Âhavamalla ǁ
.. noḷ śauryyakke dhâtri-dha .. nikaradoḷ uttuṅga-dhairyyakke Kumbhô- |
dbhavanoḷ biṇpiṅge vârâṃnidhi .... taṇpiṅge mâr̤âmpan âṭand |
avamânaṃ gaiyvan ullaṅghisuvan atisaya-spûrttiyiṃ tôrppan aty-û- |
vikramadiṃ tanage diśâ- | chakraṃ besakeyye Vikramâditya ... |
chakraman âḷdaṃ nata-ripu- | chakraṃ durllaṅghyam enisal âjñâ-chakra ǁ
Bhûlôkamallan urbbî- | pâḷakana su ... pâḷa-kuḷa vikrama-sañ- |
châḷakan âtana tanayaṃ | pâḷisidaṃ sakaḷam enipa viśvambhareyaṃ ǁ
dhareyaṃ tâḷda ... śvaraṃ nija-śiras-sâhasramaṃ tâḷdi dik- |
mmillaṃ bhûpâḷa-kuḷakk ellaṃ Jagadêkamallan apratimalla ǁ
turagânîkaman eyde koṇḍu jagadoḷ vikhyatiyam tâḷdidaṃ |

div.p: tad-antara tad-anuja-pratâpav ent endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: irmmaḍi Daśakaṇṭhaṅge pa- | dirmmaḍi Daśaśatabhujaṅge Râmaṅgaṃ tâṃ |
nûrmmaḍiy enise Mahê .. | nûrmmaḍi Tailapa-mahîpan ûrjjitan âda ǁ
kshiti tannindaṃ râjan- | vatiy âdaḷ enalke vijaya-lakshmî- .... |

div.p:
va ǁ antu svasti srîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêva nirupama-prabhâvaṃ rajyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-kâ-
ladoḷu svasti samadhigata-pañch-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Kâḷâñjara-pura-varâdhîśvara
suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja damaruga- .. rya-nirgghôshaṇaṃ Kaḷachurya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa
kadana-prachaṇḍa mâna-Kanakâchaḷa subhaṭar-âditya ....... gaja-sâmanta śa-
raṇâgata-vajra-pañjara pratâpa-Laṅkêśvara para-nârî-sahôdara Śanivâra-siddhi Giri ....
chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava nissaṅka-malla-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ srîman-
mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ .... sara tat-pratâpa-prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ
* From here the inscription is much defaced.

lg.l: jita-kâryyaṃ kâryyadind aggaḷipa nija-mahâ ......... dind û- |

div.p:
va ǁ .. prati-man ........ pratâpanuṃ dharitrî-chakraman â-kra .. diṃ râjyaṃ gay-
vuttaṃ ird ondu-divasaṃ srîma .. dêva .. vipula-lakshmî-nivâsa mâḷpad agaṇya-puṇyan
appa .. va .. kshamane ..... dar̤i ... yaman ar̤idapare gîtajñanum ati-
śaya-prajñanu ... svasti srîma ... tîpriya-pâdâravinda-bhṛiṅgaṃ nirmmita-ripu-kuḷa-
............. maṇiyum enipa srîman-Mahâdêva-daṇḍanâyaka vairi-bhaya-
dâyaka ǁ
va ǁ â-chamûpati-nirmmaḷânvayam ent endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: .. gene ... dêvi tat-taneyan î-Mâdêvan atyûrjjita ǁ

div.p: va ǁ â-Kâḷidâsa-chamûpatiya charitramaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: kolal end irppalli .... mane nija-dhanama ..... ykoṇḍu kâ- |
......... lem endu .. nilisida .. d î-jagaṃ baṇṇisal nir- |
mmala-chittaṃ permme-vettaṃ para-hita-charita .... gan â-Kâḷidâsaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ .... nisida mahâ-pradhâna-Kâḷidâsa-chamûpatiya ...... tra ... daḍe ...
.. besavam â-lôkam ellaṃ besase .................... paṅ-
goḷvinaṃ bhaṭa ......... Mahâdêvaṅge ...... ṇmu ......
........... tân endoḍe .. nirmmaḷa-charitaṃ Mahâdêva-daṇḍêśa ninnoḷu ǁ

lg.l: bharadiṃ Śrîvatsa-dâṇḍêśanoḷ ir̤iye Mahâdêvan ugrâsiyind a- |

div.p:
.. ru bese .... Kôsage Sitagere Baḷḷâre Râchû ... r̤uvar̤e ........
...... raveḍe .... mattaṃ | ... ponna-gaḷasaṃ kaṭṭisi sa .......
.. siṭṭa taḍeyoḷ .... mahâ ....................
Paḍigaṭṭa ma ............ ǁ srîma .. kana bâ .. ya . Madana-
naṃ Śrîvatsanaṃ chakra-pa .. daṇḍâdhipa-Kâḷidâsana magaṃ .... daṇḍâdhipa ǁ cha-
..... tavarmmane .. nara-chakravartti bhû-vaḷeyada bhûshaṇa ... ra .. jan-udârad
udâtta-mûrtti ............. viḷâsada .. kaligaḷa dêvan embud ani-
śaṃ Mahadêvanan î-jagaj-janaṃ ǁ

vachana ǁ antu negarttegaṃ pogarttegaṃ tâne nele ..... srîmad-Bijjaṇêśvara-
manôratha-samârûḍhan âgi Banavâse-dêśaman âḷuttav irddalli dêśa-viḷâsa-vistâramaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: jaḷaja .. ponalgaḷiṃ beḷada kartali nêlv-ele-vaḷḷi baggigoṇḍ- |
kuḷama .. lakshma-lakshmige samṛiddhi karaṃ Banavâse-dêśadoḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-Banavâse-dêśakke tilakad-ant opputtirppa mahâ-paṭṭaṇaṃ Balipuraṃ adar̤a viḷâsam ent
endaḍe ǁ

va ǁ mattaṃ Dhanada-pratimallar enipa nagaraṅgaḷiṃ palavuṃ pura-pañcha-maṭhaṃ palavuṃ
Brahma-purigaḷ vividha-nânâ-ramya-harmyaṅgaḷiṃ manôharam enipa Balipuradoḷ dushṭa-
nigraha-sishṭa-pratipâlanadiṃ srîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ kari-turaga ....... sênâdhi-
pati ..... Banavase-nâḍa ...... Mahâdêvarasaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ gayvuttaṃ irdd ondu-divasaṃ ǁ
mattam â-kumâranin udita ǁ

lg.l: vara-Lakshmiy enipa ma .. | ṇi .. d uttama ... y irppud idu paramârttha ǁ

div.p:
sthira ni .. dvaya-dhara ............ dhîśvaran amala-puṇya-puñja-sthiratâ-sahakâri-Maygura-
Mallayyaṃ â-chamûpatiya pradhâna ǁ

lg.l: ......... vidyâ- | chatura ...... n alte râjâmâtya ǁ

div.p:
mattaṃ ....... śvarana pradhâna ... dayya-Nâyakana vijaya-mahônnatiy ent endaḍe ǁ ............
amaḷa-kîrtti-Dekkhâ-dêvi .. hita ... pûjita ...... Nâyaka Sandaiyyaṃ ...... saṃstutaruṃ .........
anupama-têja ... vidhu vimaḷa-charitrâmbhônidhige ... vilasad-guṇa-ratna- .. -nidhi vibudha-
jana-stuta .......... anupama-dhairyyaṃ ǁ artthig artthaman artthi-janakk atiprîtiyan îva ......
urbbî-saṃstutan enisi ...... ûrjjita-bhâsvat-kîrtti-râjita-pa ....... ǁ

antu samasta .... dhyaksha sâmanta-pradhânaṃ ...... m enisi nijâsthânadoḷu dharmma-kathâ-
mânyar appuduṃ tad-avasaradoḷu ǁ
ant â-samayadoḷ ǁ

lg.l: ṇg esad atyujvala- .... danta-ruchiyind âsthânadoḷ chandrikâ- |
vyasanaṃ tad-guru-ta .... têjan ulidaṃ Kêdâraśaktîśvaraṃ ǁ

div.p: tad-vâkyam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: yô liṅgaṃ sthâpayêd êkaṃ vidhi-pûrvvaṃ sa-dakshiṇaṃ |

div.p: embuva tad-vâkyârtthamaṃ vichârisi dêvatâ-pratishṭhâ-pradêśânvêshaṇan âgi ǁ

lg.l: yatanakk end andu tad-bhâsura-pada-yugamaṃ kaṇḍu bhâsva ... kî- |
kṛitiyaṃ srî-Vâmaśakti-vratiyan atiśayânandadiṃ bandu kaṇḍa ǁ

div.p: â-munîśvarana guru-kuḷa-kramamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: Srîkaṇṭha-munige Vâg-dê- | vî-kaṇṭhada hâradante guṇa-bhûshitan â- |
ḷôkita-Śiva-padan ânata- | .. kaṃ Sômêśvarâryyan anupama-śishyaṃ ǁ

div.p:
Sômêśvara-munigaḷa śishya ...... śaraṇa ... sakaḷa-vibudha-lalâma ...... tan-munîśvarana śi-
shya śrî-Vâmaśaktîśvara ......... pâṅga-śarakke sômpi tadîya ............ ghaṭṭado ... chaḷad-
ujjvaḷa ..................... nîśvaranaṃ kaṇḍu labdhânujñan âgi śrîmat-Kêdâra- .........
.................. m appa Mahâdêvêśvara-dêvara janakâbhidhâna-pûrvvaka ...... ḷapêśvara-
dêvara ...... m appa Kâḷidâsa- ........... ye mûrtti-bhûtam âda ... r oppuva Kêśava-mûrttiya ......
............... vatsarada Mârgaśirad amavâsye-Sômavâra-sûryya-grahaṇa-vyatîpâtad andu ǁ svasti
srîman-Mahâdêva-daṇḍanâyaka srîmat-Kôḍiya-maṭhad âchâryya-Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Jiḍḍuḷige-yeppattar̤a baḷiya bâḍamaṃ Duguḷiya-Chikkaḷeyaṃ tri-
bhôgâbhyantara-sahitaṃ ...... dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôgakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ
vidyâ-dânakkaṃ mâṭakûta-prâsâdakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkav endu sarvva-nama-
śyav âgi koṭṭaṃ ǁ mattam â-mûvaru-dêvara naivêdyakk endu Jiḍḍuḷige-yeppattar̤a ......... yeppa-
ttar̤a manniya .. mâra Mâcharasa ...... Mâvantana Kôṇayya â-mûvaru-dêvara naivêdyakke biṭṭa
mattar ondu beddalu mattar eraḍu ǁ mattam â-mûvaru-dêvara naivêdya ............. maneya ...
... Bandaṇikeya koḍageyalli biṭṭa gadde mattar eraḍu ǁ (usual imprecatory phrases and verse.)

svasti srîmat-Saka-varsha 1105 neya Śôbhakṛitu-saṃvatsarada ........ âdaḍe Bommayyaṃ Jiḍḍu-
ḷige ...... koṭṭa .........

div.head:
109
At the same village, on a stone behind the Prabhu-dêva-gaddige.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ srî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ srîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-pad-
môpajîvi samasta-bhuvana-stuta Brahma-Kshatra-vîrânvaya srî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja
paramêśvaraṃ Kôḷâlapura-varêśvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâthaṃ mada-gajêndra-lâñchhanaṃ Sômêśva-
ra-labdha-vara-prasâda Gaṅga-Kusumâyudhaṃ Vikrama-Gaṅgaṃ jayad-uttaraṅgaṃ sakaḷa-jana-
chintâmaṇi maṇḍaḷika-makuṭa-chûḍâmaṇi srîmach-Châḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmâḍi Bhuvanaika-vîran
Udeyâditya-Dêvaṃ Gaṅgavâḍi-modalâgi Banavase-pannirchhâsiramumaṃ Sântaḷige-sâsiramuman
âḷdu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ gayyutt ire tan-manô-nayana-vallabhe svasty anavarata-
parama-kalyâṇâbhyudaya-sahasra-phaḷa-bhôga-bhâgini dvitîya-Lakshmî-samâne sahaja-saubhâ-
gya-rûpa-nidhâne bhuvana-vidyâdhari sakaḷa-kaḷâ-dhari chikurita-chakôra-nayane lîḷâḷasa-gamane
saṅgîtaka-prasaṅga-vivêka-chûḍâmaṇi śaraṇâgata-rakshâmaṇi yâchaka-jana-jaṅgama-nidhâna-ka-
ḷaśe Sâradâ-dêvî-labdha-vara-prasâde srîmad-Udayâditya-Dêvan-arddhâṅgiyar appa srîmat-Lach-
chala-Dêviayar ǁ

lg.l: pochcha-posa-dêse mârggadoḷ | achchari rasa-bhâvam ôje bahu-vidha-gatiyoḷ |

div.p: (rest gone.)

div.head:
110
On a stone standing against the gaddige in front of the same maṭha.

lg.l: vyâpâraṃ mâḷke saypaṃ sakaḷa-ruchira-têjar̤-prakâśaṃ Mahêśaṃ ǁ
ddâmaṃ sand Ayyaṇaṃ sâhasa-nidhi Jayasiṅgaṃ dharâ-chakra-lakshmî- |
dhâmaṃ Traiḷôkyamallan negaḷe negal̤dud î-prâjya-Châḷukya-râjyaṃ ǁ
śaraṇ enduṃ bhîtiyiṃ kay-mugiduv iradoḍ ammamma dôr-vvikramâḍam- |
baradiṃ Traiḷôkyamallaṃ masagi mul̤idu mêl ettidaṃ dhâḷiy-iṭṭaṃ |
pariy-iṭṭaṃ muttidaṃ tôl̤ tuḷid uḷidan aḍaṅgottidaṃ tuttidaṃ bêr- |
vveras ant ant etti kirtt ottidan ahitaran embant idaṃ kêḷal akkuṃ ǁ
tavuva-balaṃ kaḷalva-nakham êruva-suy sur̤iv-êr̤u tôr̤e nur- |
gguva ripu-dantigaḷ par̤iye gandha-gajaṃ Bhuvanaikamallana ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânaṃ â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire ǁ

lg.l: ddâmaṃ Brahma-Kshatra-śi- | khâmaṇi râjâdhirâjan Udayâdityaṃ ǁ

div.p: (the rest of the stone is broken off).

div.head:
111
On a stone on the bund of the pond.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ srî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bha-
ṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tilakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ srîmat – Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târ̤am saluttam ire tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ – prachaṇḍa-daṇḍa-
nâyaka mane-verggaḍe-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Guṇḍamarasaru Banavâse-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa kampaṇam agra-
hâraṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷaṃ herjjuṅka yeraḍuṃ biḷkoḍeyuman âḷutt ire yivara vaṃśadoḷe jyêshṭhan
udit(y)a-Kṛishṇanum enisida samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-pra-
chaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ vibudha-pradâyakaṃ haya-Vatsa-râjaṃ rûpa-Manôjaṃ parârttha-Jîmû-
tavâhanan aritaṭṭa-Bhairavaṃ Guṇḍana sannâha samasta-nâmâvaḷî-samêtar appa Jekkamarasanuṃ
śrî-Bârahakôḍiya śrî-Sarvvêśvara-dêvargge namaskâraṃ mâḍi divya-Liṅgamamaṃ kaṇḍu piriduṃ
bhaktar âgi dêvargge snâna-pûjâ-prachinteyaṃ mâḍavêkum endu pêṇṭeyoḷ tiṅgaḷiṅge yaleya-
pêr̤u mânya-vandakkaṃ paṇa 1 samasta-suṅkada ṭhâṇântaraṅgaḷoḷ kaṇṭheya-vaṇa yaraḍu bîḍina
ka ... ḍakeya pêr̤iṅge yaraḍ-aḍake mattaṃ srî-râjadhâni – Baḷḷigrâmeya paṭṭaṇasâvi-modalâge
samasta-nagaraṃ pavitrake koṭṭa paṇa ½ aṇgaḍiyalu parvva-nivêdyakke akki ba 1 Jiḍḍuḷige-erp-
pattar̤alu koṭṭa kaṇṭhe-vaṇaṃ ... ya manêra Bala-dêvanuṃ yalliya tambuligaruv il̤du vokkalolke
.. 25 pe .. drôṇamumaṃ koṭṭaru sôvanigaru koṭṭa vi 5 akkasâli . su .. vi 5 kodatiyaṃ ... me 5 int
initumaṃ . bhâdi .. śrî-Śarvvê[śva]ra-dêvara chintâyakaṃ Kamalâsana-paṇḍitaṅge .. |

div.head:
112
In the same place, on a second stone.
div.p: ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ

ôṃ namaḥ Sivâya ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ pa-
ramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakam Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ srîmad-Bhûlôka-
malla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-ba-
raṃ saluttam ire ǁ

lg.l: silpigaḷ ati-vimaḷa-guṇâ- | kalpar Pâvaṇanum eseva Râvaṇanuṃ sat- |
kalpar ddharmma-śravaṇâ- | nalpar ssôdarar udâtta-vimaḷa-charitrar ǁ
nija-tâtaṃ gaḍa Râghavaṃ janani tâṃ Ballavve Gaurîśa-dâ- |
vraja-vandyaṃ modalâge Kôḍiya-maṭhakk âchâryyar âg irddavar |
nija-sat-svâmigaḷ endoḍ ê-voguḷvudô tat-kîrttiyaṃ lôkadoḷ ǁ

div.p:
enisida Bâvaṇanuṃ Râvaṇanum irbbaruṃ nija-śilpi-kuḷa-kaḷaṅkamaṃ kaḷayal endu Kusuvêśvara-
dêvara pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍi Mêchi-Seṭṭi-Kîrtti-Seṭṭi-pramukhaṃ aśêsha-nagara-jana pañcha-maṭha-
sthânagaḷaṃ kareyal alliyavaru sahitav â-Kusuvêśvara-sthânamaṃ śrî-Gautama-dêvargge śrîmat-
