Kêdârêśvara-dêvara pratibaddhavâgi kuḍal â-śrî-Gautama-dêvar Siddhârttha-saṃvatsarada Pu-
shya-śuddha-trayôdaśy-Âdityavârôttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyoḷ aśêsha-nagara-janaṅgaḷa pañcha-maṭha-
sthânada sannidhânadalli dêvara aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ nivêdyakkaṃ vendu tamma hakkaḷe-keya bhûmi
Tôḷa-Nârasiṃha-dêvara keyyinda mûḍaṇa-bayalalli ar̤avattu-kamma-gaddeyaṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakav
âgi koṭṭar mattaṃ Mêchi-Seṭṭi-Kîrtti-Seṭṭi-pramukha-nagara-janaṅgaḷ atyanta-viśuddha-dharmma-
diṭṭhigaḷ appudar̤iṃ śrî-Kusuvêśvara-dêvara dêvâlayada khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakk endu
Bâvaṇan irdda maneya siddhâyaman â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluv ant âgi biṭṭar ǁ matta te-
lligar ayvatt-okkaluṃ dêvara nandâdîvigege gâṇadal ondu-soṇṭige-yaṇṇeyaṃ biṭṭar ǁ mattaṃ
Khêvaleya-Gâvuṇḍa-mukhyav âgi samasta-sippiga-gottaḷiy ellaṃ dêvara Chaitra-pavitrada par-
vvakke prati-saṃvatsara okkalol ondu-paṇamaṃ maduvey âdalli madavaṇigan avaralli ondu-paṇa
madavaḷige ......... paṇamumaṃ kusumbiya haṇa ............ â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ .........
pratipâḷisidavargge Vâraṇâ ...... kavileyaṃ kôḍuṃ .. koḷaguma ........... appa Brâhmaṇarige
koṭṭa phala (usual final verses) namaś Śivâya ǁ

div.head:
113
On a stone near the steps of the same pond.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-Yâdava-chakravartti vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva-varshada 13 neya Rudhirôdgâri-saṃvatsarada
Chaitra-śu 7 Â-dandu Amṛitachandra-bhaṭṭâraka-dêvara guḍḍaṃ Kêsava-Seṭṭiya Mâdayyaṃ
samâdhi-vidhiyiṃ muḍipi sura-lôka-prâptan âdaṃ .....

div.head:
114
On a stone in the Chauki-hoṇḍa of the same maṭha.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire ǁ

lg.l: piriyaṃ Châḷukyaroḷ Tailapa-nṛipan avanindaṃ baḷikke pratâpa- |
kk orey âr tTraiḷôkyamalla-kshitipati-varan allindam itt âdi-bhûpâ- |
ḷarigaṃ châturyyadoḷ sauryyadoḷ anupama-sambhôgadol châgadoḷ tâṃ |
sura-têjô-mûrttiyoḷ kîrttiyoḷ adhikan ivaṃ Vikramâditya-Dêvaṃ ǁ
Tribhuvanamallaṃ Permmâ- | ḍi bhîma-bhujan akhiḷa-dhareyan âḷutt ire vî- |
ra-bhaṭa-śiraś-śêkharan ahi- | ta-bhayaṅkaran enipa Kâḷidâsa-chamûpaṃ ǁ
digaḷaṃ kitt ikki bhaṇḍâraman adhika-gajêndraṅgaḷaṃ peṇḍiraṃ vâ- |
jigaḷaṃ tand ittu sauryyaṃ negaḷe negarda-Châḷukya-chakrêśvaraṅg u- |
Dêvêndran-ondu-vibhavaman | âvagam int eḷadu tandu bhôgisutirddaṃ ǁ
tana negarda-vaśṃâvatâram ent ene pêḷveṃ ǁ
iṭṭaḷam appa Kamme-goladoḷ kulamaṃ beḷagal kuḷôttamaṃ |
puṭṭidan ellaruṃ pogaḷe .. yan a-jêyan apâra-paurushaṃ ǁ
kêvaḷam êṃ puṭṭe puṭṭisuv- | â-vibhuvim Nâgavarmma-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ ǁ
pati-bhaktige Paramana Pâ- | rvvati châturyyôktig Ajana Bhârati sirig A- |
chyutana Siri Nâgavarmmana | sati bhâvise Nâgiyakkan embudu lôkaṃ ǁ
Giriśaṅgaṃ Girijâtegaṃ Gaṇapanuṃ Sênâniyum puṭṭuv ant |
siriyaṃ santatam âgi bhôgisuge chandrâdityar uḷlannegaṃ ǁ
Râmaṃ Lakshmaṇan antiral | î-mahiyoḷ Sarvva-Dêvanuṃ Râyanuv u- |
ddâma-bhuja-vîryyar adhika- | prêmade sukham irkke lakke-Dîvaḷige-varaṃ ǁ
pirid app aiśvaryyamaṃ mâḍuge vidita-yaśaṃ Sarvva-Dêvaṅge bhâ- |
Girijêśaṃ vyôma-kêśaṃ sakaḷa-durita-vidhvaṃsan îśaṃ Mahêśaṃ ǁ
durita-dhvaṃsakan Îśaṃ | paramâtmaṃ sarvva-karttu Śarvvaṃ Sarvvê- |
śvara-dêvaṃ rakshisug â- | daradindaṃ Sarvva-Dêvanuṃ Râyanumaṃ ǁ
dhare bannaṃ bettuv â-Mandara-giri sariyê tiṇpinoḷ vârddhiy ettaṃ |
doreyê pêḷ guṇpinoḷ dhâriṇi sarisam enal bappudê biṇpinoḷ Man- |
dara-śaiḷakk arṇṇavakk urvvareg adhika-guṇaṃ nôḍe Châvuṇḍa-Râyaṃ ǁ
ene negarda Râyaniṃ kir̤i- | yan ârppinoḷ kaḷpa-kujadin attaḷagaṃ guṇ- |
pinoḷ ambudhig adhikam pem- | pinoḷ aggada Mêru-girigav uddaṃ Biddaṃ ǁ
dhare kampaṃ-goḷgum âsâ-kari peḍar̤ugum Ambhôja-jaṃ berchhuguṃ sâ- |
garam ettaṃ mêr̤eyaṃ dâṭugum anupama-dôs-sâhasaṃ Sarvva-Dêvaṃ |
dhuradoḷ pimmeṭṭidanduṃ para-vanitege sôltandum itt artthig ill end |
eraḍam mâtâḍidanduṃ bhaya-vasade śaraṇ-bokkaraṃ kâyadanduṃ ǁ
nuḍi Kanakâdriyoḷ kaḍasid akkarav aṇmu madêbha-vairiyoḷ |
maḍagida bayke dânam amarâvanijâtada jauvvanaṃ dhanaṃ |
baḍavana bayta .... stu kalushaṃ praḷayânaḷan-êlgey-andaṃ en- |
daḍe baḷik ênan endape mahônnatiyaṃ vibhu-Sarvva-Dêvanaṃ ǁ
anupama-Lakshmiy id enisuva- | vanite mahâ-satiyoroḷage Sântala-Dêvi ǁ
atuḷa-baḷan osedu puṭṭida- | n atiśayam âg eseva Sôvi-Dêva-kumâraṃ ǁ
śvaran udayisal udayisidudu | siri sale nile Sarvva-Dêvan-anvayak ella ǁ
râmaṃ vâra-vadhû-jana- | Kâmaṃ saṅgrâma-raṅgad eḍeyoḷu Bhîmaṃ ǁ
tanag ishṭaṃ daivam Îśaṃ pored-adhipati Châḷukya-chakrêśvaraṃ saj- |
jana-vandyaṃ Nâgavarmmaṃ janakan amaḷe-tây Nâgiyakkaṃ jagat-pâ- |
vana-rûpaṃ Vâmadêva-brati guruv anujaṃ Râyanuṃ Biddanuṃ pu- |
tran udâttaṃ Sôvi-Dêvaṃ sujanare sakhar êṃ dhanyanô Sarvva-Dêvaṃ ǁ
durita-haraṃ mâḍuva sad- | guru-kuḷamaṃ bhaktiyindam esadire pêḷveṃ ǁ
śvara-dêvaṃ tapad aṅkakâr̤an amaḷam nishṭhâ-paraṃ paṇḍitâ- |
bharaṇaṃ dêvara dêvan Îśvarana pâdârâdhakaṃ dhârmmikaṃ ǁ
taḷedirpp î-Tripurântakakke tiḷakaṃ matt ante nôrppâga poṅ- |
gaḷasaṃ tân enisalke mâḍisidan î-Sarvvêśvarâvâsamaṃ ǁ
eḷeg ellaṃ Bali-râjadhâni nayanakk ânandam end Indran î- |
poḷalaṃ nôḍutam irdd ad illiye vimânaṃ nindud embantir i- |
idu lôkottaram embinam negarda Valligrâmadoḷ Mêru tân |
idu Kaiḷâsam id embinaṃ dharegav âkâsakkav ûḍiṭṭan int |
idan Ambhôja-jan embinaṃ jana-nutaṃ śrî-Sarvva-Dêvaṃ manô- |

div.p:
samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyaka sishṭê-
shṭa-phaḷa-pradâyaka dvija-kuḷa-payônidhi-kaḷâdhara guṇa-ratna-Rôhaṇa-mahîdhara sajjanâbha-
raṇa pati-kâryya-samuddharaṇa svâmi-manô-rañjanan ahita-mada-bhañjana nayâgamâchâ-
ryyan achaḷita-dhairya nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîmad-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Sarvva-Dêvarasaru
śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 21 neya Dhâtu-samvatsarada Pushya-śu 5 Âdivârad-andin-utta-
râyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtad andu râjadhâni-Baḷḷigrâmeyoḷu tanna mâdisida śrîmat-Sarvêśvara-
dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ nivêdyakkav alliya tapôdhanar-asanâchchhâdanakkaṃ pradhâna-samêtaṃ
chakravarttige binnapaṃ geydu Pâramêśvara-dattiyâgi taḷa-vittiyoḷu Baḷḷiya-bayaloḷu gadde
matta 1 Nâgarikhaṇḍa 70 r̤a baḷiya bâḍa Hâruvadeppamaṃ yama – niyama – svâdhyâya-dhyâna-
dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar appa śrîmat-Varêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvara
kâlaṃ karchchi dhâra-pûrvvaka sarva-namaśyamâgi biṭṭar int î-dharmmaman âvan orvvaṃ
pratipâḷisidavaṃ Kurukshêtradoḷaṃ Vâraṇâsiyoḷaṃ Prayâgeyoḷav Argghyatîrtthadolaṃ sâsira-
kaviḷeyaṃ kôḍuṃ koḷagumaṃ pañcha-ratnagaḷoḷu kaṭṭisi sâsira-vêda-pâragar appa Brahmaṇargg
ubhaya-mukhi-goṭṭa puṇyaman eydugum idan aḷidavan â-puṇya-tîrtthaṅgaloḷ anitu kavileyu-
maṃ anibar-Brâhmaṇaruman aḷida-pâtakaman eydugu ǁ (usual final verses).

div.head:
115
In the same place, on a second stone.
div.p:
svasti samadhiga ...... mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaram Koḷâla-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Pad-
mâvatî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ râjâdhirâja Permmâḍi-Dêvaṃ svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikramada
27 neya Chitrabhânu-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-bahuḷa-pâḍyamî-Sômavâradandu Vaḍêra Êcharasaṃ
bîḍiṅge dâḷiy iṭṭoḍe Yiragarasana baṇṭa Âlaṅgoṇṭe-sâsirake .... puṭṭida Mallayya Kariyaya-
Nâyakaṃ Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ bill-aṅka-kâr̤aṃ â-nâyakan-aḷiyaṃ Bibaya-Nâya-
kaṃ paḍe-mechche-gaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi – gaṇḍaṃ maṅgaḷad-âyamaṃ bêḍikoṇḍu Hâruvana-
haḷḷiyuvaṃ Kêdâramaṃ muttida Bêḍar-Aybarsanoḷ kâdi taḷt iridu sura-lôka-praptan âdaṃ ǁ

div.head:
116
On a stone in the same maṭha.
div.p:
Târaṇa-saṃvatsarada Mârgasira – suda – pañchamiyalu Âdapa-Nâyakanaiyanavara kâryake
kartarâda Liṅgarasaiyanavara Krishnayyanu Karuvagala .. yage koṭṭa hola .........

div.head:
117
On copper plates of the same maṭha.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters.)

lg.l: tasmât pûrvva-mahîdhrâd ravir iva bhûpô babhûva Ravivarmâ |
dṛiptô’dyâpi chatush-padô vrisha-varaḥ svairaṃ parikrâmati ǁ
yasyaudâryaṃ pathi pathi tathâ pattanê pattanê’smin
grâmê grâmê diśi diśi sadâ vandinô varṇayanti ǁ
chaṇḍâmśôḥ kati śîtagôḥ kati kati svarṇâchalât katy athô
nô chêd asya kathaṃ bhavanti vimalâs tat-tad-guṇânâṃ gaṇâḥ ǁ
tâḍitâḥ pratigarjanti nissâṇâ mûrchhitâ dvishaḥ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha- (IIa) mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Banavâsî-pura-varâdhîśva-
raṃ Jayantî-srî-Madhukêśvara-dêva-labdha-vara-prasâda samasta-kula-mahîdhara-chakra-chakra-
varti-Himavad-girîndra-rundra-taḷa-sthâpita-nija-yaśôdyach-chandraśiḷâ – jaya-stambhanuṃ Kâ-
damba-kula-kamala-mârtaṇḍanuṃ para-nṛipati-makuṭa-ghaṭṭita-charaṇâravinda-yugaḷanuṃ per-
maṭṭi-tûrya-nirghôshaṇanuṃ Śâkhâcharêndra-dhvaja – virâjamâna-manôttuṅga-siṃha – lâñchha-
nanuṃ chaturâśîti-nagarâdhishṭhita-nijâmâtya-sârthanuṃ anêkâśvamêdhâva-bhṛita-jalâvagâha-
pavitra-gâtranuṃ Ajjâ-dêvî-labdha-[va]ra-prasâdanuṃ satya-ratnâkaraṃ vairimada-bhañjananuṃ
śaraṇâgata-vraja-pañjara kaligaḷa-aṅkuśêty-âdi-namâvaḷî-virâjitaḥ srî-vîra-Sôma-bhûmipatiḥ Bana
vâsî-dêśa-pramukhâkhiḷa-dharaṇî-talaṃ nishkaṇṭakaṃ pâlayan dharma-sachivair dharma-
kathâṃ śṛiṇvann êkadâgrahâra-karaṇênâtmanô janma saphalaṃ kartum ichchhan Viḷambi-saṃ
vatsarasy-Âshâḍha-kṛishṅa-pakshâmâvâsyâyâṃ tithau Sômavâra-yuktâyâṃ sûrya-grahaṇê Hanni-
haḷḷi-kampaṇâlañkâra-bhûtaṃ Kelliguṇḍâbhidhânaṃ grâmôttamaṃ Kuppaṭûru-Paṇañjê-Geḍeya-
Piriya-Kelligôḍ-iti-grâma-chatushṭaya-madhyavartinaṃ Sênavaḷḷi-Kâchchhavi-Mâvinahaḷḷîti pallî-
traya-yutaṃ nidhi-nikshêpâshṭa-bhâga-têjas-svâmyâdi-sakala-vishayôpêtam anaṅguli-prêkshaṇî-
yaṃ sarvanamasyaṃ nânâ-gôtrêbhyaḥ sapta-shashṭi-saṅkhyâkêbhyô Brahmaṇêbhyô hiraṇyô-
daka-dhârâ-pûrvakaṃ dattavân | (here follow names, &c., of donees) Siddhêśvarasyaikâ vṛittiḥ
vêda-śâstrayôḥ pratyêkam êkaikâ vrittiḥ êvam êkôna-saptati-vṛittiḥ mahâjanaiḥ (r)ûroḍe-Râgha-
vâya śâsanârthaṃ viṃśati-kamba-saṅkhyâkâ punas sva-prayôjanârthaṃ daśa-kamba-saṅkhyâkâ
bhûmir dhârâ-pûrbbaka-dattâ ǁ atha tasya grâmasya sîmâ-nirṇayaḥ kriyatê (here follow details of
boundaries).

lg.l: dânaṃ vâ pâlanaṃ vâpi dânâch chhrêyô’nupâlanaṃ |
dânât svargam avâpnôti pâlanâd achyutaṃ padaṃ ǁ
sva-dattâṃ para-dattâṃ vâ yô harêta vasundharâṃ |
gâm êkâṃ ratnikâm êkâṃ bhûmêr apy êkam aṅgulaṃ |
haran narakam âpnôti yâvad â-bhûta-samplavaṃ ǁ
na vishaṃ visham ity âhur brahmasvaṃ visham uchyatê |
visham êkakinaṃ hanti brahmasvaṃ putra-pautrakaṃ ǁ

div.head:
118
On a stone to the right of the door-way of the Sômêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ srî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâ-bharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêva-vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salluttam ire ǁ

lg.l: hava-jayadoḷ guṇônnatiyoḷ Âhavamallanoḷ âṃ samânav em- |
b avanipan êṃ Yayâtiyô Bhagîrthanô Purukutsanô Purû- |
ravano Dilîpanô Bharatanô Naḷanô Nahushâvanîśanô ǁ
er̤agada vîrad añjad adaṭar śśaraṇ-ennada-râyar endud an- |
t ir̤ad aṭavîśvarar jJavana bârige vôgada yuddha-lâlasar |
mmar̤e-vugad aṅkachêyar iḷid ôḍada durggada gaṇḍar aḷki beḷu- |
kur̤ada madândhar ill idu parâkramam Âhavamalla-dêvana ǁ
kshaṇadiṃ Mâḷavam êḷum eyde viḷayakk eydittu sandirda-Koṅ- |
kaṇav êḷuṃ Maley êḷum añji besekeydatt ôvad ânt âhavâṅ- |
graṇigaḷ kappaman ittar ên adaṭanô Traiḷôkyamallâdhipaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîmad-anâdi-paṭṭaṇaṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigrâmeya paṭṭaṇa-madhyadoḷu śrî-
madu vaḍḍha-byavahâri Hâlikabbeya Sôvi-Seṭṭi Saka-varshada 976 neya Jaya-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-
bahuḷa-Aksheya-tritîyad Amâvâse-Âdivâra-nimittaṃ dharmma-chittar âgi liṅga-pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍiy
Abhinava-Sômêśvara-dêvarendu pesaran iṭṭ â-dêvara snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ nandâdîvigegav alliy âchâry-
yara grâsakkav endu biṭṭa taḷa-vritti Ar̤ekereya keḷagaṇa gadde Katsaviya-gaḷeyoḷu mattar eraḍu â-
kereyoḷagaṇa bhûmi gadde beddalu sahita mattaru nâlku â-bhûmige sîme mûḍalu Chandrêśvara-
dêvara bhumiyê mêre teṅkalu Beṇḍeya-ker̤eya teṅkaṇa-kôḍyiṃ paḍuva mundâgi parida-jala-pravâha-
vê mêre paḍuval Ar̤akere-yêriyê mêre baḍagalu Chaturmukha-dêvara bhûmiyê mêre Araker̤eya
keḷagaṇa-bhûmi mattar eraḍar̤a sîme mûḍalu Mûlasthânada dêvara tôṇṭada bhûmiyê mêre teṅkalu
Pañcha-liṅgada bhûmiyê mêre paḍuvalu Bhagavatî-dêviya bhûmiyê mêre baḍagalu ker̤ege biṭṭa bhûmi-
yê mêre â-ker̤eya baḍagaṇa-kôḍi-yêriya keḷagaṇa-pûdôṇṭav onduman â-dêvara teṅkaṇa kelada râja-
vîdhiyiṃ baḍagaṇ aṅgaḍigaḷumaṃ â-râja-vîdhiyiṃ teṅkaṇ-aṅgaḍigaḷa hindaṇa kêriy ondumaṃ Tamm-
ârâdhyar paṭṭaṇada mûliga Jñânaśiva-dêvara kalaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvaka sarvva-namśya-sarva-
bâdhâ-parihâram âgi biṭṭan â-dêvâlyaṃ kâla-kramadiṃ jîrṇṇav âgalu paṭṭaṇasâvi Mêchi-Seṭṭi Kîrtti-
Seṭṭiy aśêsha-nagara pañcha-maṭhaṃ hiriya-maṭhaṃ Bhêruṇḍêśvarad âchâryyaṃ Mûliga-Madukêśvara-
paṇḍita-dêvaruṃ Pañcha-liṅgad-âchâryya-Sarbbêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvaruṃ Tripurântakad-âchâryya Jñâna-
śakti-dêvaruṃ . var int inimbara sannidhânadalu samasta-mummuri-daṇḍamuṃ nânâ-dêsi-byavahâriga-
ḷuṃ Maṇigâr̤a-Mahâdêva-Seṭṭi int inibaruṃ tamma dharmmav âgi kaikoṇḍu Gavar̤êśvara-dêvar endu
pesaran iṭṭu jîrṇṇôddhâramaṃ mâḍid aynûrvvara praśasti svasti samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta-pañcha-śata-
vîra-śâsana-labdhânêka—guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkṛita—satya—śauchâchâra—châru—charitra—naya—vinaya—vijñâna-
vîra-Baṇañju-dharmma-pratipâḷa-viśuddha-guḍḍa-dhvaja—virâjamâna-mânânûna-sâhasa-lakshmy—âliṅ-
gita-vakshasthaḷa—bhuvana—parâkramônnataruṃ Vâsudêva-Khaṇḍaḷi—Mûḷabhadra—vaṃśôdbhavaruṃ
Bhagavatî-labdha-vara-prasâdaruṃ dvâtriṃśadu-vêḷômarav ashṭâdaśa-paṭṭaṇaṅgaḷu chaushashṭhi-
yôga-pîṭhamuṃ chatur-ddiśey-âśrama-nânâ-dêśa-bhramântukaravargge puṭṭiyuṃ Kṛita-yuga-Trête-
Dvâpara-Kali-yugaṃ modal âge Brahma-Vishṇu-Mahêśvararavara mataṃ prithviye hasumbey âge
ashṭa-lôka-pâlakarê gôṇṭâge Vasugiyê baḷâs âge phaṇi-kulaṅgaḷê dârav âgi bokkaṇa voḷa-vasumbey
âgi chakramê beḷav âgi kûr-asiye mara-surigey âge hasumbeyoḷ amûlya-vastugaḷê vastugaḷ âgi
Chêra-Chôḷa-Pâṇḍya-Maleya-Magadha-Kauśaḷa-Saurâshṭra-Dhanushṭra-Kurumbha-Kâṃbhôja—Gaulla-
Lâḷa-Barvvara-Pârasa-Nêpâḷa—Êkapâda-Lambakarṇṇa-Strî-râjya-Ghôḷâmukham emba nânâ-dê-
śaṅgaḷolaṃ grâma-nagara-khêḍa-kharvvaḍa-maḍamba-paṭṭaṇa-drôṇâmukha-saṃvâhanav emba digu-
danti-paṭṭaṇaṅgalaṃ pâda-mârgga-jala-mârggadoḷu shaṭ-khaṇḍa-maṇḍaḷaṅga ḷaṃ pokkku pokku bhadra-
hasti-jâtyaśva-indranîla-chandrakânta-muttu-mâṇikya—vajra—vaiḍûryya—gômêdhika—pushyarâga—pad-
marâga-pavaḷa-marakata-karkkêtana—nânâ—vastuṅgaḷuman êlâ-lavaṅgav-agaru-chandana-karppûra-
kastûri-kuṅkuma-malegajâdi—sugandha-dravyaṅgaḷumaṃ pêr̤iyuṃ mâr̤iyuṃ pegaloḷ ântu suṅka-
chchhâyamumaṃ kiḍisi chakravarttiya suvarṇṇa-bhaṇḍâramumaṃ mâṇikya-bhaṇḍâramumaṃ
paṭṭisa-bhaṇḍâramumaṃ tekkane tîvi mikkudar̤oḷu chatus-samaya-shaḍu-darśana-viśishṭa-vidagdha-
paṇḍita-muni-janaṅgaḷge nityaṃ bese-keyyuttaṃ avara parasida-âśîrvvâda-śata-sahasra-vacha-
naṅgaḷaṃ taleyoḷ ântu kaykoḷuttaṃ Mahâdêvaruman ishṭâ-dêvarum âgi bagedu dhammârtha-kâma-
bhôgaṅgaḷma mahâ-sukhadin anubhavisutta gârddapa-mahishâvâhaka-chêḷâbharaṇa-bhûshitar
appa eṇṭuṃ nâḍa padinar̤uvaruṃ gavar̤egaḷuṃ gâtrigaruṃ seṭṭiyaruṃ seṭṭiguttaruṃ aṅkakâr̤a-
ruṃ bîraruṃ bîravaṇigaruṃ gandigaruṃ gâvuṇḍaruṃ gâvuṇḍa-svâmigaḷu entu baluṅke-daṇḍa-
hastaruṃ âneyê bhêriy âgi bhêriyê maddaḷey âgi beḷu-goḍegaḷê neḷal âgi mahâ-samudramê nîr-
gârigey âgi Indranê karagarvaḷan âgi Varuṇanê gaḷeviḍivan âgi Dhanadanê bhaṇḍârigan âgi nava-
grahaṅgaḷê kaṅkaṇav âgi Râhuvê toṅgal âge Kêtuvê surigey âgi Kuḷikanê money âgi chandrâdityark-
kaḷê beṃbalav âgi muvattu-mû-dêvarkaḷê nôṭakarkaḷ agi kshamey emba bâḷaṃ kirttu krôdha-śatruv
emba hagevanan ir̤idu kâdi gelda bhaṭariya makkaḷa ḍavaruga para-nirghghôshaṇarum appa śrîmad-
Aiyyâvoḷey-ainûrvvar-svâmigaḷu tammaḷ oḷḷidaruṃ nirmmaḷa-têjaruṃ têja-têjôttuṅgaruṃ satyadalu
Gâṅgêyar-annaruṃ chaladalu Duryyôdhanan-annaruṃ dôr-vvaladalu Bhîmasênan-annaruṃ âneyentey
aṭṭi koluvaruṃ hasavinante nindu koluvaruṃ hâvinante vishade koluvaruṃ siṃhadante sîrddu
koluvaruṃ Bṛihaspatiyante buddhimantaruṃ Nârâyaṇanant upâya-karttâraruṃ Nârada-ṛishiyante
kalaha-sampûrṇṇaruṃ bendêri mirttu-garavaruṃ hôha-Mâriya challavâḍuvaruṃ baha-Mâriyan idir-
ggoḷuvaruṃ huṭṭirda-huliyaṃ keṇakuvaruṃ hariva bhaṇḍiya kâlaṃ kâvaruṃ kesaraṃ kichchiḍu-
varuṃ maṇala saraviyaṃ posavaruṃ siḍilaṃ piḍidu tôrpparuṃ chandrâdityarkaḷaṃ neḷak iḷihu-
varuṃ Îśvara-bhaṭṭârakana nôsala-kaṇṇu chatur-bhujamumaṃ Brahmar-aṭṭahâsamumaṃ Bhagavatig
unmathamumam appa traiḷôkya-vâkya-vachanaṅgaḷmaṃ sâdisuva-sâdhakanante traiḷôkyamaṃ
sâdisuva-Guḍḍa-śâstrad avayava-lakshaṇaṅgaḷan ar̤idu nuḍiv aṅgaḍi-vandirggaḷmaṃ dese-masagi
bappa pasumbegaṃ kaṇa-par̤ida-karttegaṃ muridu birdda peṇakkaṃ sûr̤evôda-bhaṇḍakkaṃ ettida-
nettara-kûregaṃ paṭṭa-pâḷakkaṃ pâyda-bêligaṃ mor̤ey emba śabdakkaṃ sameya-dharmmakka
kûḍida-saṅghâtakkaṃ mâḍida-byavasthegaṃ tappuvar allaru toṅgalinante pagevana taleyaṃ koṇḍu
paṭṭigeyante pagevana hastavaṃ kaṭṭi mer̤evaruṃ paṇavan ollaru peṇakke nallar svasti samasta-
praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-Ayyâvoḷey-aynûrvva-svâmigaḷge sâshṭâṅgav er̤agi poḍavaṭṭu ikku hasumbe-
yaṃ nîḍu sasiyaṃ kuḍu seṭṭi śrîmad-Ayyâvoḷey-aynûrvva-svâmigaḷge taḷige-dambulamaṃ hoyi jaya-
maṅgaḷamaṃ ǁ

svasty anavarata-paramôtsâhigaḷ enipa śrîmad-Aynûrvvaruṃ paṭṭaṇasâvi-Mêchi-Seṭṭi-Kîrtti-Seṭṭi-
mukhyav aśêsha-nagaraṅgaḷuṃ Gavarêśvara-dêvara aṅga-bhôgakkav alliya khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇô-
ddhârakaṃ koṭṭa-dharmmâyaṃ śrî-nagaraṅgaḷ-aṅgaḍigaḷalu varshakke pratyêka vîsaṃ hattu chinna-
geyikada byavahârigaḷu pratyêka varshakke vîsaṃ hattu sthaḷada gavar̤egaḷu varshakke hasumbege
paṇav ondu nânâ-dêśi-gavar̤egaḷu varshakke hasuṃbege hâgav ondu karppûra-kastûri-kuṅkuma-śrî-
khaṇḍaṃ mutt-oḷagâgi samasta-tûkada-bhaṇḍav anitakkaṃ poṅge kâṇi eraḍu sthaḷada dûsiga-vyavahâ-
rigaḷaluṃ nânâ-dêsi-dûsîga-vyavahârigaḷaluṃ poṅge kâṇi eraḍu meḷasu-jîrige-sâsavi-sadahuge-vôva-
kottumbaliy-oḷagâgi poṅge vîsav ondu sakhkhare-yiṇgu-suṇṭhi-hippali-êleyakiy allav arisina nâru bêru
samasta-tûkada bhaṇḍakke poṅge vîsa ondu hejjuṅka vaḍḍa-râvuḷake naḍava daṇḍanâyakaru hattak
ondu hêrina suṅkavaṃ biṭṭu koṭṭaru sthaḷada hêr̤uva Baṇañjigaru horagaṇiṃ banda samasta-Baṇañji-
garuṃ hêriṅge mâna vondu mâlagâr̤a nâlvatt-okalalu tamma karaṇḍagegaḷalu pratyêka hûvina sarav
ondu tambuliga sâsirbbaralu Chaitra-pavitrada parvva-biyakke vokkalalu ele sâyirav onduṃ telligar-
aivatt-okkalaluṃ dêvara nandâdîvigege gâṇaṅgaḷalu pratyêka eṇṇe soṇṭige vondu Jiḍḍuḷige-yeppat-
tara manneya Ekkalarasaṃ mukhyav âgi naḷ-prabhu Chiṭṭavûra Kâḷa-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ (others named)
samasta-prabhu-gâvuṇḍugaḷuṃ taṃ-tamm-ûralu varshaṃ-prati dêvarige koṭṭa paṇav aydu Nâgarakhaṇ-
ḍav-eppattara manneya Sôvi-dêva-mukhya Koṇavattiya Prithivî-Seṭṭiyaṃ (others named) samasta-
prabhu-gâvuṇḍugaḷuṃ tam-tamm-ûralu varshaṃ-prati dêvargge koṭṭa-paṇav aydu Eḍenâḍ-eppattara
manneyaṃ Sôvarasa-Praṇamarasa-mukhyav âgiy agrahâraṃ Eleseya mahâjanaṅgaḷuṃ Kuppageḍeya
mahâjanaṅgaḷuṃ Osavûra-Bhîva-Gavuṇḍanuṃ (others named) antu samasta-prabhu-gâvuṇḍugaḷuṃ
varshakka ûr-ûralu paṇav aydaṃ koṭṭaru (further grants) priyadin âr orbbar î-dharma-
maṃ pratipâḷipar avarggaḷu Kuru-kshêtradoḷu Gayeyoḷu Gaṅgeyoḷu Vâraṇâsiyoḷ Arghyatîrtthadoḷu
vêda-śâstra-prayukta-ṇiyama-nishṭhita-vipra-kôṭige kôṭi-kavileyaṃ vidhiyind ubhaya-mukhiyaṃ bayasi
kuḍuvêrppa puṇyatithiyoḷ itta puṇya-phaḷamaṃ paḍevar sandêham uṇṭe (usual final verses).

lg.l: vanê vana-tarûn agnir ddahan mûlâni rakshati |
* So in the original. kulaṃ sandahati saha-mûlaṃ vinaśyati ǁ

div.p:
Hiriya-maṭhad âchâryya Mûliga-Madhukêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvaruv avara putra Dharmmaśiva-dêvaruṃ
tamma Mûlasthâna-dêvara kêriyoḷage paḍuvaṇa-kêriyalli Maṇigâr̤a Mahâdêvi-Seṭṭiyarige hattu-
kaiyya maney ondu | teṅkaṇa kêriyalli Maṇigâr̤a-Lakmi-Seṭṭiyarige hattu-kaiyya maney onduvaṃ
sarva-namaśyav â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ salvant âgi koṭṭar ǁ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Ekkal-
arasana daṇḍanâyaka-Kâmarasaṃ śrî-Gavar̤êśvara-dêvarge koḍavîsadalli biṭṭa ettu hattu ǁ
ôṃ namaś Śivâbhyâṃ sânucharâbhyâṃ ǁ
Gaṇêśvaraṃ namaḥ ǁ

lg.l: vyômâvâsaṃ Trimürttîśvarara vara-guṇaṃ trai-jagat-kâryyav ant â- |
vyômâdhîśaṃ Mahêśaṃ kuḍug abhimatamaṃ Kêsirâjaṅge nichcha ǁ
â-jagadalli martya-bhuvanaṃ kaḍu rayyav adarkke saṃ- |
bhrâjitav â-vasundhareyuvaṃ Mayan uydaḍe tanda Vishṇuvôl |
râjita-chakravartti vibhu Bijjaṇa-Dêvanê tâḷdan artthiyiṃ ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ â-samasta-bhuvana-bhavanâśry a śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ | mahârâjâdhirâja | paramêśvaraṃ |
parama-bhaṭṭâraka | Kaḷachuryya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa | kadana-prachaṇḍa | mâna-Kanakâchaḷa |
subhaṭar-âditya | kaligaḷ-aṅkuśa | gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vraja-pañjara | pratâpa-Laṅkêśvara | para-
nârî-sahôdara | Śanivâra-siddhi | Giridurga-malla | chalad-aṅka-Râma | vairîbha kaṇṭhîrava | Niśśaṅka-
mallâdi-samasta-guṇa-nâmaṅgaḷ ellaṃ yathârttha-nâmaṅgaḷ âda śrîmad-Bijjaṇa-Dêvaṃ pṛithvî-vaḷaya-
man âḷdan ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: pṛithvî yâ Pruthunâ purâ chirataraṃ mûḍhêna gôtvaṃ gatâ
ratnaṃ dêva tathaiva bhâti bhuvanê vêḷâdhipâdhasthaḷê
Vishṇôr vvakshasi kaustubhaṃ nṛipa-vara-prauḍhêna sâ ślâghatâ ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ â-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti-tanûjaṃ | manuja-Manôjaṃ | râjâdhirâja | râja-mârttaṇḍaṃ |
kadana-prachaṇḍa | mṛigamadâmôda | vitaraṇa-vinôdaṃ râya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêvaṃ vasudhâtaḷam
ellamaṃ sukhadin âḷd ire ǁ

lg.l: mallaṃ dhâtrîśan âgi sukhadind irdda ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ â-râja-chakrêśva[ra]na râjya-pradhâna-śaktigaḷe mahâ-pradhânar âdar avara svabhâva-sâ-
martthyam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: ayi Lakshmaṇa-daṇḍêśa pṛithvî tvayy êva râgiṇî ǁ
châru-sitâbjam endu kalahaṃsa-kulaṃ bisa-kâṇḍam endu sañ- |
chârisi lôkamaṃ nagisuguṃ vibhu Rêchaṇa-daṇḍanâthana ǁ
daratege Dharmma-nandanane muṃ toṇeyappaḍ adakkuv alladâ- |
dorey enal âro Sôvaṇa-chamûpatiyant ir iḷâ-taḷâgradoḷ ǁ
misuguva pâl-gaḍal jasaman âḷdavol enduv aḷamba-pempu-ve- |
tt esadan iḷâ-taḷâgradoḷ aṇaṃ vibhu Kâvaṇa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ ant anêka-guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkṛita-mahâ-pradhânar-sahitaṃ śrîmad-Âhavamalla-mahîpâḷakaṃ
śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sakala-guṇâdhânaṃ Bhâradvâja-gôtra-pavitraṃ | Kêśava-dêva-Pampâmbikâ-
pautraṃ | Hoḷalamarasa-Durggâmbikâ-putraṃ | Lakhmâ-dêvî-manô-nayana-vallabhaṃ | bhaya-lôbha-dur-
labhaṃ | kadana-Triṇêtraṃ | vibudha-jana-mitraṃ | purâtanâmâtya-charitraṃ | sakala-guṇa-pâtraṃ |
samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta-sênâpati bâhattara-niyôgâdhishṭhâyakaṃ | sakaḷa-
lakshmî-nâyakaṃ vairi-bhaya-dâyakan emb î-biruda-guṇa-nâma-yathârttha śrîmat-Kêśimayya-daṇḍa-
nâyakanaṃ karadu dakshiṇa dig-bhâgada bhaṇḍâravâḍa-dêśamaṃ bappanane dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-
pratipâḷanaṃ mâḷpud endu Banavase-nâḍaṃ koḍal mahâ-prasâdam endu kaykoṇḍa-mahâmâtyana
mahad-guṇaṅgaḷ ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: tanag aḷavaṭṭa nîtiye parârtthame tanna bhujârjjitârtthav â- |
ḷdana mahimônnatitvame nijônnatiy âśrita-tushṭi tannad end |
enipa negaḷteyinde sale jîvise Kêśava-daṇḍanâyakaṃ ǁ
malevavar illa gaṇḍ-esavar ill idir-appavar illa têjav end |
ulivavar illa ṭaṇṭaṇipar ill ur̤id-irppavar illa kâydu band |
alevavar illa tanna birud allade kabbada gîtadalli mâr- |

div.p: va ǁ tan-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Kṛishṇa-Kêśava-dêva-daṇḍanâthana sachivôttamar ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: kal mâṇikadantuṭ endaḍ ent ante diṭaṃ ǁ
barav adu mêṇ alladirddan âdaḍav ant â- |
baravaṃ bârisuvan endum êṃ Bâchayya ǁ
pratatiye tân enisi tôruvaṃ Châmayyaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ mattav â-râjâdhirâja-pradhânântaḥkaraṇa-rûpar appa karaṇaṅgaḷa mahatvamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: śvara-pada-bhakti-lôlar enipar kkaraṇaṅgaḷ ad entu nôḷpaḍaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ antum alladeyuṃ Lakshmi-dêva-daṇḍanâthana râjad-râja-têjô-rûpar appa Hiriya-Viṭṭarasa-
nuṃ | Chaṇḍugi-dêva-daṇḍanâyaka-prachaṇḍa-dôr-ddaṇḍa-svarûpanuṃ | Vâji-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ | Bhâradvâja-
gôtra-pavitraṃ | Iṭṭigeya-Duggi-Śeṭṭi-priya-putraṃ | Dêsiya-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Chikka-Viṭṭharasanuṃ | vasu-
dhaika-bândhava Rêchaṇaiya-daṇḍanâyakara châru-châritryad antir oppuvaṃ yôdhṛi-tantrâdhishṭhâya-
ka-Kêśava-dêvanuṃ | Sôvaṇaiya-daṇḍanâyaka-râjya-lakshmî-tanûjan enisida Kâvaṇaiya-Nâyakaruṃ Kâ-
vaṇaiya-daṇḍanâyakara prachaṇḍa-kôdaṇḍa-kâṇḍa-rêchanad antir oppuva Rêchaṇaiya-Nâyakanum
enisida râjâdhyaksha-sahitaṃ samasta-pradhânariṃ parivṛitan âgi | tri-bhuvana-vibhavêndraṃ | śîtaḷa-
chandraṃ Banavase-pannirchchhâsiramuman antaḥ-pravishṭav appa Hayve-Sântaḷige-Yeḍedor̤e-pra-
mukha-dêśamaṃ sukha-sat-kathâ-vinôdadind âḷuttav irdda vaḍḍôlagada samayadoḷ dharmma-prasaṅga-
maṃ puṭṭisidan âtana nîti-châturyyamumaṃ purâtiśayamumaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: ene pempiṃ chalad-aṅka-Râman osedaṃ mûr̤uṃ-purâmâtyaka ǁ
Sarasati tôḍu pâsaṭi samaṃ guṇam uḷḷaḍav Arkka-sûnuv â- |
dorey ene Sâvi-dêva-sachivaṃ mudadiṃ nuḍidaṃ yathârtthavaṃ ǁ

div.p: purâtiśaya ǁ

lg.l: âksharikaṃ pogaḷal ar̤iyen âṃ Balipuramaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ adu-kâraṇav illi mattav ênânuṃ dharmmavaṃ mâḷpud endu hêḷal oḍane tad astuv endu śrîman-ma-
hâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tailaha-Dêvanuv avara bhâvan Er̤aharasanuṃ śrîmad-râjadhâni-Balipurada paṭṭa-
ṇa-svâmi Mâḷi-Seṭṭiyaruṃ paṭṭaṇa-svâmi Mêchi-Seṭṭiyaruṃ Pañcha-maṭha-Hiriya-maṭhad âchâryyar
Mûliga-Dharmmaśiva-dêvaruṃ Pañcha-liṅgad âchâryya Rudraśakti-dêvaruṃ Tripurântakad-âchâryya
Jñânaśakti-dêvaru pramukha-nagara-pañcha-maṭha-mûr̤uṃ-purada Saudore-herggaḍe Sâvi-dêvanuṃ
tat-pratihasta Chaṭeṇa-Tippaṇanuṃ | Kannarana karumâḍadoḷ emb ant ettisida jasad-atti-gaṇḍaruṃ |
Koṅkaṇamaṃ sâdhisi Vijayâdityanal kappamaṃ koṇḍa gaṇḍa-mârttaṇḍaruṃ | Malaparoḷ-gaṇḍaṃ
Hoysaḷa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaṅge santôshavaṃ mâḍi mannaṇeyaṃ haḍada janaika-mânyarum enisidar
antum alladeyuṃ ǁ

lg.l: śvara-pada-bhaktar âr̤u-samayaṅgaḷa sîme podaḷda nîtig â- |
karav enisirdda sach-charitar uddhata-satvar udagra-puṇyar â- |
darita-viśishṭar embud idu saṃstutiy altu Baṇañju-dharmmara ǁ

div.p:
int anêka-prakâradiṃ stûyamânar appa śrîmad-Ayyâvoḷe-Challuṅki-pramukhânêka-grâma-nagara-khêḍa-
kharvvaḍa-maḍamba-drôṇâmukha-pura-pattana-stha Lâḷa-Gauḷa-Karṇṇâṭa-Baṅgâḷa-Kâśmîrâdi-dig-dê-
śâvâsigaḷa ...... pp ubhaya-nânâ-dêśigaḷ anavarata-têjô-rûpar appa sthaḷa-purushar maṇigâra-Maha-
dêvi-Seṭṭi maṇigâra-Maili-Seṭṭi maṇigâr̤a-Padma-Seṭṭi maṇigâr̤a-Mâṇika-Seṭṭi Śiva-pâda-śêkhara-Mâri-
Śeṭṭi Sôvi-Seṭṭi Holli-Seṭṭi Sâḷige-Mâchi-Seṭṭiy oḷagâgi samasta-vaṇig-dhârmmikaruvaṃ mahanîya-
pa .. shadaṃ mâḍi svasti śrîmat-Kaḷachuryya-bhuja-baḷa-chakravarti vîra-Nârâyaṇ-Âhavamalla-Dêva-
varshada 3 neya Plava-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-bahuḷa 13 .. Âdivâra-saṅkramaṇa-vyatîpâtad andu | Baḷḷi-
gâveya Baṇañjigaralliya a-putrika-mṛitaka-dhanav ellaṃ śrîmat-Gavar̤êśvara-dêvara mâṭa ... di-dêva-
kâryyakke nagaradalliy a-putrika-dhanav appudu Nagarêśvara-dêvargge mattaṃ pañcha-maṭha mûr̤uṃ-
purav êluṃ Brahmapurigaḷal ellav all-alliya mṛi ...... nav appud all-alliya dêvarig endu śrîmad-Gavar̤-
êśvara-dêvara śrî-pâdadalli śrîmat-Kêśimayya-daṇḍanâyaka karaṇaṅgaḷ pradhânar taḷâra-sahita dhâre
.... sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâravâgi â-chandrârkka-târam-bara salvantâgi koṭṭan î-dharmmamaṃ nâḍ-arasu
gaḷuv adhikârigaḷu nagara-pañcha-maṭha mûr̤um-pura .................. ri-daṇḍaṅgaḷuṃ prati-
pâlisuvar ǁ î-dharmmaman âvan âgiyuv aḷidavaṃ arasiṅge râja-drôha nâḍiṅge samaya-drôha (usual
final phrases and verses).

div.head:
120
On a stone near the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyaṃ pravarttise
tat-pâda-pallavôpaśôbhitôttamâṅgaṃ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ
Banavâsi-pura-varêśvaraṃ Mahâlakshmî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ tyâga-vinôdam âyad-âchâryyan a-
sahâya-śauryyaṃ gaṇḍara gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍaṃ mûr̤u-râyâsthâna-kali biruda-maṇḍaḷika-vṛisha-
bha-Śaṅkaraṃ kaligaḷa mogada kayi birudar-âdityaṃ pratyaksha-Vikramâditya jagad-êka-dâni-nâ-
mâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Châ .. ṇḍa-Râyarasar Banavâsi-pannir-
chchhâsiraman âḷuttaṃ iral râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya nelevîḍinoḷ Śaka-varsha 970 neya Sarvvadhâri-
saṃvatsarada Jyêshṭha-śuddha-trayôdaśî-Âdityavâradandu Jajâhuti-śrî-Śântinâtha-sambandhiy appa
Baḷagâr̤a-gaṇada Mêghanandi-bhaṭṭârakara śishyar appa Kêśavanandi-ashṭôpavâsi-bhaḷârara basadige
pûjâ-nimittadiṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ Jiḍḍuḷige 70 ra baḷiya râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya pulleya-bayaloḷ
bhêruṇḍa-gaḷeyoḷ koṭṭa gal̤de mattar aydu adara sîme (details of boundaries)

lg.l: gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa-sâdṛiśyô na bhûtô na bhavishyati ǁ

div.p: (usual final verses)

div.head:
122
On a vîrakal to the left of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa bhuja-baḷa prauḍha-pratâpa chakravarti śrî-Râmachandra-Râya-vijan
ya-râjyôdayada 14 neya Târaṇa-saṃvatsarada Vayiśâkha-suddha 10 lu śrîman-mâ-prabhu Dâyiga Che-
.... chalad-aṅka Mâdi-Seṭṭiya ...... mutti kâdidalli ........ y Âḷamêleyoḷ âne keḍahi taḷt ir̤idu .
.... sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
123
At the same village, on a stone in the way to Ânevaṭṭe.
div.p: śrî ôṃ namô Nârâyaṇâya ǁ

lg.l: dêvâḥ diśantu naḥ siddhiṃ Brahmêśâna-Janârddanâḥ ǁ
kshmâkîrṇṇâtma-karâgran enna-vol ivaṃ tân endu sânandadind |
â-kalpâyuvan îge Kêśava-chamûpaṅg âgaḷuṃ Kêśavaṃ ǁ
dyamadind irdd erddu viśvôjjanana-vidhige chittaṃ daral tanna sâma- |
rtthyame rûp âdante nâbhy-amburuhadin ogedaṃ chinmayaṃ Padmasadmaṃ
kramadiṃ tat-Padmajaṃ mâḍida sakaḷa-jagach-chakradoḷ nâḍeyuṃ ma- |
dhyama-lôkaṃ chelvan â-lôkadoḷav ati-manôhâriy âgirppud atyu- |
ttam enittânuṃ tad-urvvîtaḷadoḷav aniśaṃ Kuntaḷa-kshôṇi rayyaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ tat-Kuntaḷa-dharâtaḷâdhipatyaman tâḷdi ǁ
tat-kula-prabhavaṃ ǁ

lg.l: sipuv el̤ed uyda bhûtaḷaman eyde rasâtaḷadinde tanda ta- |
d-ripuva parâkramakke nija-vikramav irmmaḍiy âge Raṭṭari- |
nd apahṛitav âda viśva-dharaṇî-taḷamaṃ biḍad il̤dukoṇḍa Tai- |
lapa-nṛipan âdav uddharisidan dal atarkya-Chaḷukya-vaṃśamaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ tad-anantaraṃ ǁ

lg.l: taḷa-pâḷaṃ mattav alliṃ bal̤ike tad-anujâtâtmajan tâḷdidaṃ dôr- |
vvaḷa-dṛiptaṃ Vikramâṅkaṃ bal̤ika tad-anujaṃ tâḷdidaṃ châru-chandrô- |

div.p: va ǁ tat-kâladoḷ |

lg.l: dharaṇî-chakrakk adhishṭhânam id enisidud âtmîya-dôr-ddaṇḍam unma- |
tkara-karṇṇâkîrṇṇav âyt ujvaḷa-yaśav enipaṃ Bijjala-kshôṇipâḷaṃ ǁ
vasundharây emba vâkyam ene dhareyaṃ sâ- |

div.p:
va ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-râjâdhirâja Kâḷâñjara-pura-varâdhîśva ........
vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruga-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇa Kaḷachuryya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa kadana-pra-
chaṇḍa mâna-Kanakâchala subhaṭar-âditya kaligaḷ-aṅkuśa gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara
pratâpa ...... nârî-sahôdara Śanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla Chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhî-
rava niśśaṅka-malla-nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmat-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla-
Bijjala-Dêvarasara vijaya-râjya .... ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandra-târaṃ saluttam ire ǁ
va ǁ â-chamûnâtha-chûḍâmaṇi ..... vataraṇam ent endoḍe ǁ
va ǁ tad-vaṃśadoḷ anêka-viprôttama-pravartta ...... maṇadoḷ |

lg.l: ta-viḷâsaṃ Vâma-dêvaṃ jana-nutan enisirdd Êcha-daṇḍâdhipaṃ châ- |
dhavan â-Gôvindan âtmâśrita-bhudha-jana-varddhishṇu tâṃ Vishṇu-dêvaṃ ǁ
lad enal sat- sêvyan âdaṃ Hol̤alamarasan âtmânvayâmbhôdhi-chandraṃ ǁ
gâ-dêvi samantu barppaḷ oregaṃ doregaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ avar-irvvarggaṃ ǁ

lg.l: trada nevadinde tat-Kṛita-yugaṃ parivarttise tann atarkya-vâ- |
vada nevadinde vâsaradoḷaṃ parivarttise chandrikôtkaraṃ ǁ
indu-varaṃ nilalk ar̤idar illiye nindoḍe dâni Karṇṇan emb |
ondu negaḷteyaṃ negaḷalîvene Śûdrakan alte vîran emb |
ondu pogaḷteyaṃ poḍaralivene kemmage tappi hôda ma .... |
.. ndu manaṃ karaṃ kasar̤utirppudu Kêśava-daṇḍanâthana ǁ
pusiy altu bêḷparaṃ pu- | ṭṭisuva besaṃ Barmmanadu samant avaraṃ ra- |
kshisuva besaṃ tannadu gaḍa | nisadaṃ Kêśavan id ên udâttanô dhareyoḷ ǁ
kula-jâtaṃ dhanyan o .... nisida manujaṃ dhanyan âdaṃ vinôdakk |
oḷagâdaṃ vanyan âḷpâḷiyan anuvaradoḷ tôridâḷ dhanyan atyu- |
jvaḷa-kâruṇyâvalôkaṃ nelasida-kṛipaṇaṃ dhanyan end ande vidyâ- |
baḷadiṃ daṇḍâdhipaṃ Kêśavanan eradavaṃ nâḍeyuṃ dhanyan altê ǁ
kanamale sanda Sântaḷige korvvid agurvvina Tâgarachehe-ma- |
llana-nele Gâvaṭûr mMogala-nâl̤ Siriûr vVanavâsi-durggav u- |
rvvinav enisirdda Koṇḍaraṭe Haive negaḷteya Gutti Hettiḷaṃ ǁ
parimuktâkâran âdaṃ baḷikav avana durvvâra-vikrântamaṃ kê- |
sari kaṇḍ andind aḍaṅgitt avana bahaḷa-têjôṃśu-sandôhad ond-eḷ- |
taravaṃ kâṇutte nichchaṃ muguḷ-udayipan akshôbhanô vâsarêndraṃ ǁ
muni koṭṭ aḍag â-Dadhîchi koṭṭ elvugaḷ êṃ |
śva-ripûrvvîśvarar añji hutt aḍardu jîvaṃ bettoḍ emm-emma kâ- |
ntaran old int idu rakshisutt iduve dayvaṃ tân enutt â-vadhû- |
tkaradind âdudu huttan ûduva-kṛita-vyâpârav î-dhâtriyoḷ ǁ
hariyuṃ Śambhug ad entu Pârvvatiyuv ant â-Gaṅgeyuṃ strîyar â- |
dar enipp antire Kêśavaṅge nuta-Lakshmî-dêviyuṃ bhâgya-bhâ- |
surey app â-Siri-dêvi .. satiyar âdar llôka-saṃstutyeyar ǁ
tad-amâtyaṃ kirttivettaṃ dhareyoḷ anupamaṃ Dôṇarâjaṃ bhudhêshṭa- |
dese porddad udârav oḷpu kundada charitaṃ |

div.p: va ǁ mattaṃ tan-mahattararoḷ ǁ
râjâdhyakshada karaṇaṅgaḷ ǁ

va ǁ antu samasta-dharmmâdhyakshaṅgaḷuṃ râjâdhyakshaṅgaḷuv enisida karaṇaṅgaḷ-verasu śaraṇâ-
gata-rakshâmaṇiyuṃ nija-vaṃśa-chûḍâmaṇiyuv enisida daṇḍanâyaka-Kêśava-Dêvaṃ Banavâse-pannir-
chhâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ pâḷisuttaṃ râjadhâni-Balipuradoḷ irdd ondu-
divasav âsthâna-maṇḍaḷa-madhya-sthitanuṃ sakaḷa-pradhâna-parijana-pura-jana-parivṛitan âg irppu-
duṃ alliy uchitâvasarajñanum aśêsha-dharmmajñanum enisida ǁ

lg.l: tana tanayaṃ Śivaika-śaraṇaṃ vibhudhâgraṇi Chaṭṭi-râjan â- |
tana sati Mâdiyakkan avarg âtmabhavaṃ sukṛitârtthi Rêchaṇaṃ ǁ

div.p: tad-vâkyav ent endoḍe |

lg.l: idu dal nânâ-yuga-prasthitav idar̤oḷe munn âdi-daṇḍâdhipar mmâ- |
viditaṃ tân âdud âdaṃ Balipurav idu dharmmôdbhava-sthânav ent i- |
lli diṭaṃ śrî-Kêśava-sthâpanaman oḍarisalk akkuv atyanta-puṇyaṃ ǁ

div.p: mattaṃ |

lg.l: ḷôdayavaṃ mâl̤kuv endoḍ ên endapudô ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ adu-kâraṇadin illi bhavadîya-nâmâṅkitav enipa Kêśavapuramuman alli Vîra-Kêśava-dêva-dêvâyata-
namumaṃ nirmmisidoḍ aihikadoḷ amaḷa-kîrttiyu(ṃ)v âmutrikadoḷ akhiḷa-puṇya-pûrttiyuṃ pâramârtthi-
kadoḷ parama-sukha-sampattiyum akkum endu daṇḍanâtha-chûḍâmaṇiya manadoḷ irddudan abhinayi-
suvanante nuḍiyal adaṃ manadegoṇḍu daṇḍanâtha-chûḍâratnaṃ Balipuradakshiṇa-dig-vibhâ-
gadoḷ akhiḷa-dharmma-sasya—saṃvarddhana—bhûmiyuṃ samîhita-sakaḷa—phaḷa-samudaya-janma-
bhûmiyum enisid ativipuḷa-darppaṇa-samataḷa-bhûpradêśamaṃ śrî-Pâṇḍavara pratishṭheya Pañcha-
liṅgad âchâryya Sarvvêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvara herggaḍe-Sâyiyaṇana sênabôva-Kannaṇana mattam
avara samasta-parigrahada kayyoḷ seṭṭiyar-ppramukha-nagara-pañcha-maṭha-mûr̤uṃ-purada san-
nidhiyoḷ dhârâ-pûrvvakavagi paḍed â-manôhara-bhûpradêśadoḷ ǁ

lg.l: ttarisalvêr̤kuṃ dal end int idar̤oḷe paḍiyachchâgi mâḍiṭṭan emb ant |
ire chalvaṃ tâḷdi dṛiṅ-maṇḍanav enipa lasat-Kêśavâvâsamaṃ nir- |
bbhara-bhakti-bhrâjitaṃ mâḍisidan eseye daṇḍâdhipaṃ Kêśirâjaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ anantarav ati-prîtiyiṃ daṇḍanâtha-maṇi-maṇḍanaṃ tat-puravaramaṃ ǁ
antu mâḍe ǁ

lg.l: idu kṛita-kalpa-janma-niḷayaṃ diṭav int idu viśva-vêdad a- |

div.p: va ǁ anantaraṃ tat-purî-vṛitti-pradâna-nimittaṃ ǁ

va ǁ antu sakala-guṇâkaranuṃ Gaṅga-vaṃśa-vârddhi-varddhana-sudhâkaranuv enisid Ekkalarasanu-
maṃ tat-pradhâna-Kâmayyanumaṃ sandhi-vigrahi Mahadêvanumaṃ Jiḍḍuḷige-nâḍa samasta-prabhu-
gâvuṇḍagaḷuman oḍambaḍisiy avara kayyoḷu manneyav-âya-dâya-kir̤kuḷav ant anit[u]maṃ Beḷvaṇiya-
haḷḷige sarvvanamasyavâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ paḍed â-śrîmad-râjadhâni-Baḷipurada paṭṭaṇasâvi Kîrtti-
Seṭṭi-Mêchi-Seṭṭi-pramukha-samasta-nagara-janaṅgaḷa Pañcha-maṭhad âchâryya Dharmmaśiva-dêvara
Hiriya-maṭha-śrî-Jagadêkamallêśvarad âchâryya Mûliga-Madhukêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvara śrî-Pañcha-
liṅgad âchâryya Sarvêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvara mattam alliya herggaḍe-Sâyimarasana śrî-Tripurântakad
âchâryya Jñânaśakti-paṇḍita-dêvara mattam alliya herggaḍe Veṇṇamarasana śrî-Kôḍiya-maṭhad
âchâryya Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-dêvara mattav êḷuṃ-Brahmapurigaḷa sannidhiyoḷu samasta-dharmmô-
ddhârakaṃ mahâ-pradhânaṃ Kasapayya-Nâyakanan-anukûlateyoḷaṃ mahâ-pradhâna Banavase-nâḍa-
herggaḍe-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Kêśimayyaṃ karaṇa-samêtaṃ Śaka-varshaṃ 1080 neya Bahudhânya-
saṃvatchharada Pushyada puṇṇami-Sômavârav-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâta-sômagrahaṇad andu
śrîmat-Kêśavapurada śrî-Vîra-Kêśava-dêvara pûje-punaskâra-naivêdya-nandâdîvige-Chaitra-pavitra-
mâṭakûṭa-nava-karmmakkav â-Kêśavapurada yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânush-
ṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîla-sampannar aupâsanâgnihôtra-dvija-guru-dêvatâ-pûjâ-tatpararuṃ shaṭ-
tarkka-mîṃâṃsânêka-śâstra-viśâradaruṃ yajana-yâjanâdhyayanâdhyâpana-dâna-pratigraha-shaṭ-karm-
ma-nirataruv agnishṭômâdi-sapta-sôma-saṃsthâ-samavastitaruv anêka-purâṇa-smṛiti-mañjarî-bhâshya-
kâvya-nâṭaka-nânâ-chamatkâra-bhaṅgî-bhâshâ-vidagdha-kavi-gamaka-vâdi-vâgmi-vidvaj—jana—hṛida-
yâkṛishṭa-mantrâkshararuṃ pratipanna-śilâkshararu mârttaṇḍôjvala-kîrtti-yutaruv anêka-yajñâvabhṛi-
thâvagâhana-pavitrîkṛita-sakaḷa-maṅgaḷâspada-śarîrarum appa śrîmat-sarvva-namasyada Brahma-
puri-Kêśavapuradalli śrî-Jagadêkamallêśvara-dêvarige vṛittiy eraḍu Pañchaliṅga-dêvarige vṛittiy
eraḍu śrî-Kêdâra-dêvarige vṛittiy eraḍu Brâhmaṇarige vṛitti mûvatteṇṭu pûjâri-vṛitti ondu mâlagâr̤a-
vṛitti ondu antu vṛitti nâlvattâr̤akkaṃ sarvvanamasyada-haḷḷi Beḷuvaṇiyanu samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ
śrîmanu-maṇḍalêśvaraṃ Gaṅga-vaṃśa-vârddhi-varddhana-sudhâkaranuṃ sakaḷa-dharmmôddhâranuṃ
sakaḷa-guṇâspadanum appa Tailaha-Dêvarasanuṃ tarmma bhâva Eraharasanuṃ haḍavaḷa-Gaṅga-
ṇanu yirddu tamma boppaṃ Ekkalarasanuṃ mâḍida dharmmama punarddattiy âgi â-haḷḷiya man-
neya-âya-dâya-kâṇike-kir̤ukuḷa yinitumaṃ śrî-Kêshava-dêvara śrî-pâdadalu dhâre er̤adu biṭṭa-tri-
bhôgâbhyantara-siddhiy appudant âgi biṭṭa dharmmamanu śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Kêśimayya-
daṇḍanâyakaru tarmm-ârâdhyar appa yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-
japa samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannaruṃ vibudha-jana-prasannaruṃ sakaḷa-sukavi-nikurumbâdhâraruṃ
anna-dâna-suvarṇṇa-dâna-kanyâ-danâ-gôdâna-bhû-dânâbhaya-bhaiśajyânêka-dâna-vinôdaruṃ Lâkuḷâ-
gamâbharaṇaruṃ samasta-śâstrâgama-vichâra-châru-chaturaruṃ Gautama-muni-nandanaruṃ Bali-
pura-Dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakarum appa śrîmad-râja-guru-Vâma-
śakti-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭan â-sthaḷamumaṃ Brahmapurigaḷ-âraykeyu-
mam allige herggaḍe-Sâvimarasanû âyaṅge vumbaḷi Beḷvaṇiyalli maraguṇḍiya gaḷeyalu gardde mattaru
ondu śrî-Kêśava-dêvarige gardde mattaru ondu gavuḍikeyan uḷihi mêlâdudaṃ guru-dêvaruṃ hergga-
ḍeyuṃ mahâ-janakke harchchi-yikkuvaru yilli tam-tarmma-maneyalu yirddavarige vṛittiy uṇṭu yirada-
vara vṛitti dêvarige â-vṛittigaḷoḷage bhaṭṭa-vṛitti ondu khaṇḍika-vṛitti ondu agnishṭage-vṛitti ondu
pûjari-mâlagar̤a-vṛitti-sahita aydu-vṛittiyavaruṃ naḍadumbaru â-purada sîme ent entendaḍe mûḍalu
Hemmâḍiya basadiya keyya haḍuvaṇa nil-gallu mêre têṅkalu Bhagavatiya keyya baḍagaṇa-sîme
mêre haḍuvalu Pañchaliṅgada keyyi mêre baḍagalu Hemmâḍiya basadiya nela mêre â-dêvarige
taḷa-vṛittiyanu śrî-Kêdâra-dêvara haḷḷi Kir̤u-Baḷḷigâveyalu â-dêvarige pâda-pûjeyaṃ koṭṭukoṇḍu nivê-
dya-Chaitra-pavitrakkaṃ dêvar-agrâsanavâgi pravâsiga-Brâhmaṇar-ayvara grâsakkaṃ naḍuvantâgi
narapati-goḷada keḷage kachchhaviya gaḷeya gardde mattar ondu puradoḷage dêvara nandâdîvigege
gâṇa 1 ǁ mattam â-dêvarige | svasti śrîmat-Kal̤achuryya-chakravartti Nissaṅka-malla Saṅkama-Dêva-
varshada 3 neya Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Chaitrada puṇṇame-Sômavâra-Vishu-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâta-Sôma
grahaṇad-andu śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sênâdhipati Banavase-nâḍa herggaḍe daṇḍanâyakaṃ Kêśi-
râjayyaṅgal̤u ǁ

lg.l:
diśâ-nâgân atikramya
* So in the original. Hari-hâsôpahâsanât ǁ

div.p:
enisida Kêśirâja-daṇḍanayâkaṃ tanna mâḍisida śrî-Kêśava-dêvara pûje-punaskâra-naivêdya-nandâ-
dîvige-Chaitra-pavitra-mâṭakûta-nava-karmmakkaṃ dêvar-agrâsana—yippattu-manusya-pravâsiga-
Brâhmaṇara bhôjanakkav endu Nâgarakhaṇḍav-eppattoṛoḷagaṇa Karineleyaṃ munna Banda-
ṇikeya śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvarige biṭṭa haḷḷi Eḍeyalkaravaṃ kûḍi tir̤uttirddudaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇ-
ḍaḷêśvaraṃ Gupta-vaṃśa-vârddhi-varddhana-sudhâkaranuṃ śrî-Gaḷagêśvara-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-
padmârâdhakanuṃ para-baḷa-sâdhakanum appa Jôyi-Dêvarasanuṃ tat-pradhânaṃ Vâsudêva-Nâya-
kanuṃ â-Kûchayyanuṃ Dâsimarasanuṃ Susaṅga-dêvaruṃ śrîman-mahâ-manḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kaḍamba-
kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍanuṃ Jayantî-Madhukêśvara-dêvara labdha-vara-prasâdanuṃ husivara-śûla
nigaḷaṅka-malla-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmatu Boppa-dêvarasaruṃ tat-pradhânaṃ
Tikkayya-pramukha-samasta-parivâramuṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmantaṃ Saṅka-Gauḍa-pramukha-Nâ-
garakhanḍav-eppattaṛa prabhu-gâvuṇḍagaḷu sahitavâgi śrî-Kêśava-dêvara śrî-pâdadulu lailâḷike
manneyav âya dâya kiṛukuḷa kâṇike yint initumaṃ dhârey er̤adu Kêśava-dêvarigaṃ Sômanâtha-
dêvarigaṃ koṭṭaru alli huṭṭida-dhanavaṃ â-yeraḍu-dharmmakkaṃ samavâgi hachchi naḍasuvaru
(usual final phrases and verses).

Beḷvaṇiyal pûrvva Narapati-Śeṭṭiya basadige salutt irdda sarvva-namaśyada matta 2 horagâg
Kêśavapurakke ǁ śrîma (stops here)

div.head:
124
At the same place, on a stone near the Baḍagiyara-hoṇḍa.

lg.l: prastuta-Jinêndra-śâsanam astu chiraṃ bhadram akhiḷa-bhavya-janânâṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvar ǁ

lg.l: alagaṃ Chôḷâvanîśaṅg eṇasan aṇiyaraṃ Lâḷa-bhûpaṅge bâhâ- |
kuḷamaṃ tann êrid ugrêbhadin ur̤adar̤e beṅkoṇḍu Châḷukya-râjyô- |
Narasihmâkâradim Dânava-patiy-uramaṃ sîḷdan aṇm aṇmu Rudraṃ- |
beras â-Kaiḷâsamaṃ tûgidan-aḷav aḷav ârtt arttiyim charmmamaṃ ne- |
ṭṭ erad Indraṅg ittan-ârpp ârpp akhiḷa-dhare gata-kshatram appante dhâtrî- |
śaran irppattondu-sûḷ kondana chalame chalaṃ Vikramâditya ninna ǁ
puduv êk anyarggam ân orbbane taḷeyal idaṃ sâlven end â-mahâ-Kûr- |
dhadin â-bhûbhṛid-darî-mûḷadin akhila-dharâ bhâramaṃ tandu vikrâ- |
ntada balpiṃ tanna tôḷoḷ paduḷam irisidaṃ Vikramâdity-Dêvaṃ ǁ

div.p:
antu dhareyaṃ nishkaṇṭakaṃ mâḍi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadind Etagiriya nelevîḍinoḷ râjyaṃ gayy-
uttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati
mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ durjjana-bhaya-dâyakaṃ bandhu-jana-bandhura-kumuda-sudhâkaraṃ
vipra-divâkaraṃ Sarasvatî-samaya-samuddharaṇaṃ guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇaṃ Chatura-chaturânanaṃ
vikrama-pañchânanaṃ pratâpa-sahâyaṃ pati-hita-Vainatêyaṃ pisuṇara gaṇḍan ahita-kuḷa-kamaḷa-
vana-vêdaṇḍaṃ vinayâvaḷôkaṃ kîrtti-patâkaṃ sâhasôttuṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-charaṇa-
sarasîruha-bhṛiṅga-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Barmma-Dêvaṃ ǁ

lg.l: dhareg ellaṃ tanna bahâ-baḷada ner̤avu tann aṇmu tann ugra-têjas- |
sphuritaṃ tann ârppu tann or-nnuḍiya nilavu tann ûrjjita-khyâtiy-oḷp a- |
chchariy âgutt irppinaṃ rañjisi sakaḷa-guṇânargghya-ratnakke ratnâ- |
karan âdaṃ daṇḍanâthâgraṇi sakaḷa-jagan-maṇḍanaṃ Barmma-Dêvaṃ ǁ
janak ellaṃ tâne kaṇṇuṃ gatiyum enisi tanniṃ ripu-kshatra-naksha- |
tra-nikâyaṃ nillad ellaṃ masuḷe Kaḷi-miḷad-dhvântam arkkâḍe viśvâ- |
vaniyaṃ mikk êḷgeyindaṃ beḷap esakaman ânt irddapaṃ Vikramâdi- |
tyana têjaś-chakram irppantevol anavadhi-satvôdayaṃ Barmma-Dêvaṃ ǁ
Hariyim châḷitam âdud aṅkad achaḷêndraṃ daityanim sârddud ur- |
bbi rasâ-garbbaman â-layâniḷana poyliṃ pâr̤it âśâ-gajôt- |
karam end and ivaralli dhîra-guṇam ell itt end ivaṃ nakku dhi- |
kkaripaṃ niśchaḷam âda dhairyya-guṇad oḷpiṃ Barmma-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
kuḍuv-eḍeg âdud êṃ maḍagal âdude vittam arâtiyaṃ paḍal- |
vaḍip-eḍeg âdud êṃ bar̤ide pottiral âdude kaydu satyamaṃ |
nuḍiv-eḍeg âdud êṃ pusiyal âdude nâlige yindu kîrtti dâṃ- |
guḍivaḍe Barmma-Dêvan anituṃ kshaṇad unnatiyaṃ negarchchidaṃ ǁ

div.p:
antu pogarttegaṃ negarttegaṃ nelay âda śrîman-mahâ-senâdhipati mahâ-pradhânaṃ daṇḍanâyakaṃ
Barmma-Devarasar bBanavase-pannirchchhâsiramuṃ Sântaḷige-sâsiramuṃ padineṇṭ-agrahâragaḷmaṃ
dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ geyd anubhavisuttaṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveyoḷ ire ǁ

lg.l: vane tây Jakkabbe Sômaṃ janakan avarajaṃ Mêchi Bhâgabbe puṇyâṅ- |
gane mâvaṃ lôka-pûjyaṃ guṇa-nidhi Kali-dêvaṃ budhâdhâran end-and |
anavadyaṃ Siṅgan êṇ kêvaḷame hitakarôttuṅga-dhrmma-prasaṅgaṃ ǁ
vineyada sîme dharmmada tavar-mmane satyada janma-bhûmi mân- |
tanad er̤uvaṭṭu pempinad agunti vivêkada bîḍu-dâṇav âr- |
ppina kaṇiy endu baṇṇipudu bhû-vaḷayaṃ Pratikaṇṭha-Siṅganaṃ |
barepada balme bâjaneya binnaṇam oppuva lekkad ôje Saṅ- |
dore sari pâṭiy endu nikhiḷôrbbare baṇṇisut irppud endoḍ êṃ |
śuchiy ene sandan ê-doreto śaucha-guṇaṃ Pratikaṇṭha-Siṅgana ǁ
kuḷa-nava-saurabhakk er̤aguvante budhâḷi niyôgam emba dî- |
vaḷigeya parbbadoḷ bare yathôchitadiṃ taṇipiṃ baḷikke sañ- |
chaḷataram â-niyôgam enut irppudu gôsane Siṅga-râjanaṃ ǁ
para-hitamaṃ kaḍaṅgi ner̤e mâḍale kaltan aśêsha-sad-budhôt- |
karaman or̤aldu mannisale kaltan eḍar ppirid emba śishṭaraṃ |
poreyale kaltan uttama-guṇâdhikaroḷ dorey appan endu ma- |
chcharisale kaltan intuṭ idu kalta-guṇaṃ Pratikaṇṭha-Siṅgana ǁ

div.p:
int enisida guṇaṅgaḷ tanage sahajam âge negaḷda śrîmat-Pratikaṇṭha-Siṅgayyaṃ dharmma-kathâ-
kathana-prasaṅgamaṃ puṭṭisi śrîmat-Permmâḍiya basadig ondu-bâḍamaṃ śrî-Ballavarasaralli paḍedu
kuḍim endu tann âḷdaṅge binnapaṃ geyyal srîmad-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Barmma-Dêva tat-sammandham ella-
maṃ nija-svâmige binnapaṃ geyye ǁ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvar śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varsha
2 neya Piṅgaḷa-samvatsarada Pushya-sudda 7 Âdityavârad-andin-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiya parbba-nimit-
taṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveyoḷ tamma kumâra-gâladandu mâḍisida śrîmach-Châḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmânaḍi-
Jinâlayada dêvargg archchana-pûjanâbhishêkakkaṃ bhôgakkaṃ ṛishiyar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ mêle basa-
diya khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-nava-karmmada besakkam âgi ǁ

lg.l: jasam emb ujvaḷa-dîpti pajjaḷise bhavyâmbhôjinî-râji râ- |
jñâna-paraṃ negaḷda Mahâ- | sêna-brati tad-bratîśa-śishyar nnegaḷdar ǁ
budu ner̤e tarkka-śâstrada vivêkadoḷ int Akaḷaṅka-dêvar em- |

div.p:
antu samasta-śâstra-pârâvâra-pâraga parama-tapaś-charaṇa-niratar appa śrî-Mûḷa-saṅghada Sêna-
gaṇada Pogari-gachchhada śrîmat-Râmasêna-paṇḍitargge dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ sarbba-namasyaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭa Banavase-pannirchchhâsirada kampaṇaṃ Jiḍḍuḷige 70 r̤a baḷiya bâḍaṃ Manevane 1 | (usual
final phrases).
śrîmad-Guṇabhadra-dêvara guḍḍaṃ Châvuṇḍamayyaṃ baredaṃ maṅgaḷa maha śrî

div.head:
125
At the same village, on a stone in Âridre-maṭhada Channappa’s back-yard.

lg.l: śrî-pati pâśa-dhâri kaḷahaṃsagan ashṭa-mitâkshan end ivar |
ttraipurushar tri-lôka-jana-pûjitar îg emag ishṭa-siddhiyaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ mallikâmôdaṃ mârppaḍe-Bhîmaṃ râya-gaja-kêsari
gaṇḍaroḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-baṅgâr̤aṃ Chôḷôgra-kâḷânaḷaṃ Chôḷa-bhaṇḍaṇâpêksha vidagdha-râya-pavitra-
chûḍâmaṇi ari-râya-taleya-karavattaṃ ari-râya-seḷevaṃ râya-pratâpâdityaṃ têjô-mârttaṇḍaṃ
śauryya-Nârâyaṇaṃ râya-munnîra-baḍavânaḷaṃ chauvâṇa-Sahasrabâhu râya-jagajhampi kîrtti-Vidyâ-
dharaṃ kôdaṇḍa-Râmaṃ śrîmach-Chaḷukya-vaṃśôdbhavaṃ śrîmat-Tailapa-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam utta-
rôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ

lg.l: dhareyaṃ Châḷukyânvaya- | d arasugaḷ êkôna-shashṭi-siṃhâsanam âḷ- |
dar Ayôdhyâ-pura-varadoḷu | paramôtsavadindam irddu tad-vaṃśa-bhavaṃ ǁ
jaya-vanitêśaṃ Satyâ- | śraya-Dêvaṃ Brahma-kuḷaman oḷupina Satyâ- |
śraya-kuḷav ene sakaḷa-dhari- | triyan âḷdaṃ sârbbabhauma-vesar esev inegaṃ ǁ
Vâsava-vibhavaṃ ripu-san- | trâsi yaśô-bhâsi sakaḷa-dhâtriyan âḷdaṃ ǁ
Raṭṭara kaige virdd eḷeyuṃ | paṭṭamumaṃ Raṭṭa-râjyad arasugaḷaṃ muṃ- |
biṭṭu tar̤id oṭṭi Raṭṭa-gha- | raṭṭaṃ Châḷukya-râjya-paṭṭaman ântaṃ ǁ
Râjêndra-Chôḷa-gaja-mṛiga- | râjaṃ râjâdhirâjan enipudu piridê ǁ
pasarisi parbbi gondaḷisi ninda tamas-tamamaṃ teraḷchi band |
osed inan êr̤uvant udaya-parbbatamaṃ Kali-kâlad êḷgeyaṃ |
deseg iḍe tûḷdi tâḷdi Kṛita-lakshmiyan oḷpina teḷpugaḷ jagakk |
esed ire siṅgha-vishṭaraman êr̤idan â-Jayasiṅgha-vallabhaṃ ǁ
Chôḷanumaṃ samudradoḷag arddidud arddidan andu têjad-urbb |
êḷu-samudramuṃ gaḷiye parbbi podaḷdudu dig-jayaṃ disâ- |
pâḷaran aḷkisitt idiral âmpavar âr jJayasiṅgha-Dêvana ǁ

div.p:
tatu-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Banavâsi-
pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Châmuṇḍâ-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ vairi-ghaṭâ-kêsari sujana-kaivâran ârôhaka-
Trinêtraṃ madad-âne-dhavaḷaṃ byâḷa-gaja-mallaṃ matta-mâtaṅga-bhîmaṃ śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañja-
raṃ ripu-kuñjarâṅkuśa ari-baḷa-timira-mârttaṇḍa nuḍidante gaṇḍa saṅgrâma-Râman abhimâna-Mêru
jagad-êka-vîraṃ vîra-Vidhyâdharaṃ kaṭakada gôvan achaḷita-dhairyya su-bhaṭâri-darppa-daḷanaṃ
vairi-gharaṭṭaṃ maṇḍaḷika-lalâṭa-paṭṭaṃ Sattigana chaṭṭaṃ śrîmad-lr̤iva-beḍaṅga-Dêvara magaṃ
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kundamarasaru Banavâsi-pannirchchhâsiramumaṃ Sântaḷi-sâsiramu-
maṃ Hayvey-aynûr̤uman ubhaya-sâmyadi paśchima-samudra-paryyantaṃ-baraṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinô-
dadiṃ Balipurada nelevîḍinoḷu râjyam geyyuttam irddu Śaka-varsha 941 neya Siddhârtti-samva-
tsarada Pushya-śuddha-bidige-Adityavârad-andin uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiya-parbba-nimittadiṃ Mûla-
sthâna-Nandikêsvara-dêvara dêvâlyakaṃ jîrṇṇôddhâraṃ mâḍiy â-dêvara nivêdyakkaṃ khaṇḍa-
sphutita-jîrnnôddhârakkaṃ (here follow details of gift and boundaries) â-dêvara pûje-punaskârakkaṃ
nitya-nivêdyakkav alliya khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkav endu koṭṭaru svasti yama-niyamâ-
sana-prâṇâyâma-pratyâhâra-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-sîḷa-sampannar appa śrîmatu
Mûliga-Śivaśakti-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ (stops here).

div.head:
126
At the same village, on a stone near the Pañchaliṅga temple.

lg.l: vagem eyd â .... Vibhîshṇana mêg âkshêpadiṃ pôgi va- |
stugaḷaṃ kappaman alli koṇḍu mugurdirddar pPâṇḍavar bBaḷḷigâ- |
vege vand ayvarum aydu-liṅgaman ivaṃ saṃsthâpanaṃ mâḍidar ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ mallikâmôdaṃ mârppaḍe-Bhîmaṃ râya-gaja-kêsari
gaṇḍaroḷ gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍa-baṅgâr̤aṃ Chôḷôgra-kâḷânaḷaṃ Chôḷa-bhaṇḍaṇâpêkshaṃ vidagdha-râya-
pavitra-chûḍâmaṇi ari-râya-taḷeya-karavattaṃ ari-râya-seḷevaṃ râya-pratâpâdityaṃ têjô-mârttaṇḍaṃ
śauryya-Nârâyaṇaṃ râya-nîra-baḍavânaḷa chauvâṇa-Sahasrabâhu râya-jagajhampaṃ kirtti-Vidyâdha-
raṃ kôdaṇḍa-Râmaṃ śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-nâmâdi-samsta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmaj-Jayasiṃha-Dêvar
pPoṭṭaḷaker̤aya nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttuṃ Śaka-varsha 957 neya Yuva-
saṃvatsarada Pushyada paurṇṇamâsiy-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtam Adityavârad-andu svasti
samasta-tarkkâdi-śâstra-pârâvâra-pâragaṃ vâdi-Rudra vâdîbha-mastaka-nakhâsphâḷana-kiśôra-kêsari
vâdi-mahâraṇya-dava-dahanaṃ dushṭa-vâdi-nishṭhura-paṭishṭha-śârddûḷaṃ Bauddhâbdhi-baḍavâ-
mukhaṃ Mîmâṃsaka-dhâtrîdhara-vajraṃ Lôkâyata-mahâ-taru-vidâraṇa-krakachaṃ Sâṅkhyâhîndra-
rundra-Vainatêyaṃ Advaita-vâdi-bhûja-kuṭhâran Akaḷaṅka-Tripura-dahana-Triṇêtraṃ Vâdi-gharaṭṭa-
diśâpaṭṭa Mâdhava-bhaṭṭa-gharaṭṭaṃ Jñânânanda-mada-bhañjana Viśvânaḷa-praḷayôgrânaḷan Abhaya-
chandra-kâḷânaḷam Vâdîbha-siṃha-sarabhaṃ Vâdirâja-mukha-mudra Nayavâdi-diśâpaṭṭaṃ Naiyâyika-
samrakshaṇaika-dakshaṃ sva-paksha-pôshaṇa-para-paksha-dûshaṇa-paṭutara-Viriñchaṃ-Vâgvadhû-
maṇḍanan âsthâna-Padmâsanaṃ vivêka-Nârâyaṇaṃ gamaka-Mahêśvaran upanyâsâmarâpagâ-pra-
vâhaṃ vyâkhyâna-kêḷî-lampaṭa-manôhara-sarasîruha-bhṛiṅgaṃ (n)avadâta-kîrtti-dhvajan amaḷina-
charitraṃ dvishṭa-darppishṭa-paṇḍita-gaḷa-Kâḷa-pâśaṃ vâdi-Digambara-dhûmakêtuṃ Vâdi-Rudra-
guṇa-nâmâṅkitar appa śrîmal-Lakuḷîśvara-paṇḍitargge Banavase-pannirchchhâsirada râjadhâni
Baḷḷigâveya Kâḷâmukhi-Brahmachâri-sthânaṃ Pâṇḍava-pratishṭheya Pañchaliṅga-dêvara dêgulada
khaṇḍa-sphuṭitada mâṭakkaṃ dêvara gandha-dhûpa-nivêdyakkam alliya vidyârtthi-tapasvigaḷ-âhâ-
râchchhâdanakkaṃ sarvva-kara-bâdhâ-parihâra sarvva-namasyaṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakadindam ây-ûra
baḷḷiya polad-oḷa kachchheviya gaḷeyoḷ biṭṭa (here follow details of gift and final phrases & verses).

lg.l: tayôr yô vyâkuryyâd vṛijinam anayôs tasya nidadhê
śirasy aṅghriṃ vâdi-praḷaya-dahanô’ haṃ nṛipa-sabhê ǁ

div.p: int î-dharmmamaṃ nagaraṃ pratipâḷisuvudu naishṭhikar alladara por̤amaḍisi kaḷevudu ǁ

div.head:
127
On the same stone.
div.p:
svasti samasta-nṛipa-jana-stutya Satya ........ paramêśvaraṃ Kuvaḷâla-pura-varêśvaraṃ Nandagiri-
nâthaṃ mada-gajêndra .................... Gaṅga-Gâṅgêyaṃ Gaṅga-sarbbanuṃ châritra ......
................... makuṭa-chûḍâmaṇi śrîmach-Châḷukya ............ bi-saṃvatsarda Pushya-
bahuḷa-daśamiya .............. Pañchaliṅgad-Umâ-Mahêśvara-dêvargge dharmma ............
pû-dôṇṭav ondu | Pañchaliṅgada ....................

div.head:
128
Near the same temple, on the step of the Jiḍḍiker̤e.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrî-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvar Baṅkâpurada
nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyutt ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvigaḷ appa svasti bhuva
............ malla .................... ramêśvaraṃ .................... padi-mûr̤u .......
.................. pâḷanaṃ .................... sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadinda .................
neya Râkshasa-saṃvatsarada Pushya-śuddha ........ uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-nimittadi śrî ..........
............ jîvitava naḍesuvantâgi ................. kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi ....
.......... koṭṭa Jiḍḍuḷige ........ Gobbaḷḷiya ................. Brâhmaṇa .. śrîmat râjâdhya-
kshad irmmaḍi ................ yara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pürvvakaṃ mâḍi kuḍe paḍeda Bana-
vâsi ............ Nâgarakhaṇḍa 70 r̤a baḷiya agrahâraṃ kambha gaḷe 1 pravishṭaṃ biṭṭi geyye
(here follow usual final phrases & verses). ant â-pariyaṃ kachchhaviya nûr̤a irppadimbaruṃ ............
deyadiṃ irppadimbaruṃ dêvarige .................... ikkadavari .. vattiy illa

div.head:
129
On a stone at the bund of the same tank.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kul̤a-til̤akaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôtta-
râbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire Baṅkâpurada nelevîḍinoḷ tat-
pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍa-
nâyakan âsthâna-vastu-nâyakaṃ niyôga-Yôgandharâyaṇaṃ chatura-pârâyaṇaṃ vivêka-Vidyâdharaṃ
sakaḷa-kaḷâ-dharaṃ Hara-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇaṃ Châḷukya-râjya-samuddharaṇaṃ
vikramôttuṅgan asahâya-siṅga śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêva-pâdâravinda-shaṭcharaṇaṃ samasta-
guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ hiri-sandhi-vigrahi mane-verggaḍe-daṇḍanâyakan-
Udayâdityana binnapadiṃ śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvar Saka-varsha 993 neya Virôdhikṛit-saṃ-
vatsarada Pushya-suddha 1 Sômavârad-andin-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-parbbha-nimittadiṃ râjadhâni-
Baḷḷigâveya Hariharâditya-dêvargge snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ dêgulada besakkaṃ maṭhada biyakkaṃ śri-
satya-jñânânandâdvaita jyôti-svarüpar appa śrîmat-praṇava-nâdânanda-Guṇagaḷḷa-yôgigaḷa kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ sarbba-namasyaṃ sarbba-bâdhâ-parihâram âgi biṭṭa Banavase-pannir-
chchhâsirada kampaṇaṃ Jiḍḍuḷige 70 ttar̤a baḷiya bâḍaṃ Bidiriṅger̤ey ondu (usual final phrases).

lg.l: ddâmaṃ sampûrṇṇaṃ vi- | dyâ-mûrtti jitâtman aksharaṃ Guṇagaḷḷa ǁ
Achaḷana-deseyind udayisu- | va charâcharam Achal̤aninde por̤ag aṇav alt end |
achaḷita-chittadin irppaṃ | prachaṇḍan advaiti nirupamaṃ Guṇagaḷḷa ǁ
nirbbâṇa-yôgi śântaṃ | sarbbaṃ sarbbîya-kâraṇaṃ Guṇagaḷḷa ǁ
jñâname nâ ninag oḍal esev | ânandaṃ tôrppuv ellam enna neḷal ma- |
tt ênuṃ bêr̤ ill emban i- | ḷâ-nutan advaita-śêkharaṃ Guṇagaḷḷa ǁ
ânandâdvaya-satya- | jñânamayar nnegal̤dar a .. ḷa .. ḷ nishkaḷa-nâ- |
dorekoṇḍ î-dêhadoḷ môhaman ele Guṇagaḷḷâryya nîṃ mâṇdu beṅkoṇḍ |
ari-shaḍ-varggaṅgaḷaṃ bhêdaman ir̤id aḷipaṃ biṭṭu karmmaṅgal ellaṃ |
beras ân end irpp ahaṅkârman avayavadiṃ suṭṭu sânandadindaṃ |
paripûrṇṇa-jyôti nîn âg ire biḍuvaḷe pêḷ mukti ninnaṃ munîndrâ ǁ
âl̤ el̤d â-basanaṅgaḷ | êḷuman el̤du nir- |
ner̤e bhakti śânti dhṛiti tushṭiy emb îvar- |
kk er̤evaṭṭ âg il̤daṃ Guṇagaḷḷa ǁ
jasada Balipura-varadoḷ Yôgêśvaraṃ Hariharâdityaṃ .... sayanan emba |
pesara dêvaraṃ dêvâleyaṅgaḷaṃ mâḍisidar gGuṇagaḷḷa-dêvara ǁ
Kir̤u-dor̤eya teṅka-daḍiyol̤ | Kur̤uvattiya pempu vetta Muttûr-eḍeyoḷ |
ner̤e Siddha-tîrtthamaṃ jaga- | m ar̤iyal Guṇagaḷḷa-dêva-muni nirmmisidaṃ ǁ
bharavasadinde tat-padam id î-kramadiṃ naḍedaṅge sâdhyam end |
eraḍuman âvagaṃ tiḷipi bêsar̤ad irppa dayâl̤uv appa sa- |
d-guru vaḍed ande śishyar-abhîvâñchchey ad âgade sidhhiy âgade ǁ
seḍar veḷag iṭṭavol beḷagutirkk avadâtam arüpa-dîpam â- |
paḍed ati ........ sakaḷa-śishya-janaṃ śubham akke maṅgaḷâ ǁ

div.p: śrîmat-Pratikaṇṭha-Kâmarâjaṃ baredaṃ ǁ

div.head:
130
At the same place, on a 2nd stone.

lg.l: Hiraṇyakaśipuṃ jaghnê tasmai siṃhâtmanê namaḥ ǁ
ddâmaṃ sand Ayyaṇaṃ sâhasa-nidhi Jayasiṃhaṃ dharâ-chakra-lakshmî- |
dhâmaṃ Traiḷôkyamallaṃ negaḷe negaḷdud î-prâjya-Châḷukya-râjyaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarô-
ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire ǁ

lg.l: ddâmaṃ Brahma-Kshatra-si- | khâmaṇi râjâdhirâjan Udeyâdityaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvana-stuta-Brahma-Kshatra-vîrânvaya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ para-
mêśvaraṃ Kôḷâḷa-pura-varêśvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâthaṃ mada-gajêndra-lâñchchhanaṃ Sômêśvara-
labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ Gaṅga-Kusumâyudhaṃ nanniya-Gaṅgaṃ jayad-uttaraṅgaṃ sakaḷa-jana-chin-
tâmaṇi maṇḍaḷika-makuṭa-chûḍâmaṇi śrîmad-Gaṅga-Permmânaḍi-Bhuvanaikavîran Udeyâditya-
Dêvaṃ Banavase-pannirchchhâsiraṃ Sântaḷige-sâsiramumaṃ Maṇḍaḷi-sâsiramuṃ padineṇṭ-agra-
hâramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanadin âḷuttuṃ pratyanta-vâsigaḷ appa Chêra-Chôḷa-
Pâṇḍya-Pallava-prabhṛitigaḷan aled âṭandu kappamaṃ koṇḍu chatur-vvârddhi-paryyantaṃ nelanaṃ
nimirchchi vijigîshu-vṛittiyan appukeydu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveyoḷ irddu
dharmma-buddhiyiṃ nija-svâmi śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvargge binnapaṃ geydu Paramêśvara-
datti mâḍi râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya Perggaṭṭad êriya mêgaṇa śrîman-Nârasiṃha-dêvara dêgulada
besakkaṃ dêva-pûjegaṃ Saka-varsha 907 neya Râkshasa-saṃvatsarada Pushya-śuddha 1 Sômavârad-
andin-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-parbba-nimittadin alliya mukhyar appa śrîmat-Pûrṇṇânanda-bhaṭṭâ-
rakara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ sarbba-namasyam âge biṭṭa Banavase-nâḍa kampaṇaṃ
Mugunda-panneraḍara baḷiya bâḍa Kundavige 1 (rest contains usual final phrases and a verse).

div.head:
131
At the same place, on a 3rd stone.

lg.l: âḷ-valamaṃ tôḷ-valamaṃ | bâḷ-valamaṃ tôr̤i mîr̤uvar î-bhûbhujar ê- |

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ śrîmach-Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara nija-
vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire
Kalyâṇada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ

lg.l: dvat-pûjyaṃ guṇa-ratna-sa- | ritpatiy enisidan Anantapâḷa-chamûpaṃ ǁ
pati-hitaroḷ ellav aggada | pati-hitan atiśuchigaḷ enisi negaḷdavaroḷu mikk |
atiśuchi dakshar enipp â- | .. dakshan Anantapâḷa-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ
vibudha-vara-dâyakaṃ su-jana-prasanna nuḍidu matt ennaṃ gôtra-pavitra parâṅganâ-putraṃ turaya-
Rêvantaṃ vairi-Kṛitântaṃ sâhasôttuṅgan ayyana siṅgaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-
mahâ-pradhâna bâṇasa-verggaḍe-daṇḍanâyakan Anantapâḷarasaru Beḷvala-mûnûr̤u Puliger̤e-mûnûr̤u
Banavasi-pannirchchhâsiramu saptârddha-lakshaya-pannâyamaṃ paḍedu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda-
diṃ pratipâḷisuttam ire tat-prasâdâsâdita-Vanavâsi-dvâdaśa-sahasrâdhikâra-lakshmî-vibhâsiyuṃ
sakala-guṇa-gaṇôdbhâsiyum enisida Gôvinda-Râjan ê-dorey en[t] endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: ḷâ-viḷasitan ên esedano | Gôvindaṃ madavad-ahita-danuja-Mukundaṃ ǁ
śaraṇ emag endu bandaḍ ar̤iyaṃ mar̤ed ântaḍe bhâḷadoḷ podal̤d |
karam ene tôr̤uguṃ samara-raṅgadoḷ î-raṇa-raṅga-Bhairava ǁ
kare Sômâmbikey endaḍ î-bhuvanadoḷ Gôvindan êṃ dhanyanô ǁ

div.p:
â-samasta-guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇanuṃ vibudha-jana-śaraṇanuṃ nija-viśuddha-kîrtti-chandrikâ-prabhâva-
vikasita-jagad-vaḷaya-kairavanuṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavanuṃ vishama-haya-Vatsa-râjanuṃ su-kavi-sura-
bhûjanum enisida mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Gôvinda-Râjaṃ Banavase-pannirchchhâsiramu-
maṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷamumaṃ chhatra-chchhâyeyiṃ chhappannad achchu-pannâyamaṃ paḍedu sukha-saṅ-
kathâ-vinôdadiṃ pratipâlisuttam ire tadîya-sandhi-vigrahâdhîśvaran app Îśvarayya-Nâyakana vaṃ-
śâvatâram ent endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: śrî-mahitaṃ negarddaṃ guṇa- | dâmaṃ dvija-kuḷa-varishṭhan enipa Vaśishṭa ǁ
ene negal̤da Vaśisṭha-munîn- | drana gôtradoḷ ogedan akhiḷa-jana-nutam idu tân |
enipa Siriguppe-goladoḷ | vinayâmbudhi durita-kuḷa-gharaṭṭaṃ Chaṭṭaṃ ǁ
ene sanda Chaṭṭapaṅgaṃ | vinuta-yaśôvatiy enippa Bhôgâmbikegaṃ |
janiyisidar sakaḷa-jagaj- | jana-vinutar bBâchirâjanuṃ Basavaṇanuṃ ǁ
bhuvana-nutan Îśvaraṃ pem- | pu-vettan Îśvara-padâbja-yugaḷa-bhramaraṃ ǁ
vârâśi-parivṛitâkhiḷa- | dhâraṇiyoḷ pôlvaḍ amma pôlk ema purushâ- |
kâradoḷe purusha-kârado- | ḷ âruṃ negar̤d Îśvarâryyanaṃ pôltaparê ǁ
nandita-bandhu-varggan ivan embudu bhû-taḷav emma vîra-Gô- |
ryyana Nâlabbeya hermmagaḷ tanage tây Bhâgayve ...... |

div.p:
â ........ ratna-mâḷâḷaṅkâranuṃ | bhudha-janâdhâra ...... châru-châ ........ nirmmaḷa-yaśah-
patâkanuṃ | Gôvinda-râja-charaṇa-sarasîruha-chañcharîkanuṃ | tat-prasâdâsâdita-sandhi-vigrahâdhî-
śvaranum app Îśvarayya-Nâyakaṃ | śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varsha 28 neya Svabhânu-sam atsa-
rada Pushya-ba 10 Sukravâradandin-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇadal dharmma-kâryya-tâtparyya-chittan
âgi nâsti dharmma-samô bandhu yemba nîti-vâkyârtthamaṃ samartthisi Kuntaḷa-dharitrî-kânteya
viḷôḷa-kuntaḷa-kaḷâpadant eseva Banavase-pannirchchhâsirakkav aḷaṅkârav âgi tôrppa Baḷḷigâvey-
uttara-dig-bhâgada Perggaṭṭad êriya mêgaṇa śrîman-Nârasiṃha-dêvara gandha-dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdya-
khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârak endu mahâ-râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya-nagaramuṃ pañcha-maṭha-sthâna-
muṃ | śrîmad-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Gôvindarasarum ariye Banavase-pannirchchhâsirad oḷagaṇa kampa-
ṇaṃ Jiḍḍuḷigey-erppatar̤a baḷiya bâḍaṃ Pakkaḷey ûroḍeyaṃ Kavibândhavana maga Rudramayyana
magaṃ Nâkaṇan â-Pakkaḷeya bhûmiyoḷage tann umbaḷiya mânyada keyyoḷage kachchhaviya gaḍim-
badoḷ ayvattu kamma garddeyaṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâraṃ sarvva-namasyam âgi kâlaṃ karchchi
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi kuḍalu paḍedu koṭṭan â-keyya chaturâghâta-śuddhiy ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: animêśêndrâśeyoḷ sâsana barapaman ânt irdda kalgaḷ divâkṛit- |
śana kâshṭhâ-bhâgadattal Baḷinagarada śîmântadiṃ Śrîpurakk im- |
bine pod adhvaṃ Kubêrâśeyoḷ Aḷeya-koḷaṃ sîme tân âge tôrkkuṃ ǁ

div.p: (here follow further details of gift and usual final verses).

div.head:
132
* This inscription is much defaced.
At the same place, on a stone to the south of the Kâḷamma temple.
div.p:
........ dhâmâdi .......... nṛitâḷâpa-vâsa ........... neyaṃ lôbha-prabhâ ...... maṇi negal̤d
Udayâditya-Dê ...... tann al̤kar̤iṃ band eradaṅg ill eyde dârâ ........ doḷ mâr̤ântavaṅg ill asuvina
deseyoḷ ...... nata-yaśan Udayâditya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ ........ chakriy emba vikrama-lakshmî-
sâdhakana nachchin-uttaraṅga .... antu pogal̤tegaṃ negal̤tegaṃ ekkalâvaṇam âda ...... dayâ-
dityana binnapadiṃ śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvara ..... kṛit-samvatsarada Pushya-sudda-pâḍivaṃ
Sômavârada ............ parbba-nimittaṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya Perggaṭṭad êriya ........ dêgu-
lada besakkam pannirbbar-bhbhagavara bhikshegaṃ ............ ppannirbbar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ
vyâkhyâ ............ ppannirbbar-âhârakkam avara ...... jîvitakkam alliya mukhyar pPûrnnâ-
nanda-bha ..... rbba-namasyaṃ sarbba-bâdhâ-parihâramâgi biṭṭaṃ Banavase-pannirchchâ .......
70 r̤a bal̤iya bâḍaṃ Miṭṭasiy ondu ǁ (usual final phrases) ...... mmarâjaṃ barevara ...... śvasti
śrîman-Mâḷadâlûra Vâsudêva-ghôsâsargge Kêśava-dêvara Brahmapuriy âge dânaṃ goṭṭa kachcha-
viya gaḷeya gardde matter eraḍu ǁ

div.head:
133
On a stone in Kallu-maṭhada Channa-Basavayya’s garden.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Bhûlôkamalla-Dêvaru Kalyâṇada nelevîḍinalu
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrî-
man-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Banavâseyâ Tailaha-Dêvara besadiṃ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi maṇḍaḷika-
Masaṇayyaṃ śrîmad-râjadhâni-Balipurada samasta-praśasti-sahitânêkad-guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkâraruṃ sama-
sta-budha-janâdhâraruṃ chatus-samaya-samuddharaṇa-dhîraruṃ śaraṇâgata-vajra-prâkâraruṃ
îrvvaru-seṭṭigaḷuṃ nagara-pañcha-maṭhaṅgaḷalli samasta-praśasti-sahitânêka-guṇâḷaṅkrita-satya-
śauchâchâra-naya-vinaya-śîḷa-sampannaruṃ śrî-Kâḷikâ-dêvî-labdha-vara-prasâdaruṃ pañcha-lôhâdhi-
patigaḷuṃ tat-suṅka-parirakshitarum appa śrîmat-Kaṭakada-mahâ-nagarad oḷagaṇa Guṇavarmma-Seṭṭi
baudu Kâḷikâ-dêviya nitya-nivêdyakkaṃ pûjâ-punaskârakkav endu bêḍidaḍe svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-
Vikrama-va .... 56 neya Virôdhakṛit-samvatsarad Ashâḍhad amâvâsye ...... ṇâyana-saṅkramaṇad
andu kâl-garchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ koṭṭa (here follow details of gift and usual final phrases).

div.head:
134
At the same village, on a broken Jina idol in Channa-Basavappa’s field.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters.)

svasti śrî Chitrakûṭâmnâyad-âvali Mâlavada Śântinâtha-dêva-sammandha śrî-Balôtkâra-gaṇa Muni-
chandra-siddhânta-dêvara śisinu Anantakîrtti-dêvaru hegaḍe Kêsava-dêvaṅge dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi
koṭevu prathishṭe puṇya sânti (here follow details of gift).

div.head:
135
At the same village, on a stone lying on the bund of the Aḷḷihoṇḍa.

lg.l: ddâmaṃ sand Ayyaṇaṃ sâhasa-nidhi Jayasiṃhaṃ diśâ-chakra-lakshmî- |
dhâmaṃ Traiḷôkyamallaṃ vinamita-ripu Sômêśvaraṃ sârbbabhaumaṃ ǁ

div.p:
................ mallaṃ Châḷukya-chakravartti-lalâma ................ mallaṃ ........ êka-
chchhatradin âḷdu ........ v-aṅkakâra dhara .................... dîkshâ- . sana ...... kêta ..
bhâsva ...... shôttama ................ kramâkâradiṃ ...................... Vikramâditya-
Dêvaṃ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvara parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttaṃ Êtagiriya nelevîḍinol̤
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti samadhigata-pañcha-
mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyaka ................ nu-jana-bandhu-
kumuda-sudhâkara ........ divâkara Sarasvatî-samaya-samuddharaṇaṃ guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇaṃ jita-
raṇa ........ chatura-Chaturânanaṃ vikrama-pañchânanaṃ pratâpa-sahâyaṃ pati- .. ta-Vainatêyaṃ
sujana-mukha-darppaṇaṃ âśrita-jana-santarppaṇaṃ pisuṇara gaṇḍan ahita-kuḷa-kamaḷa-vana-vêdaṇ-
ḍaṃ vinayâvalôkaṃ kîrtti-patâkaṃ sâhasôttuṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-charaṇa-sarasiruha-
bhṛiṅga-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sênâdhipati mahâ-pradhânaṃ daṇḍanâyakaṃ
Barmmadêvarasaru śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varishada yeraḍaneya Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada
Mâghada puṇṇeme-Sômavâradandina-sôma-grahaṇa-parvva-nimittadiṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya pûjâri
Siṅgaṇa mâḍisida Mallikârjjuna-dêvara snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ alliya ker̤eya garttegaṃ satrakkaṃ
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ sarvva-namasyav âge koṭṭa Jiḍḍuḷige-erppattar̤a baḷiya bâḍa Haravûra 1 yî-dharm-
mamaṃ mâlagâr̤a-kottaḷi taḷevara dharmma ........ mukyavâgi dharmmamaṃ keykoṇḍu naḍa-
varu (usual final phrases and verses) svasti śrîmat-pavitra ........ tara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ .............. ḍimaytayyanuṃ Siṅgaṇa ................

div.head:
136
At the same village, on pieces of stone in the yard near the Baḍagiyara-hoṇḍa.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara ...... bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamallan-Âhavama ...... sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam irey ire ǁ

lg.l: Malepar mmâr̤âmpar ill akramadi ... tar âṭarppar ill urkki darkkun- |
dale-vâyv udvṛittar ill oṭṭaji-verasu kur̤umbar ttar̤umb irppar ill e- |
ttalu ...... barppa daḷḷ end uriva ripugaḷ ill embinaṃ Kuntaḷôrvvî- |
śâṭavikâdhipar mmaledu nillade kappaman ittu nirmmitâ- |
ghâṭadoḷ irppa .... aḷav î-doret Âhavamalla-Dêvana ǁ
tâm taḷedu sukhade pala-kâ- | lan tava tava-nidhig adhîśan Âhavamallaṃ ǁ
digaḷaṃ pês êḷe konduṃ kavardum asadaḷaṃ koṭṭajaṃ goṇḍum âḷ-ô- |
ḷige danduṃ tôḷa-tînuṃ manada tavakamuṃ pôgad end Indranaṃ kâ- |
di gelal kappaṃ goḍal varisi taḷardan êkâṅgadiṃ sârvvabhaumaṃ ǁ
trâchaḷa-jaḷadhi-parîtaman | â-chandra-sthâyiy âgal âl̤va mahâtmaṃ ǁ
jayamaṃ dharmmakke dharmmânvayaman asadaḷaṃ sâdhu-varggakke vargga- |
trayamaṃ tann antaraṅgakk oḍarisi dhareyaṃ kûḍe san-mâna-dâna- |
brayadiṃ santayse kâḷaṃ Kṛita-yuga-mayaṃ âyt embinaṃ tanna râjyô- |
dayadoḷ lôkakke râgôdayam odavidud êṃ dhanyanô sârvvabhaumaṃ ǁ

div.p: â-prastâvadoḷ ǁ

lg.l: nava-râjyaṃ vîra-bhôjyaṃ pugal id avasaraṃ suttuveṃ Guttiyaṃ mu- |
ttuven emb î-garbbadiṃ Chôḷikan adhika-baḷaṃ mutti mâr-gguttiyaṃ pa- |
ṇṇuvudaṃ kêḷd ett enutt ettida turaga-dhaḷan tâge saytâgad agrâ- |
havadoḷ beṅgoṭṭu Sômêśvara-nṛipana baḷakk ôḍidaṃ Vîra-Chôḷaṃ ǁ
pesaraṃ kêl̤d aḷki beḷkurttudu para-dharaṇî-maṇḍaḷaṃ gaṇḍu-geṭṭ-âḷ- |
vesanaṃ pûṇdattu śauryyônnatig agid asuhṛin-maṇḍaḷaṃ melpan âvar- |
jjisid ond âjñâ-visêshakk eḷasidudu suhṛin-maṇḍaḷaṃ santam int â- |
d esakaṃ kaigaṇme Sômêśvara-nṛipati mahî-chakramaṃ pâḷisuttaṃ ǁ
krântârâtigaḷaṃ kaḷalchi dhareyaṃ nishkaṇṭakaṃ mâḍi ni- |
śchintaṃ śrî-Bhuvanaikamalla-mahipaṃ râjyaṃ geyutt irppinaṃ ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ tat-pâda-podmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda-mahâ-maṇdaḷêśvaran udâra-Mehê-
śvaraṃ chalake balgaṇḍaṃ śauryya-mârttaṇḍaṃ patig êka-dâshaṃ saṅgrâma-Garuḍaṃ manuja-Mân-
dhâtaṃ kîrtti-vikhyâtaṃ gôtra-mâṇikyaṃ vivêka-Chânikyaṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ vîra-Vṛikôdaraṃ
kôdaṇḍa-Pârtthaṃ saujanya-tîrtthaṃ maṇḍaḷika-kaṇṭhîravaṃ para-chakra-Bhairavaṃ râya-daṇḍa-
Gôpâḷaṃ Malaya-maṇḍaḷika-mṛiga-śârddûḷaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêva-pâda-paṅkaja-bhramaraṃ
śrî-Bhuvanaikamalla-vallabha-râjya-samuddharaṇaṃ pati-hitâbharaṇaṃ maṇḍaḷika-Makaradhvajaṃ
vijaya-kîrtti-dhvajaṃ maṇḍaḷika-Triṇêtraṃ ripu-râya-maṇḍaḷika-Yama-daṇḍaṃ jayâṅganâliṅgita-dôr-
ddaṇḍaṃ visuḷara-gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍa-Bhûriśravan emb iva modalâge palavum anvartthâṅka-mâḷegaḷin
aḷaṅkarisi ǁ

lg.l: Traiḷôkyamalla-vallabhan- | âḷ enisidaroḷage mikka pasayitanuṃ mi- |
kk âḷuṃ mikk aṇmina ba- | llâḷuṃ Lakshmaṇane per̤aran ar̤ivarum oḷarê ǁ
Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvana | bhavanadoḷaṃ tâne mânasaṃ tâne mahâ- |
vyavasâyi tâne vijaya- | pravarddhakan tâne pasayitaṃ Lakshma-nṛipaṃ ǁ

div.p: ant enisi ǁ

lg.l: aṇug âḷ kâryyada śauryyad âḷ vijayad âḷ Châḷukya-râjyakke kâ- |
raṇam âd âḷ tuḷilâḷtanakke ner̤ed âḷ kaṭṭâyad âḷ mikka ma- |
nnaṇey âḷ mântanad âḷ negal̤te-vaḍed âḷ vikrântad aḷ mêḷad âḷ |
raṇad âḷ âḷdana nachchuv âv-eḍeyoḷaṃ viśvâsad âḷ Lakshmaṇaṃ ǁ
eraḍuṃ râjyadoḷaṃ prajâ-parijanaṃ koṇḍâḍe chakrêśar i- |
poreyal maṇḍaḷika-Triṇêtran esedaṃ bhû-bhâgadoḷ Lakshmaṇaṃ ǁ
kir̤iyai nîṃ ninag ellaruṃ kir̤iyar end aggaysi kâruṇyadiṃ |
ner̤e koṭṭaṃ pratipatti-vṛitti-padamaṃ Lakshmaṅge Sômêśvaraṃ ǁ
mige Banavâse-nâl̤ke vibhu Lakshmaṇan âge Noḷamba-Sindavâ- |
ḍige vibhuv âge Vikrama-Noḷamban Aḷampuram âdiy âda bhû- |
mige vibhu Gaṅga-maṇḍaḷikan âge Yamâśege nîḷda lâḷa-vi- |
ṇḍigey ene kaṇḍu koṭṭan avarg â-nelanaṃ Bhuvanaika-vallabhaṃ ǁ
baliv aleva maleva kelev ada- | ṭaleva paḷañchaleva Malepar-elvaṃ mur̤idaṃ |
maleyada keleyada baliyada | Maleparan isuvesake besasidaṃ Lakshma-nṛipaṃ ǁ
dhâḷiyan iṭṭu Koṅkaṇaman aṅkaṇiy okkidapaṃ taguḷdu Komb- |
êḷuman aṭṭi muṭṭi Male-yêḷuman â .. murchchi mukki ni- |
rmmûḷisidappan endu Malepar ttale dôr̤ade Râyadaṇḍa-Gô- |
pâḷa-nṛipaṅge mundu varid endudan endapar êṃ pratâpiyô ǁ
âḷ-valam uḷḷaḍ aśva-balam illa bhaṭâśva-balaṅgaḷ uḷḷaḍaṃ |
tôl̤-valam illa bhr̤itya-haya-dôr-bbalam uḷḷaḍam êrvvalaṅgaḷ ill |
âḷ vesageyyad êke balivar malepar mmaley embud ên adaṃ |
bêl̤valam âge munt uḷidanallane Lakshmaṇan emba Kâvaṇaṃ ǁ
kavi durggaṃ châturaṅgaṃ bavase daḷavuḷaṃ dhâḷi sûḷ êr̤ enipp â- |
havadoḷ Châḷukya-Râmaṃ besase ripu-baḷakk ennan Indrâriy-annaṃ |
Javan-annam Mâriy-annam samara-samayadoḷ Lakshmaṇaṃ Râman-annaṃ ǁ
kudureya mêle bil parasu śûlige tîrike bhiṇḍivâḷam e- |
ttida karavâḷam âṭiḍuva kar̤kkaḍe pâr̤uva chakram endoḍ ent |
odar̤uvar entu pâyisuvar entu tar̤umbuvar entu nilpar ent |
odavuvar entu Lakshmaṇanoḷ ântu barduṅkuvar anya-bhûbhujar ǁ
îyal bandaḍe kalpa-vṛiksham idiraṃ band ânta vidvishṭaraṃ |
bisup aḷid arkkan-urkk uḍigum induva kânti kaḷalgum âgasaṃ |
kusigum iḷâ-taḷaṃ taḷargum ambudhi battugum illi Lakshmaṇaṃ |
pusidoḍam ârgge ṭepparaman oḍḍidoḍaṃ manam oldu kûḍi chhi- |
drisidoḍam anya-nârige maruḷdoḍam âhavadoḷ maraldaḍaṃ ǁ
mitraṃ Râman apâmaraṃ nara-varaṃ Duryyôdhanaṃ Bhîma-gâ- |
(tra)traṃ Bhîshma Yudhishṭhiraṃ Guru Kṛipaṃ sat-Karṇṇan end ande dal |
chitraṃ bhâvise Lakshma-bhûpa-charitaṃ Râmâyaṇaṃ Bhârata ǁ
kalitanam illa châgige vadânyate meygalig illa châgi mey- |
galiy enipaṅge śaucha-guṇam illa karaṃ kali-châgi-śauchigaṃ |
nile-nuḍi-vôje yilla kali châgi mahâ-śuchi satya-vâdi maṇ- |
ḍaḷikaroḷ îtan endu pogaḷguṃ budha-maṇḍaḷi Lakshma-bhûpana ǁ
muniyiṃ kisukaṇchuvar ose- | du naguvar int inite per̤ara munisuṃ mechchuṃ |
muniyise munida Javaṃ ha- | rshan âge harshaṃ gavṛishabha-lakshmaṃ Lakshmaṃ |
Banavase-pannirchchhâsira- | man âḷutuṃ sukhadin arasu-geyyutt il̤daṃ ǁ
ndharanuṃ tad-râjya-samu- | ddharaṇanum ene negal̤da mantri mantri-nidhânaṃ ǁ
kunayaṅgaḷ Jaina-mârggâmṛitadoḷ ire jala-kshîradant alli sad-vâ- |
paramâtmaṃ nishṭhitâtmaṃ Jinapati parama-svâmi tad-dharmmam ârmmaṃ |
piriy-aṇṇaṃ Kannapâryyaṃ tanag adhipati Lakshma-kshamâpâlan âtmâ- |
varajaṃ Vâgbhûshaṇaṃ Rêvaṇan ene negaḷdaṃ dhâtriyoḷ Śântinâṭhaṃ ǁ
sahaja-kavi chatura-kavi nis- | sahâya-kavi sukavi sukara-kavi mithyâtvâ- |
paha-kavi subhaga-kavi nuta-ma- | hâ-kavîndraṃ Sarasvatî-mukha-mukuraṃ ǁ
sukara-rasa-bhâvadiṃ va- | rnnakadiṃ tatvârttha-nichayadiṃ sûktam enal |
Sukumâra-charitamaṃ pêḷ- | da kavîndrâgraṇi Sarasvatî-mukha-mukura ǁ
asahâyan âgiyuṃ suja- | na-sahâyaṃ mada-vihînan âgiyum artthi- |
oḍaveyan oḷpiniṃ paḍedu puñjisi pûjisi kôṇa-tâṇadoḷ |
maḍagade śishṭar-iṭṭaḍege bandhugaḷ-illameg appud endum e- |
nn oḍame śarîram ennadu niyôgada parvvam id ennad endu mê- |
ḷpaḍadirim endu gôsane toḷalvudu .......... Śântinâthana ǁ
vinayade nijâdhipati-La- | kshma-nṛipaṅge su-dharmma-kâryyamaṃ binnavikuṃ ǁ

div.p:

div.head:
137
At the same village, on a stone near the Sîtekoḷa.
div.p: śrî-Gôvinda-Râja Vaishṇava-chûḍâmaṇi nuḍidante-gaṇḍa ǁ

lg.l: lôkaṃ bagegoṇḍaṃ nata- | nâkaukan ananta-bhôga-śayanan anantaṃ ǁ
Śrîvaran-esev-udarada pon- | dâvarey-araloḷagiṃ kamala-vanav alardud id êṃ |
bhâvise chitramo tân ena- | l âvana mukha-kamḷa-vanav arald esed irkkuṃ ǁ
â-dêvana manadoḷ munn | â-dêvaṃ piṅge maṅgaḷâvahar ogedar |
â-mânasa-bhava-sambhava- | r î-mahiyan udâtta-mahimar âḷdar ppalaruṃ |

div.p: avariṃ bal̤ikke ǁ

lg.l: eḷeyaṃ rasegarddoḍ anâ- | kuḷav âdi-Varâhan ettuvant âtma-bhujâ- |
baḷadiṃ para-nṛipa-gateyaṃ | salîlan uddharisi-sârvvabhaumaṃ Tailaṃ ǁ
vârddhiye sîme tanna bhuja-garvvadin ârjjisid urvvig indu saṃ- |
hṛit-kîḷan arâtige kuḷa- | kutkîḷaṃ permmeg enisi negaḷdaṃ rârâ- |
śrayan akhiḷa-râja-dharmmâ- | śrayan âḷdaṃ dhareyan abdhi-parivêshṭitamaṃ ǁ
Vikraman ûrjjita-nija-bhuja- | vikraman âḷdaṃ dharitriyaṃ tat-tanujaṃ |
Śakran ivan enisi nata-para- | chakraṃ dik-chakra-vartti-têjaś-chakraṃ ǁ
kûrmmanavôl eḷeyaṃ Daśa- | varmmaṃ kinnelakev irddu taḷedane taḷedaṃ |
nûrmmaḍi mêl enal âdyara | permmege nija-mahime tad-anujaṃ vasumatiyaṃ ǁ
chchaṃ harshita-bhuvanaṃ Jaya- | siṃhaṃ tat-tanujan âḷdan î-vasumatiyaṃ ǁ
dhareyaṃ pallava-lalitâ- | dhareyaṃ tat-tanujan âḷdan Âhavamallaṃ ǁ
bhuvana-stutyaṃ negaḷd Â- | havamallâgrajan udâttan âḷdaṃ dhareyaṃ |
Bhuvanaikamallan â-bhû- | dhavan-anujaṃ Vikramâṅkan apagata-śaṅkaṃ ǁ
shṭabdha-ghanâsaṃ prathama-ka | kub-dhavan ivan enisi viśva-viśvambhareyaṃ ǁ

div.p: madhyama-lôka-pâḷan enisi pratipâḷisuvalli ǁ

lg.l: âr âr â-ghôra-Mârîcha-bhayade naḍugar bbhîtiyindaṃ śaraṇ bo- |
kk âr âr ârû ha-dainyar chcharaṇa-sarasija-prântadoḷ muḷgar â-Sau- |
ghita-mâḷaṃ Mâḷavaṃ jarjjara-bhuja-kudharaṃ Gürjjaraṃ baḷdanê san- |
inisan aḍurttu nind ur̤ade kâdade geyyade dhâre pêḷda daṇ- |
ḍina ghaṭey âney-aḷ-madada dhâreyoḷ arddudu Kañchi mim ... |
.. nivisi Kañchi teṅka-mogav âdaḍe daṇḍ ari-râyar illa ke- |
mmane moneg intu baldaleyar end alevaṃ ripu-râya-bhumbhukaṃ ǁ
vîra-śrî nelas irppaḷ a- | nâratav anapâye râya-kôḷâhaḷana ǁ
Châḷukya-mahîśana kûr- | bbâḷ-al̤-nîroḷage nôḍe poḷevutt irpp â- |
bâḷeg ereyôḍuv ari-nara- | pâḷara gaja-ghaṭegaḷ ên id ond achchariyô ǁ
ôḍida Lâḷaṃ kivi-viḍid- | âḍida Chôḷaṃ vinashṭa-râjyaṃ baikaṃ |
bêḍida Kaḷlṅgan êṃ bhaya- | kûḍ allade pagege râya-kôḷâhaḷana ǁ

div.p:
enisi Kalyâṇa-pura-varada nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat- pâda
padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: ddâniyin oldu baṇṇipa janaṅgaḷ anantav Anantapâḷana ǁ
nambida bhaktiy onde Girijâdhipanoḷ bhuvana-stutaṃ yaśâ- |
ḷambanav onde mât adirad ântaḍe Râvaṇa-kôṭiyuṃ raṇâ- |
k embudo lôkadoḷ guṇa-gaṇaṅgaḷ anantav Anantapâḷana ǁ
avasarav âge pârddu kivi-varchchuva saṅgarav âge nôḍi be- |
ssavane virôdhiy-al̤-garuḷan urchchuva lakshmiyan âḷdavaṅge sâ- |
rchchuva nelanaṃ payôdhi-varav eyde nimirchchuv Anantapâḷanoḷ ǁ

div.p: tat-pada-payôja-râjîva-niḷaya-râjahaṃsanuṃ tat-priya-dêvaranuṃ dvija-varanuṃ jagad-varanuv enisi ǁ

lg.l: Vanavâsaṃ vana-vâsav âyt itara-daṇḍâdhîśar âḷdandu śi- |
vana-vâsaṃ budharg âdud âdav enipaṃ Gôvinda-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
nna mahatvaṃ negald irdda tann ar̤ivu tann âjñâ-phaḷaṃ tanna kî- |
rtti mahî-chakraman ellamaṃ beḷage daṇḍâdhîśa-ratnaṃ Chaḷu- |
enag iṃ svêchchhâ-vihâra-vyatikarav ogedatt êke Gôvinda-daṇḍê- |
śana chittaṃ dṛipta-sâpatnika-baḷa-daḷanôdrêkadoḷ taḷtud inn â- |
mane tân im pôgad end udbhayade tapanan ind âdan uttapta-dêhaṃ ǁ
manadoḷ mantaṇav irdd arâti-nṛipa-vaṃśônmûḷanaṃ geyyal i- |
janitôtpâta-śataṅgaḷind ar̤idu bhîtâtmar nṛipar bbandu to- |
ṭṭane kaṇḍar ggaḍ id êṃ pratâpa-paranô Gôvinda-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
dig-danti-vrâta-nêtrâruṇa-ruchi deseyaṃ parvvit alt-alt id udyad- |
...... mîr̤ade ..... | page pâdâkrântam âge jasadiṃ dig-bhi- |
ttigaḷaṃ dhavaḷisidaṃ dhare | pogaḷal Gôvinda-Râja-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ ǁ
Râya-jhaḷappana bhuja-kau- | kshêyakav enip aḷavan ânta Gôvinda-chamû- |
nâyakanoḷ seṇasuvavaṃ | nâyakadoḷ seṇasuv-oḍeda kâjaṃ pôlkuṃ ǁ
ettaṇa para-maṇḍaḷamuṃ | muttiṅg oḷagâgi dâradant irppuvu kâ- |
yd ettaloḍan emam id ên u- | dvṛittano raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ Gôvindaṃ ǁ
vaṃ Danujântakaṃ gaḍ adhidaivam id êṃ kṛita-kṛityan aṇṇa Gô- |

div.p:
gadya ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâya-
kaṃ śishṭêshṭa-janâbhîshṭa-phaḷa-pradâyakaṃ | Śrî-kântâ-kânta-śrî-pâda-paṅkaja-śiḷîmukhaṃ | samara-
mukha-Shaṇmukhaṃ | Lâṭânvaya-lalâṭa-maṅgaḷa-tiḷakaṃ | dharmma-śravaṇa-jâta-harsha-puḷakaṃ
kîrtti-kaumudî-vikasita-dig-vadhû-nayana-kairavaṃ | raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ | Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-
vijaya-dakshiṇa-bhuja-daṇḍaṃ | viprânvayôdayâchaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ
śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ mane-verggaḍe-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Gôvindamayyaṃ Banavase-pannirchchhây-
iramuṃ Sântaḷige-sâyiramuṃ eraḍ-ar̤u-nûr̤uṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷanuṃ pannâya ...... ttam irddu śrîmad-
râjadhâni-Balipura-varadoḷ ǁ

lg.l: peḍe-varal-eḷe-visiloḷ teḷ- | poḍeya-alar alardd eseye Padmajaṃ rañjipa-pû- |
miḍivol ire lîleyim pâl- | gaḍal .............. śayana ǁ
virachisal oppuv Abdhiśaya-mûrtti-samanvitam âge râgadiṃ ǁ
Jaḷaśayanan-oḍane bandudo | jaḷanidhi kal̤iputte magaḷa môhadin ene kaṇ- |

div.p:
mâḍisi ǁ svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-guṇô-
pêtaruṃ | jagaj-janaika-pûtaruṃ | akuṇṭha-Vaiku ...... kṛita-tadîya-pâda-pîṭhôpakaṇṭha-bhûtaḷaruṃ
kîrtti-viya .... raṅgiṇî-pravâha-pûrita-viyat-taḷaruṃ | ajiṃha-brâhmyânushṭhâṇa-nishṭharuṃ | nija-pavi-
........ shṭharuṃ | .......... kṛita-śatamakha-prabhâvâkampita-Śatamakharuṃ | chatur-vvêda-
Chaturmmukharuṃ | vipra-vaṃśa-pradîparuṃ | avandhya-śâparuṃ | śrêyô-nidhâna-dîpa-varttigaḷuṃ |
.......... gaḷum enisid irppat-ayvad-irvvar-mmahâjanaṅgaḷge śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada
39 neya Jaya-saṃvatsarada Chaitrada puṇṇave-Âdivâra-grahaṇa-vyatîpâta-saṅkra .......... pâra-
mêśvara-dattiâgi tâmmra-śâsanaṃ paḍedu śrîmad-râjadhâni-Balipurada taḷavṛitti Savatikhaṇḍada
bayalaṃ kâlgarchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ sarvva-namasyaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihârav-
âgi koṭṭar â-vṛittige sîme (here follow details of boundaries) ant alli dêvara nitya-nivêdya-pûjâ-punaskâra-
Chaitra-pavitra-khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakke (here follow details of gift and usual final phrases).

div.head:
138
On another stone in the same place.

lg.l: sa Vishṇuḥ krôḍâtmâ sura-ripu-vijêtâ vijayatê ǁ
ambhôdhêr udvahan urvvîm âdi-Pôtrî punâtu vaḥ |
chirâya Śivayôr bhûyât saṅgamô maṅgaḷâya vaḥ |
ânasê jagatâṃ jâgraj-janmani svayam êva yaḥ ǁ
pṛithvî pṛithvyâ samaṃ lakshmîr akshîṇâ yat-samâśrayâ |
yas tu nâjîgaṇad vastu-jâtam artthi-gaṇê dadat ǁ
yat-vikrama-kramaṃ śrutvâ viśîrṇṇaṃ vidvishâm uraḥ ǁ
śrî-Ballâḷa-nṛipâdhipaḥ kshitim imâm âkrâmati smâśramaḥ ǁ
Śêsha-sîrshṇîva yad-dôshṇi Dhâtâ dhâtrî-taḷaṃ nyadhât ǁ

div.p:
asya vîra-Ballâḷa-bhûpâḷasya-pâda-padmôpajîvî sakaḷa-lakshmî-patis Chhâvaṇa-sênâpatir gguṇa-rat-
nâkaraḥ |
