lg.l: guṇânâṃ gaṇanê tasya guṇinaḥ kaḥ kaviḥ prabhuḥ |

div.p:
tasya Viśvâmitra-gôtra-pavitra-Châvaṇa-daṇḍâdhipatês Chendala-Dêbyâṃ prâchyâm ahaskara(y) iva
samutpannas sakaḷa-kamaḷa-patiḥ prakhyâta-râya-daṇḍanâtha-gaṇḍa-peṇḍâra-lâñchhanaḥ dvâ-
saptatau yôga-nipuṇaḥ Padmi-Dêvaś [ś]ûrâṇâm agraṇîr ggâyakair itthaṃ gîyatê ǁ
yasya ...... śastra-pariśrama-gôshṭhîshu |

lg.l: kampantê kôśam utsṛijya jitâś śatru-mahîbhujaḥ ǁ

div.p: yasya |

têna vîra-Ballâḷa-bhûpêna prasâdîkṛitâṃ sapta-dvîpâlaṅkṛita-dharaṇî-lalâmôpamâna-Jambû-dvîpê sâ-
rabhûta-Bhârata-varsha-madhya-vartti-Kuntaḷa-bhûtaḷâlaṅkaraṇa-Vanavâsiṃ dvâdaśa-sahasra-sammi-
tâṃ bhûmiṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ bhuñjânaḥ | tad-dêśa-jananîgṛihôpamânê | surâsura-pratishṭhita-
liṅga-sahasra-prasiddha-mahasi | vividha-śruti-svara-sammiḷat-tri-sandhyam-abhihanyamâna-ghanâtôd-
ya-nâdôpahata ...... Balipurê nivêsita-skandhâvâraḥ Padmi-Dêvaḥ tat-pura-prasiddha-Hutavaha-
pratishṭhitasya | Agnîśvarâbhidhâna-sujana-prasiddha-kaḷâtiśaya-sampanna-pâda-paṅkaja-pûjâ-rachana-
chaturaḥ sa daṇḍâdhipaḥ pratidinaṃ taṃ dêvaṃ ........ tatra sthaḷâchâryya-paramparâ-prasiddhir
îdṛiśî ǁ

lg.l: kulam êtâdṛiśaṃ lakshmîḥ yênâvâpa muni-śriyâ ǁ
yas tu sarvva-guṇair yyuktô babyas sêbyaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ ǁ

div.p:
taṃ Dêvaśivam âhûya sa cha Padma-daṇḍâdhipatiḥ | Saka-nṛipa-saṃvatsaram ârabhya śatâdhika-
sahasrôpari sapta-daśamê Ânanda-saṃvatsarê Mârggaśîrsha ........ yâṃ Sômavârê byatîpâta-
yôgê tasyaiva Agnîśvara-sthaḷasya aṅga-bhôgâdi-samasta-dêva-kâryya ......... tasya Dêvaśiva-paṇḍi-
tasya pâdau prakshâlya pûrvva-praśiddha-pura-kshêtra-rûpâṃ nidhi-nikshêpa-sahitâṃ sthaḷa-vṛittiṃ
* So in the original. râja-râjapursha-yir-vvalan aṅguli-prêkshaṇîyâṃ sarvva-namasyaṃ kṛitvâ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ datta-
vân | tam imaṃ sakala-jana-harshôtkarshaṃ | adhaḥ-kṛitâśêsha-kalmashaṃ dâna-vibhavam avalôkya |
api cha ǁ

tatra pura-kshêtrayôḥ Karṇṇâṭa-vâṇyâ sîmâ-prasiddhir îdṛiśî (here follow details of boundaries and
usual final verses) ôṃ namaś Śivâya ǁ

div.head:
139
At the same village, on a vîrakal near the pond of the Hosa-maṭha.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Bijjaṇa-Dêvarasaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyi-
uttam ire Banavase-nâḍa daṇḍanâyakaṃ Padmarasana besadiṃ Dakshiṇa-Kêdâra-dêvara pâdârâ-
dhakarum appa Vâmaśakti-dêvara bandiya hiḍidalli Toṇavattiya mer̤egâr̤a Bâbeya-Nâyaka kâdi-
svarggasthan âdalli aḷiya Madukeya-Bâbeya kallan irisi vîra-sâḷan ettisida ǁ śrî

div.head:
140
On a vîrakal on the bund of the same pond.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-chakravartti śrî-vîra-Râmachandra-Râya-vijaya-râjyôdayada 14 neya Târaṇa-
saṃvatsarada Chaitra-su 1 Âdivâradandu svasti śrîmatu ubhaya-nânâ-dêśiya-vîra-Baṇañj . pavîṇaṃ
Baḷḷigrâmeya chalad-aṅka-Mâdi-Seṭṭiyaru Kuppeya mutti kâdidalli vîra-Meyi-dêvanu yâḷa mêle yâḷa
kâdali taḷt ir̤idu mer̤adu bâḷu-dalegaḷaṃ hiridu sura-ḷôka-prâptan âda ǁ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrîḥ ǁ

div.head:
141
On a stone at the same place.
div.p:
śrîmad-Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa bhuja-baḷa-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-vîra-Râmachandra-Râyaru
râjyâbhyudayada 16 neya Byaya-saṃvatsarada Âśvîja .............. Sômavâradandu bhâra-
sṛiṅkhaḷavanu Siṃha-dêva-pada ........ vana-jita ........ yakâ sanda Tâtyâ-Nâyakâ Bâla-Mulârâya-
Nâyaka hadi .............. Nâyaka ......... maleya-râya-sthâpanâchâryya Nêṇapâḷa-dêvana sarv-
vâṅga-lakshmi Yallubâyiya kumâra sakaḷa-guṇa-sampannan appa Gaṇêśvaranu âtana prâṇêśvari Bom-
mâyi kûḍi patibratâ-gunadiṃ agni-pravêśaṃ mâḍi saṅgrâma-raṅgadoḷu svargga-prâptar âdaru maṅ-
gaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
142
At the same village, on a vîrakal near the Tripurântaka temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Er̤eyayaṇa-dâṇakaru Siṅgi-Dêvana mêle
naḍedu kâdida ǁ Tripurântakara bâgila Tippu-bôva palambaraṃ kondu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ âtana
vîragallu ǁ

div.head:
143
On a 2nd stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara varshada 17 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-ba 1 Sô
Baḷḷigâmeyadal uḷḷa Nâgi-Seṭṭi sileya .......... keḍisi ...... yâ-Kêtanahaḷḷiyali daḷad-âḷigaroḍane
tâge .... taḷt iridu palaraṃ kondu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
144
On a 3rd stone at the same place.
div.p:
ôṃ namaś Śivâya svasti śrîmat-Kal̤achuryya-chakravartti Âhavamalla-Dêva-varshada Sârvvari-saṃ-
vatsarada Phâlguṇad amâvâse-Sômavâradandu śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhâna anta[ḥ]pura-verggaḍe mahâ-
pasâyitaṃ Kêśimayya-daṇḍanâyakaru Banavase-pannirchhâsirama dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-prati-
pâlanavaṃ mâḍutta mahâ-râjadhâni-Baḷḷigrâmeyalu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadi râjyaṃ geyutta yidda
ondu devasaṃ śrîmatu tanna lêṅka vurvvaṭya-birudaran ervvaṭṭi baḍivaṃ Savagaḍada-nâyakara tale-
yaṃ kâva birudara gôva vârige tappuva lêṅkara gaṇḍa Śiva-pâda-śêkharaṃ mahâ-Mâhêśvaraṃ taḷâr̤a
Kêtamalla-Nâyaka-pramukhavâgi Mâyileya bavarakke halaraṃ hêḷalu yelarinda muṅguḷa-dâyavâgi
naḍedu yidir-ântaraṃ halaraṃ kondu svâmi-kâryyavaṃ ner̤ahi sura-lôka-prâptan âdan âtaṅge parô-
ksha-vinayaman avara bhâva Kâḷeya-Nâyakanu maga Mahadêva-Nâyakanu Padmavve-Nâyakitiyuṃ
nilisida vîra-sâsana maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
145
On a 4th stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-chakravartti vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva-varshada 15 neya Krôdhi-saṃvatsara-Chai-
tra-śuddha 10 Sômavâradandu svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ bâhatara-
niyôgâ .... nara-dêvâdhipati samaḷa ...... lakshmî-patig .. yôgyatâ-Yôgandharaṃ pati-kâryya-dhu-
randharaṃ râya-daṇḍanâtha gaṇḍa-peṇḍâraṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Gôparasa-daṇḍanâyakaru
śrîmatu Banavase-pannirchchhâsirakke râjadhâni Baḷḷigrâmeyamaṃ nâḍavamaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-
sishṭa-paripâḷanaṃ mâḍi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire .......... śrîmad-anâdiy-
agrahâra-Jambûru-siddhâyake nika .. taḷevi kaṭṭisi maggavaṃ baḍi .................... nâyakaru
teṅka nama .................................... sabbâya .................. dâyav âgadaṃ
nâyakâchâryyaṃ kadana-Triṇêtraṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ ............... adhikaṃ nuḍida ........
nâyakaraṃ ...... Dêvapa-Nâyakaru (rest illegible)

div.head:
146
At the same village, on a pillar in the Anantaśayana temple.
div.p:
............ svasti śrî Kaḷachuriya .......... chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla Bijja[ṇa-Dêva] Chaitra-
sudda 1 Âdityavâra-sûryya-grahaṇa-vyatîpâtadandu Hîrapeya-Nâyakana putra Gajjeya-sâhani
mâḍisida śrî-Guṇḍêśvara-dêvara pûje-punaskârak endu Banavase-nâḍa heggaḍe daṇḍanâyakaṃ Kêsi-
mayyaṅgaḷa kaṭṭid-alagu Sûryya-Dêvana putraṃ gôtra-pavitraṃ Śiva-pâda-sêkharaṃ Baḷḷigâveya
taḷâr̤a Sôveya-Nâyakanuṃ paḷihata-garaṇa ... gaḷuṃ pura-nagaraṅgaḷa sannidhiyoḷ paṭṭaṇada
taḷâr̤ikeya suṅkadâyadoḷage 10 vittiṅgam vettina suṅkamaṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭar (usual final
phrases) Śivaika-śaraṇaṃ Rêcharasana barepa ǁ

div.head:
148
At the same village, on a vîrakal in the gateway of the Kâśîmaṭha.

lg.l: ṭṭiya sati Jaina-dharmmada tavarmmaney â-pati-bhaktiyalli Sî- |
teya negaḷda Timauveya samâna negaḷteye Padmiyarkkan o- |

div.p:
Arhaṃ ǁ svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-chakravartti vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva-varsada 16 r̤e neya Viśvâvasu-saṃvat-
sarad uttarâyaṇada saṅkrânti-Pusyad-amâvâse-Âdityavâradandu paṭṭaṇa-svâmi Mâḷi-Seṭṭiyara mada-
vaḷige Padmauve su-chittadiṃ samâdhi kûḍi svargga-prâptey âdaḷu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî-Vîta-
râgâya namaḥ ǁ

div.head:
149
At the same village, on a vîrakal in Patel Garjina Channa-Vîrappa’s garden.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjam paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvaru vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhim â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti
śrî .......... matu Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 38 neya Nandana-saṃvatsarada śrîmatu piriya-
daṇḍanâyaka Anantapâḷayyana besadi śrîmatu daṇḍanâyaka Gôvindarasaru Banavase-pannirchchhâ-
siramuma âḷuttam ire śrî ...... daṇḍanâyaka Gôvindarasara basadinde Baḷḷigrâmeya tur̤u pariyalu
kâda Kaṇiya-Rêvayya-Nâyakaṃ palambaru maleharaṃ kondu tur̤uvaṃ maguḷchi sura-loka-prâptan âda

lg.l: kshaṇa-vidhvaṃsanê kâyê kâ chintâ maraṇê raṇê ǁ

div.head:
150
At the same place, on another stone.
div.p:
ôṃ namaś Śivâya svasti śrîmatu Kaḷachuryya-bhuja-bala-chakravartti râya-Murâri Sôvî-Dêva-
varshada 4 neya Khara-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-bahuḷad amâvâsye-Sômavâradandu śrîmatu-râja-guru
Vâmaśakti-dêvara putra Dâsi-Seṭṭi Muddauveya maga ...... Holeya-Nâyaka ........... daḷḷiyiṃ
baruttaṃ Sâliyûra Saṇḍad eḍeyalli paḷambar kkaḷḷa .......... nâyakaru baḍa ........ tâgey avara
kâdi kondu sura-lôka-prâptan âdan âtana vîrav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: tvaritadin echchu kûr-ggaṇegaḷim dhareg ikki karaṃ kaḍaṅgi bhô- |
rggared irad eydi gêṇgaḷane kitt ir̤iv aṅkada nâyakarkkaḷaṃ |
surigeyan ântu kondu dhuradoḷ iḷd aḷidaṃ paḍe-mechche Helliga ǁ
mechch emag end âgasadiṃ | chechcharam iḷitandu koṇḍu pôdar nnaḷavin- |
d achcharaseyar âdaradin | d achcharivaḍe bhû-janaṅgaḷ â-Helliganaṃ ǁ

div.p: Sômôja-Barmmôjana kelasaṃ ǁ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
151
At the same village, at the bottom of the Garuḍa-kambha near the gateway.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tilakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Banavâsi-pura-varêśvaraṃ Mahâlakahmî-
labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ tyâga-vinôda âyadâchâryyan asahâya-śauryyaṃ gaṇḍara gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍa-bhê-
ruṇḍaṃ mûr̤u-râyâsthâna-kali biruda-maṇḍaḷika-vṛishabha-Śaṅkaraṃ ripu-nṛipa-bhayaṅkaraṃ
kaligaḷa mogada kai birudar-âdityaṃ pratyaksha-Vikramâdityaṃ gaṇḍa-kâḷânalaṃ Koṅkaṇa-dallaḷaṃ
gaṇḍara Mêru âśrita-jana-kalpa-taru vibudha-santarppaṇaṃ maṇḍaḷika-mukha-darppaṇan ari-
maṇḍaḷika-gaja-kaṇṭhîrava Âhavamalla-Dêvana Haṇuvaṃ śatru-kshatrâbdhi-baḍabânaḷaṃ Kaṇagile-
vâḍa-dâvânaḷaṃ Kannama-diśâpaṭṭaṃ Duddha-gharaṭṭaṃ jagad-êka-dâni śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêś-
varaṃ Châvuṇḍa-Râyarasara Banavâse-pannirchchâsiramumaṃ Sântaḷige-sâsiramumaṃ Haivey-
aynûr̤umaṃ paśchima-samudra-paryyantaṃ-baram âḷuttam ire |

lg.l: d âvagam oppe dâna-guṇad unnatiyaṃ ner̤e tâḷdi viśva-vi- |
dyâ-vidarg artthamaṃ piridan îva negal̤teya dâniy endu nâ- |
Inajane dâni dânigaḷoḷ âtanu munte hiraṇya-dâni varṇ- |
ṇanege hiraṇya-dâna-guṇam ondum ad êguvad endu mechchad o- |
stra-nikara-dâniy endu mahi vaṇṇipud î-jagadeka-dâniyaṃ ǁ
negal̤da vanîpaka-vrajake râyana koṭṭa podaḷda ponna-râ- |
jigaḷuman eyde nôḍi manam ikki gal̤illene sattu mâyda lô- |
bhigaḷa pavaṇgoḷal manujar irkk Ajan âdaḍam êṃ samartthanê ǁ
besanaṃ Traiḷôkymallaṃ besasidan el elê bandapaṃ râyan ant â- |
besanaṃ kaikoṇḍu bhû-maṇḍaḷamum ar̤idud im bârad êk irppan end a- |
rbbisidar daṅgar ssuruḷdar mmalepar ahita-sâmantar aḷḷâḍidar nnô- |
ḍi saḍiḷdar gGûrjjarar ssañchaḷisidar adhikar Chêra-Chôḷâdi-bhûpar ǁ
ariyaṅg urkkuḍi ballidaṅge ghaṭa-sarppaṃ gaṇḍu-dôrppaṅge mâ- |
ri raṇârambhige kâḷa-chakram ur̤ad âṭarppaṅg agurbb appa da- |
ḷḷ-uri mârkkoḷva bhaṭaṅge tâṃ bar̤a-siḍil dôr-ddarppadind urkki ma- |
chcharipaṅg achchariyiṃ kolalk el̤alda siṃhaṃ gaṇḍa-kâḷânaḷaṃ ǁ
eḷeyoḷ baḷed aḍardu diśâ- | vaḷiyan dâṅguḍi maraldu pallavisi nabha- |
sthaḷadiṃ matt attal id êṃ | baḷedudo kîrtti-late gaṇḍa-kâḷânaḷana |

div.p:
svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Châmuṇḍa-Râyarasar sSaka-varsha 969 tteneya Sarvvajit-
saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-śuddha-daśami-Bṛihaspativâradandu śrîmaj-Jagadêkamallêśvara-Dêvara
munte gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa-stambhamaṃ nilisi mahâ-tyâgaṃ geydu śrîmad-Anantaśivâchâryyara
kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Bhêruṇḍêśvara-dêvargge Jiḍḍulig-el̤pattara bal̤iya Harva-
Garbbûrumaṃ (here follow details of further gift and their boundaries) sarvva-namasyaṃ
sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâram âgi koṭṭar (usual final phrases and verses) mattav î-dêgulada pratibaddhav-
âge Kunda-Râjana taṅge Bîchabarasige ûriṃ mûḍaṇa Bhêruṇḍêśvarada taḷa-vṛitti pulleya-bayala
mûḍaṇa pattugeyale Bhêruṇḍa-gaḷeyal koṭṭa gal̤deya mattar pattu idaṃ pratipâḷisidaṅge pûrvvôkta-
Râma-prârtthaneya phala

div.head:
152
At the same village, on the Śûla-Brahmayyana-kallu in Kiṭṭadahaḷḷi Channa-Basappa’s back-yard.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśryaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêva-vijaya-râjyam uttarô-
ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire tat-tanûbhavaṃ śrîmach-Châ-
ḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmânaḍi Vikramâ ... Dêvar Gaṅgavâḍi 96 sâyiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-
pratipâḷanaṃ geyd âḷuttam ire śrî-Ballavarasar pPânuṅgalla kôṭege vijayaṃ geyye śrîmat-Kaḍamba-
Satyâśraya-Dêvaṃ Kâṇanûr âḷuttam ire Tuḷuva-Chaṇḍigaṃ ...... beralge veḷeyen endu nuḍidu śrî-
Ballavarasar sSatyâśraya-Dêvanu Banavâseya kôṭeyumaṃ Pannirchchhâsiradal pasâya ....... dêva
vṛittiyumaṃ daye geydu koṭṭa beralaṃ kaḍiye Śaka-varsha 981 neya Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Mâga-su
4 Âdityavâradandu Permmâḷu-dêvâlyakaṃ Tuḷuva-Chaṇḍigaṃ Bhêruṇḍêśvaraman êr̤i .... biḷd êr̤ina
mone-negedu .... sura-lôka-prâtan âdaṃ

div.head:
153
At the same village, on a stone in the burial ground.
div.p:
ôṃ namaś Śivâya Gaṇapatibhyô namaḥ ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahâ-
râjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ malli-
kâmôdaṃ râya-gaja-kêsari gaṇḍaroḷ gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍa-peṇḍâr̤aṃ Chôḷôgra-kâḷânaḷaṃ vidagdha-râya ..
vitra-guṇa-maṇi ari-râya-taleya karavatta râya-pratâpa .......... śauryya-Nârâyaṇaṃ chauvâṇa-
Sahasrabâhu ............ Dêvara śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ ..
siṅga-Dêvar gGhaṭṭadaker̤eya nelevîḍinal sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Saka-
varsha 960 neya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada ........ Âdityavâradand uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyandu
svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-shaḍ-aṅgôpêta ....
...... śâstra-pârâvâra-pâragar avadâta-kîrtti .......... bhayâpahâra ...... kuḷa-samuddharaṇa
guṇa-ratna-nidhâna jana ...... Bhâratî-karṇṇapûra Rudrâvatâra .... sarôvara-râjahaṃsa ......
...... kuṇḍaḷa-gaṇḍa-sthaḷa nija-kîrtti-sthagita-nabhas-sthaḷa ........ vakhaṇḍana Parbbatavaḷiya
Kâḷâmukhara gaṇḍa ............ gâveya santati ........ śrîmat-Kriyâsakti-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ
karchchi Benakanakoḷada Siddhêśvara-dê .... dêgulava mâḍi î-dêvara gandha-dhûpa-nivêdyakkam
alliya vidyârtthi-tapôdhanar-aśanâchchhâdanakk endu Beṇṇeyaker̤eya keḷage kachchhaviya gaḷeyoḷ
biṭṭa mattar ppanneraḍumaṃ Benakanakoḷadiṃ paḍuvalu purakke mattav â-gaḷeyoḷ mattar eraḍu-
maṃ biṭṭar (rest contains usual final phrases and verses).

lg.l: aṇiviṇi geyd î-dharmman | aṇiyaram aḷidaṅge peratu gatiy ill â-bal- |
kaṇi Vâraṇâsiyal brâ- | hmaṇaruṃ pasugaḷman aḷidan Ajagujig iḷidaṃ ǁ

div.p: (rest effaced).

div.head:
154
At the same village, on a stone to the north of the gateway of Vanakêhoṇḍada Basappa’s temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî Vinayâditya Râjâśraya śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara bhaṭâra pṛithivî-
râjyaṃ keye śrî-Pogilli-Sêndraka-mahârâjar Nâyarkhaṇḍamuṃ Jeḷugûr-âḷgeyan âḷuttu Kândarbôr
adhikârigaḷ âge periyâ-osageyuṃ alavaṇavuṃ aputraka porudumân viṭṭâr Vaḷḷirggâmeyara Dâsa-
ḍiyuṃ Amaliyara dêvaḍiyuṃ Vedevaḷḷiyarâ dêvaḍiyuṃ Alaṃvaḷḷiyarâ-Ravichandanuṃ Sokka-
Gâmuṇḍaruṃ Edeya-Gâmuṇḍaruṃ Moḷeûra Maṇiya-Gâmuṇḍaruṃ Nâgavaḷḷiyaruṃ Aṇḍugiyâ gâmiga-
ruṃ Nîrilliyâ-Sinder̤a-gâmigaruṃ mukham âge eraḍuṃ nâl̤ke râja-śrâvitam âge prasâdaṃ keydâr idân
aḷivon Vâraṇâsiyaḷuḷ sâsira-kavileyuṃ pârvvarumân konda pañcha-mahâ-pâtaka-saṃyutan akkuṃ
idân koḷe îrel̤pattar̤uḷaṃ okkaltanaṃ keyvon â-vittidalli veḷeyâde keḍuge idân kâdu salvon parama-
kalyâṇa-bhâgigaḷ âppôr nelanuṃ veḷeg â-pârvvaruṃ prajeyuṃ taṇige

div.head:
156
At the same place, on a vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-chakravartti vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva 28 neya varisa Dundumi-savachcharadandu
bahuḷad amâse-dîpâḷige eṇṭaneya devasa Âdivâradanduṃ Âgiya-Bommayyana maga Siriṇṇâ
.. haḷi huḍida Baleya-daṇṇâyakanu lage-sura ba[n]du Baniyûra bavarada kuḍuva gâḷadali taḷt ir̤idu
sura-lôka-prâpitan âda âtana tamma Raḍisaḍimu vaḍisida

div.head:
157
On a 2nd stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Châḷukya-Vikrama-varsha mûvatt-êḷaneya Vijaya-saṃvatsara-Śrâvaṇa-bahuḷa ......
.... śrîman-mahâ-pradhâna-vara Kôvaiya-daṇḍanâyaka ........ Gôvindarasaru teṅkaṇa-Goggiya
mêl etti Kallûraṃ suṭṭa mêle ........ kâḷegadalu Ballahana Sirikama-sâhaṇi .... paya-Nâyakan-
aḷiya Bopeya-sâhaṇi palavaṃ ........ prâptan âda

div.head:
158
On a 3rd stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Kaḷachuryya-chakravartti Âhavamalla-Dêva-varshada 3 neya Sârvvari-saṃvatsarad
Kârttika-sudda 1 pâḍiva-Âdivâradandu Mâguṇḍiya Sôvarasamaiya-daṇḍanâya[ka] Tantrahâḷa-Heḷale-
Nâyakanaṃ muttikoḷḷuvalli Heḷaya-Nâyakana maga Kêtaman âtana hind ikki halaran ânt ir̤idu
sura-lôka-prâptan âdan adaṭara gaṇḍa ǁ paṭṭaṇada kuḷa-karaṇi

div.head:
159
On a 4th stone.
div.p:
svasti .... kravartti ............ yaṇan Âhavamalla-Dêva-varshada 8 neya Śôbhakṛit-saṃvat-
sarada Ashâḍha-bahuḷa-pañchamî-Sômavâradandu ...... yana maga Vîraṇana tamma Poḍaleya
handi-bêṭeya pôdalli kalitanaṃ berasi taḷt ir̤idu sura-lôka-prâptan âda

div.head:
160
On a 5th stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Châmuṇḍa-Râyarasar Banavâse-pannirchchhâsiramaṃ sukhadin
âḷuttam ire 968 neya Vyaya-saṃvatsarada Mârggasira-sudda 5 ...... vâradandu râjadhâni-Balligâ-
veya Seṭṭi .... yana aḷiya Sovuḷêra-Nâgadêvaya ...... giyabbe-seṭṭitiyu tamma .............

div.head:
161
On a 6th stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu nija-bhuja-chakravartti Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râman êkâṅga-
vîraṃ Bijjaṇa-Dêvara vijaya-râjyadalli Banavase-nâḍaṃ Kariya-Kêsimayyan-âḷikeyalli tatu-samayadalli
Bandaḷikeg etti naḍedalli Âgarakka-Nâgaṇṇan âḷutanavaṃ mâḍi sura-lôka-prâptan âda

div.head:
162
On a 7th stone.
div.p:
ôṃ namaś Śivâya ǁ svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmatu Kaḷachuryya-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti
Bijjaṇa-Dêva mûr̤aneya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-bahuḷa 14 Maṅgaḷavâradandu
Dâsimeyana maga Kêtaṇa Baḷḷigrâmeya tur̤uvaṃ magurchchi sura-lôka-prâptan âda dêvara-dêvana
kûḍida ǁ

div.head:
164
At the same village, on the flooring stone in front of the Sîtâ temple in Sîtekoṇa.
div.p:
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-pratâpa-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-varshada 11 neya Vibhava-saṃvat-
sarada Phâlguṇa-śuddha-êkâdasî-Âdivâradandu śrîmatu-Brahma-Kshatriyârnnavôtpanna Bihila-
gôtrada Bhukshi-Nâyakara sutaṃ Tihuṇa-Nâyakaru Gôvindapurada pañchaviṃśati Nârâyaṇa-dêvara
Brahmapurigaḷa kayyal agnishṭhagege koṭṭa gadyâ 1 r̤a vṛiddhiyal mahâjanaṅgaḷ â-chandrârkkaṃ
naḍasuvaru Śrîvatsa-gôtrada daṇḍanâyaka-Bammarasana tammaṃ Basavarasa koṭṭa ga 1 Baytaleya
Sôvarasa koṭṭa ga 1 Vaishṇava-Pandâḍa-Nâyaka koṭṭa ga 1 ivar̤a vṛiddhiyal agnishṭhageyaṃ naḍasu-
varu Jalagin-adhikâri Sôvarasa koṭṭa gadyâ 1 r̤a vṛiddhiyalu Brâhmaṇargge gandhava mahâjanaṅgaḷ
â-chandrârkkaṃ naḍasuvaru (usual final phrases).

div.head:
165
At the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-pratâpa-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-varśada 12 neya śrî-Śukla-
saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-bahuḷa-amâvâsye-Sômavâradandu śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sênâdhipati
Banavase-nâḍa herggaḍe-daṇḍanâyakaṃ kumâraṃ Bhûlôkamalla-Dêvarasara sandhi-vigrahiy Âcha-
rasaru Gôvindapurada pañchaviṃśati Nârâyaṇa-dêvara Brahmapurigaḷa kayyalu parvva-parbbada
sauparṇṇada tâmbûḷakke biṭṭa gadyâṇa 1 r̤a vṛiddhiyal mahâjanaṅgaḷ â-chandrârkkaṃ naḍasuvaru ǁ

div.head:
166
At the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-chakravartti-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-varshada ?13 neya Âṅgira-saṃ-
vatsarada Vaiśâkha-bahuḷa 11 Śukravâradandu śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bhivaṇayya-daṇḍanâyakara
marmmaṃ mahâ-pradhânaṃ sênâdhipati sâvâśigaḷ-adhishṭhâyakaṃ Banavase-nâḍa herggaḍe-daṇḍa-
nâyakaṃ Malli-Dêvarasara mâvaṃ madhya-dêśi-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sandhi-vigrahi Kâlaḍi-tombbatt-
âr̤ar̤a Chavuṇḍahaḷḷiya Dêvappeya-Nâyakara marmma Kir̤ugêriya mahâ-prabhu Chavuṇḍarasar śrî-
mach-chaturvviṃśati-Jalaśayana-dêvaralli ubhayêkâdaśiyal 2 r Brâhmaṇara agrâsanakke koṭṭa gadyâ-
ṇa 1 r̤a vṛiddhiyalu mahâjanaṅgaḷu chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ naḍasuvaru ǁ avara putraṃ Maiḷugi-
Dêva Jalaśayana-dêvara śikhege devasa 2 ḍ sêvantî-pushpakke koṭṭa . 1 r̤a vṛiddhiyalu mahâjanaṅ-
gaḷu chandrârkkaṃ-baraṃ naḍasuvaru ǁ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
167
At the same village, on a stone in Gurupâdappa’s field.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1652 ya Sâdhâraṇa-saṃ-Mâgha-śu 10 yallu Gara-
jina Śânta-Oḍêra mâvina-tôpaṃ mane ........ naḍasuva dharmmakke â-chandrârkkam astu

div.head:
168
At the same village, on a stone in the Jakkavvana maṭṭi.
div.p:
svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrî-Yâ .......... chakravartti vîra-Ballâḷu-Dêva-varshada 11
neya .. khi-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-su 13 Sômavâ[ra]dandu śrîmad-râjadhâni-Baḷigrâmeya ........
hâri Honnugundada Chandi-Seṭṭi Jakkiya ..... ḷadiṃ teṅkalu gabde kamma 10 maṃ Ammêśvara ...
vara nivêdyakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâ .. kaṃ Pañchamaṭha .. maṭha Bhêruṇḍêśvarad
âchâryyar mMûliga-Pâdaśiva-dêvara kâluṃ karchchi .... dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭar (usual final
phrases).

div.head:
169
At the same village, on a stone in Baḷḷi-Kâḍappa’s field.

lg.l: Âdi-nṛipa-charitan akhiḷa-vi- | nôdade râjyaṃ geyuttam irdda sukha .... |
[Kâda]ravaḷḷiya vîḍino- | ḷ âdaradiṃ sârvvabhauman Âhavamallaṃ ǁ
anatôddṛiptâri- .. pâḷaran adaṭaled âṭandu jîy ayya bâpp emb- |
anituṃ dig-danti-dantam-baram esed ire nishkaṇṭakaṃ .. viśvâ- |
vaniyaṃ Traiḷôkyamalla-kshitipati sukhadiṃ santam âḷuttam irddaṃ ǁ
...... pâdâmbuja-madhu- | karan ene Sahavâsi Hampa-Chaṭṭaṃ negardaṃ |
dharaṇiyo .. kula-vadhu | Girisuteg eṇe Nâgiyakkan abaḷâ-tiḷakaṃ ǁ
vineyada .... satyada tavarmmane châgada janma-bhûmi mân- |
tanad er̤evaṭṭu mikk ar̤ita .... oḷpina ratna-râśi rû- |
pina nidhi .. neṭṭane kulâṅgane Mâdana chitta |
jana-nuta Nâgiyakkan abaḷâ-janadoḷ nava-ratnam allaḷê ǁ
aḍuv el̤e .... besan allade peṇḍatig uṇṭu dushṭaraṃ |
kiḍisuva śishṭaraṃ porevan ugra .. appa nâḍa-per- |
ggaḍetanam ant adan taḷedum Âhavamallana chitta-vṛittiyo .. |
.... enalke pôlva narar âr ggaḷa Bâppure Nâgiyakkanaṃ ǁ
negaḷdirdda Baḷḷigâveyo- | ḷ agaṇya-puṇyâtme Nâgiyakkaṃ Târâ- |

div.p:
vachanaṃ ǁ antu ... nna mâḍisida .... Bhagavatig archchana-pûjanâ-nimittakam endu khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-
jî ........ du chakravarttige binnapaṃ geydu Paramêśvara-datti ...... 989 neya Plavaṅga-saṃ-
vatsarada Śrâvaṇa- ............ prabha Bauddha-bhaḷârara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrbba ......
Pañchamaṭha-sthâna (here follow usual final phrases and verses) sênabôva Châvuṇḍamayyaṃ baredaṃ
sâstra-karmmi Châvuṇḍôja khaṇḍarisidaṃ ǁ

div.head:
170
On a stone at the same place.

lg.l:
śa-stômârṇṇava-pârijâtan adaṭaṃ
* So in the original. Trailôkyamalla-bhûpaṃ ǁ
Âdi nṛipa-charitan akhiḷa-vi- | nôdade râjyaṃ geyuttam irdda sukhadin â- |
Kâdaravaḷḷiya bîḍino- | ḷ âdaradiṃ sârbbabhauman Âhavamalla ǁ
anatôddṛiptârî-[..]pâḷaran adaṭaled âṭandu jîy ayya bâpp emb- |
anituṃ dig-danti-dantam-baram esed ire nishkaṇṭakaṃ mâḍi viśvâ- |
vaniyaṃ Traiḷôkyamaḷla-kshitipati sukhadiṃ santam âḷuttam irddaṃ ǁ
sandaṃ Traiḷôkyamallaṃ bhavaṇi geḍe gajârûḍhan âdâgaḷ aḷḷâ- |
ḍidan Indraṃ maggidaṃ Pâvakan adar̤idan ugrântakaṃ berchchidaṃ dai- |
tya-durâtmaṃ Vârdhinâthaṃ naḍugidan Aniḷaṃ sukkidaṃ Yakshan uḷḷ-aḷ- |
kidan Îśaṃ bhîtîyindaṃ bedar̤indan ene mâr̤âmpar âr bhûmipâḷar ǁ

div.p:
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvî samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sâvâsigaḷ-adhishṭhâyakaṃ
Bedarigupe-bhaṇḍâri sarbbâdhyakshaṃ daṇḍanâyakaṃ Rûpa-bhaṭṭayyaṅgaḷu vaḍḍa-râvuḷamumaṃ
hadineṇṭ-agrahâramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ mâḍuttam irddu negaḷd irdda Baḷḷi-
gâveyalu śrîmatu Jayantî pra-Bhauddha-vihâravaṃ mâḍisi tavageyuṃ tamma mâḍisida Târâ Bhaga-
vatiya śrî-Kêśava-dêvara Lôkêśvara-dêva Bauddha-dêvara alliya samasta-parivâra-dêvara arch-
chana-pûjanâ-nimittakkaṃ mêle khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-nava-karmmakkaṃ yôginiyara kusaḷiyara sanyâsigaḷa
âhâra-dânakkaṃ Saka-varushada 986 Viśvâvasu-saṃvatsarada Mârggaśira-śuddha-tadige-Bṛihas-
pativâradandu chakravarttige binnapaṃ geyduṃ Paramêśvara-datti sarbba-namasyavâgi Jiḍḍuḷige-
nâḍ-oḷage Harige Mundase Baḷḷigâveya-nagara-Pañchamaṭha-sthânav oḷagâgi Râmêśvara-dêvara
haḍuvaṇa Aṇṇigaṭṭina keḷage kachchhaveya gaḷeyalu gadde mattar âr̤u (rest contains details of
boundaries and final phrases and verse).

div.head:
171
At Śîrêhaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p: ôm namas Śivâya

lg.l: êkô dêvas sa jayati Śivaḥ kêvala-jñâna-mûrtti
* So in the original. ........ tri-bhuvanam idaḥ yadri-bhûta-prapañcha |

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ Kâḷâñjana-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarnna-
vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ ḍamaruga-tûryya-nirghghôshaṇaṃ Kaḷachûriya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ kadana-
prachaṇḍaṃ mâna-Kanakâchaḷaṃ subhaṭar-âdityaṃ kaligaḷ-aṅ .. saṃ gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-
vajra-pañjaraṃ pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ ... vâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla chalad-
aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava nissaṅka-mallan ity-â[dy]-akhiḷa-nâmâ ...... virâjitam appa śrîmad-
bhuja-baḷa chakravartti râya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêvaṃ Kalyâṇada nele ..... sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadîṃ
râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire ǁ

lg.l: kadanakk eytanda Sôma-kshitipatiy enutaṃ bhîtiyiṃ gûḍu goṇḍa . ǁ

div.p:
....... samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Banavâsi-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Jayantî-
Madhu ..... labdha-vara-prasâda mṛigamadâmôda Triyaksha-kshumâ-sambhavaṃ chaturâśîti-
nagarâdhî ....... lôchanaṃ chatur-bbhuja jagaddhitâshṭâdaśâśvamêdha-dîkshita Himavad-
[gi]rîndra-rundra-śikhari ..... sthâpita-sphaṭika-śilâ-stambha-baddha-mada-gajêndra-mahâ-mahimâ-
bhirâmaṃ Kâdamba-chakri ..... ra-varmma-mahâ-mahîpâḷa-kuḷa-bhûshaṇaṃ permmaṭṭi-tûryya-
nirghghôshaṇaṃ śâkhâ .... virâjamâna-mânôttuṅga-siṃha-lâñchhanaṃ dattârtti-kâñchana samara-
jaya ..... barâbharaṇaṃ mârkkoḷvavara gaṇḍa pratâpa-mârttaṇḍa maṇḍaḷika ......... nâmâvaḷî-
virâjitam appa śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśva .......... pannirchhâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinô-
dadi râ ............ [pa]dmôpajîvi ǁ

........ dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâ .................... Nâgarâsi-paṇḍita-dêvara putra ....
................ kêsvara-paṇḍita-dêvargge ........ neya .................... Dêv-arasaruṃ
samasta-parigrahaṃ .................... eraḍa hiṭṭukâr̤aruṃ Kêti-Seṭiyuṃ .................
mundaṇa makkiya-bayaloḷage .................. dêvarige gadde kamma 50 kôḍiya Sômanâ ....
............ Sômanâtha-dêvarige kalu-vesake biṭṭa gadde matta ............

div.head:
172
At the same village, on a vîrakal in front of the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-[pra]tâpa-chakravartti śrî-Râmachandra[..] jyada 3 r̤a
neya Bhâva-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-bahuḷa 10 Sô .............. navaru .. leyahaḷḷiya haydu Bevuḍa-
Gauḍa Bachcha-Gauḍa ........ mummari-daṇḍamaṃ ner̤eya koṇḍuhôhali Aḷateya Mâcheya-Nâya-
kanu aḍaba .......... kâdi halabarumaṃ sura-lôka-prâpta ........ yavaru gauḍu-samasta-praje-
gaḷu hanneraḍu ........ kâdi kundirddu keyi kamba 5 ............

div.head:
173
At Mallênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p: ôṃ namaś Śivâya

svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-chakravartti-Ballaḷa-Dêva-varisada hanneraḍaneya Kâḷayukta-saṃvatsarada
Bhâdrapada-bahuḷa-daśamî-Budhavâradandu śrîmatu sarvva-namasya anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Chikka-Ker̤e-
yûra baḷiya bâḍada Malleyanâyakanahaḷiya śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Chaṭṭarasa-Dêvan ir̤idu
tur̤uvaṃ koṇḍuhôhalli â-haḷiya Hôcha-gavuṇḍa taḷt ir̤idu halaraṃ kondu tur̤uvaṃ magurchchi sura-
lôka-prâptan âda

lg.l: nelam ellaṃ mar̤uvakkam âgi maguḷpaṃ tann âyadiṃ nôḍe mâr- |
vvalam ellaṃ tale .... tâge bharadiṃ Hôchaṃ-gavuṇḍaṃ mahâ- |
baḷan ugrântakan-andadinde palaraṃ pêsêḷe kond ikki mey- |
gali sâsirvvaran eyde mechchisi Surêndrâvâsamaṃ porddidaṃ ǁ

div.head:
175
On a stone near the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-pratâpa-bhuja-baḷa-Siṅghaṇa-chakravartti-Vihaḷa-Dêva-varshada hadinâr̤aneya Chitra-
bhânu-saṃvatsarada Pâlguṇa-bahuḷa 8 Sômavâradalu śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Chikka-Kereyûra
baḷiya bâḍa Malleyanâykanahaḷḷiya Mâdara-Masaṇiganu teṅkaṇa-Nâyakaru kari-śileya hâydu tu-
r̤uvaṃ koṇḍuhôhâga â-Masaṇiganu tâgi taḷt ir̤idu palaraṃ kondu tur̤uvaṃ maguḷchi sura-lôka-
prâptan âda ǁ śrîmatu aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷu ...... samasta-prajegaḷu mukhyavâgi Ba .. Gavuḍanu
avana .. ttaru-Gavuḍarige .. ga 1 .. ker̤eya keḷage .................. biṭṭaru

div.head:
176
At Tâḷagunda (same hobli), on a pillar in front of the Praṇavêśvara temple.
div.p: siddhaṃ namaś Śivâya

lg.l: yat-prasâdas trâyatê nityaṃ bhuvana-trayaṃ pâpmanô bhayât ǁ
tad-upachâravat tadâśya tarôs sânâmya-sâdharmyam asya tat
êvam âgatê Kadamba-kulê śrîmân babhûva dvijôttamaḥ
yaḥ prayâya Pallavêndra-purîṃ guruṇâ samaṃ Vîraśarmmaṇâ
Kali-yugê ‘sminn ahô bata kshatrât paripêlavâ vipratâ yataḥ |
guru-kulâni samyag ârâddhya śâkhâm adhîtyâpi yatnataḥ
brahma-siddhir yyadi nṛipâdhînâ kim atar̤ paraṃ dushkham ity ataḥ ǁ
yô’ anta-pâlân Pallavêndrâṇâṃ sahasâ vinirjjitya saṃyugê
prâpya sênâ-sâgaraṃ têshâṃ prâhan balî śyênavat tadâ
Pallavêndrâ yasya śaktim imâṃ labdhvâ pratâpânvayâv api
nâpyarhau niśśrêyasîty uktvâ yam mitram êvâśu vavrirê |
saṃśritas tadâ mahipâlân ârâddhya yuddhêshu vikkramaiḥ
prâpa paṭṭa-bandha-sampûjâṃ kara-pallavair̤ Pallavair ddhṛitâṃ ǁ
yam abhishiktavân anudhyaya Sênâpatiṃ Mâtṛibhis saha ǁ
jyâyôbhis saha vigrahô’ rtthishu dayâ samyak prajâ-pâlanaṃ
taṃ bhûpâsh khalu mênirê sura-sakhaṃ Kâkustham atrâgataṃ ǁ
prâpuś śarmmâvyathita-manasô yasya bhûmiṃ praviśya ǁ
Lakshmy-aṅganâ dhṛitimatî suchiraṃ cha rêmê ǁ
Kubjas sva-kâvyam idam aśma-talê lilêkha ǁ

div.p:
namô bhagavatê Sthânakundûra-vâsinê Mahâdêvâya nandatu sarvva-samantâgatô’yam adhivâsaḥ
svasti prajâbhya iti ǁ

div.head:
177
On a small pillar in front of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ Jagadêkamalla śrîmaj-Jayasiṃha-Dêvara râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhige saluttam ire Saka-varisha 950 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Pushya-śuddha 1
Sômavârav-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyandu . śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâra Sthânakundûra mûvattirchchhâ-
siraṃ sakalam irdu śrî-Praṇamêśvara-dêvara gaḍimbada gaḷeya pramâṇu mâru hanneraḍu â-
chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ naḍevantâgi mâḍida dharmma (usual final phrases).

div.head:
178
On a stone in front of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhiy â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvana-saṃs-
tûyamânâśêsha-lôkaika-pitâmaha-hiraṇya-garbbha—Brahma—saṃsthâpita-śrîmat-traiḷôkya-nâtha-Pra-
ṇamêśvara-dêvâdhishṭhita-viśishṭâgrahârâdhîśvarar Ahichchhatra-samâgatar ddvâdaśa-sahasrâ-
gnihôtra-parivṛita-dvâttriṃśat-sahasra-saṅkhyâ-samêtar yama-niyama-guṇôpêtaru Brahmêndra-
Chandra-Yamâgni-pratishṭhita—pañcha-mahâ-liṅga-sannihita-puṇya—tîrtthôdakâvagâhana-pavitrîkṛita-
gâtrar dharâmara-sat-pâtrar ṃMayûravarmma-nṛipasyâshṭâdaśâśvamêdhâdhvara-dakshiṇôpalabdha-
chatuś-chatvâriṃśad-uttara—śata—grâmâdhishṭhâyakar ssandigdha—vipuḷa—dharmma—nirṇṇâyakar
anêka-yajñâvabhṛitha-puṇyâmbu-niyatâbhishiktârddra-mûrddhajar mMahâvîra-vêdi-dhvajar Brahma-
râja-sabhâ-pûjâgra-grâhigaḷ âśrita-jana-manô-rañjita-phala-dâyigaḷu vêda-vêdâṅgôpâṅga-mîmâṃ-
sâdi-śâstra-shaṭ—tarkka-smṛiti—purâṇa-kâvya-nâṭaka—vishaya—sarôjinî-bhâskarar budha-hṛidaya-ku-
muda-vana-mukuḷa-nikara-vikasita-sudhâkararu dambha-darpa-krôdha-lôbha-mada-mâtsaryya-durv-
vishaya-durita-guṇa-dûraru sishṭêshṭâ-janâdhâraru śarat-samaya-śubhrâbhra-dugdhârṇṇava-Rajata-
giri-himakaranibha-viśada-yaśô-râsigaḷ vidvaj-jana-ratna-râśigaḷu naya-vinaya-saujanya-satya-śauchâ-
châra-dhairyya-maryyâdâdi-guṇa-Himâlayar ddvija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-vana-kamaḷâlaya-Kuntaḷa-vishay-
âṅganâ-lalâma-khachita-ratnar shaṭ-karmma-nirataru śrauta-smârtta-dharmmânushṭhâṇa-parây-
aṇar vvidvishṭa-Nârâyaṇar ahita-vana-dikkuñjararu śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjararu śâpânugraha-sama-
rtthar svâdhyâyâdhyayana-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâna—japa-samâdhi-guṇa-sampannar appa
śrîman-mahâ-vaḍḍa-grâma-Tâṇagundûra mûvattirchchhâsiraṃ kelam il̤du Châḷukya-Vikrama-var-
shada padinâr̤eneya Prajâpati-saṃvatsarada uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiy-Âdityavâradandu śrîmat-Tivuḷa-
Vâsudêvara binnapadi śrîmatu Yamêśvara-dêvarige nivêdyakke Kâḍachanahaḷḷiya Kaṇagilugaṭṭa-
dind iḷida kuḷiya ôṇiyiṃ keḷage Biṭṭayya-Gêsavayyana keyiṃ paḍuvalu khila-dharmmadiṃ biṭṭa
keyi guṇiganalu mûr̤u-mattalu aṅkadaḷaṃ matta 3 (usual final phrases and verse) svasti śrîmatu
Yamêśvara-dêvarige Moḷeyûra Indrager̤eya keḷage teṅkaṇabaḷḷi Yamêśvara-dêvarige kamma 50
Chandrêśvara-dêvara keya teṅkaṇabaḷi Chiṭṭaya biṭa dharmma matalu ... (final imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
179
On a stone in front of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha ma .. jâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśra .... ḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Âhavamalla-Dêva .......... râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhige salutt ire tat-pâda-pa ........... bhramaraṃ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-
mahâ-śabda mahâ ... Tailapan-aṅka-kâr̤a gajake bal-gaṇḍa sâmanta ......... raṇâgata-vajra-pañ-
jaraṃ śrîmad-Bhîmarasa ........ si-pannirchchhâsiramuṃ Sântaḷige-sâyiramuṃ Ki ....... eḷpattam
agrahâraṃ Savasiguḍiger̤eyuman aṇuṅga ............ ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samasta-râjya-bha-
.... rûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamânaṃ Malerâja .......... śrîmat-perggaḍe-Kâḷimayyaṅgaḷ
Śaka-varsha 919 ttaneya Hê .. ḷambi-saṃvatsarada ........ suddha 5 Âdityavâradandu (details of
gift and names of witnesses) baradoṃ sênabôva Pole ............ (final phrases).

div.head:
181
On a virakal in front of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Kaḷachuryya-chakravartti-Râyamurâri-Sôvi-Dêva-varushada Virôdhikṛitu-saṃvatsara-
da Âśvîja-bahuḷa 4 nê Âdivâradandu śrîmanu mahâ-pradhâ .... Banavase-nâḍa-heggaḍe-daṇḍanâya-
ka Chôḷikya-Kêsimayyanu Sântaḷige-nâḍa baḷiya bâḍada Aḷahûran ir̤idu peṇḍira uḍe uchchi koṇḍu-
hôhalli nâḍa kuḷa-tiḷakan appa Mukkaḍara-Sôvi-Seṭiya magaṃ Kâḷeya-Nâyaka taḷa-kudureya(ṃ)n ir̤idu
palaraṃ kondu tur̤uvaṃ maguḷchi sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ âtana magaṃ Sômeya-Bammayyaṅgaḷu
parôksha-vinayadiṃ mâḍi kalan nirisidaru ǁ

lg.l: paribrâḍ yôga-yuktaś cha raṇê śûra-mukhê hataḥ ǁ

div.head:
183
At the same place, on a 3rd vîrakal.
div.p:
........ kâḷavarsha śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Khndara-
Ballahaṃ râjyaṃ geyye Banavâsi-nâḍa ......... Saṅkaragaṇḍan âḷutt ire Śaka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-
saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ ........ pravarttise Bhâdrapa .. mâsa ........ parivudaṃ kaṇḍu koṭṭa sama
......... endu bagedan endaḍe

div.head:
184
On a broken stone to the north-east of the same temple.
div.p:
vanâ ......... śvara para ............. bharaṇa .............. malla-Dêva ...... uttarô ... bhi-
vṛiddhi sallutt ire sva ...... ñcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara ......... varêśvaraṃ Châ-
muṇḍâ-labda-vara-prasâ .......... nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sa ........ Ir̤iva-beḍeṅga-Dêvara magaṃ
śrî ......... rasar bBanavâsi pannirchchhâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅka ..... ttam ire tat-pâda-pad-
môpajî ........... paryyantaṃ Banavâsiyo ...... (rest illegible).

div.head:
185
On a stone to the north of the same temple.

lg.l: dêvâ diśantu nas siddhiṃ Brahmêśâna-Janârddanâḥ ǁ
gô-brâhmaṇa ...... cha śivaṃ bhavatu sarvvadâ ǁ
śivam âdau śivaṃ madhyê śivam antyê cha sarvvadâ |
sarvvêshâṃ Śiva-bhaktânâṃ manujânâñ ch tachchhivaṃ ǁ
â-Padmâkshana vara-nâ- | bhî-padmadin ogedan udita-vêda-mukhaṃ Vâ- |
ṇî-pati viśvôtpatti- | vyâpâraṃ hiraṇya-garbbhaṃ Brahmaṃ ǁ

div.p: â-Kamaḷagarbbha ......

lg.l: shṭhita-liṅgâkṛitiy âgi kaṇg esedu tôrkkuṃ Mêru tan-Mêru-par- |
vvatadiṃ teṅkaṇa-bhâgadoḷ Bharata-bhûchakraṃ karaṃ rayyav â- |
kshitiyoḷ nâḍe virâjikuṃ vasumatî-śrî-kuntaḷaṃ Kuntaḷaṃ ǁ

div.p:
tad-dêśâdhipatyadoḷu Paramêśvarana bâhugaḷoḷ udayisidaṃ ... ta-Kshatriyânanataraṃ negaḷda Châḷu-
kya-vaṃśadoḷu ǁ

lg.l: kana jâtaṃ negal̤d Ayyaṇaṅge Jayasiṃhaṃ tamman âtaṅge nan- |
danan âd Âhavamallan âtana magaṃ Permmâḍi tat-sûnu Sô- |
mana putraṃ Jagadêkan âtan-anujaṃ śrî-Taila-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ

div.p:
intu Châḷukya-vaṃśada Kshatriyaru kramadiṃ râjyaṅ-geyye tat-kâladoḷu ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-
mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kâḷâñjara-pura-varâdhîśvara suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruga-
tûryya-nirgghôshaṇa Kaḷachuryya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa mâna-Kanakâchaḷa
su-bhaṭar-âditya kaligaḷ-aṅkuśa gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ pratâpa-Laṅkêśvara para-
nârî-sahôdara Śanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava niśśaṅka-
malla-namâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-bhuja-baḷa-chakkravartti Bijjaṇa-Dêvarasara prabhâva-
pratâpam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: jagamaṃ kayyânisitt ârpp ahimakara-sama-sparddhiy âdattu têjaṃ |
mige-vandatt abdhiyaṃ guṇp alerdudu Kaliyaṃ châru-châritrav ugrâ- |
nugav âdatt udgha-kîrtti-prasaram enisidaṃ Bijjaḷa-kshôṇipâḷaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi mahâ-pradhâna Banavase-nâḍa daṇḍanâyakaṃ Kêśimayyaṅgaḷ-anvaya-
maṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

lg.l: nalavindaṃ poradâl̤dan â-Hoḷala-râjaṃ tande tây Duggaṇa- |
bbe lasal-lakshaṇe tân enal negal̤da Bhâradvâja-gôtrôdayâ- |

div.p: va ǁ râjâdhyakshada karaṇaṅgaḷu ǁ

lg.l: janam ellaṃ pogal̤guṃ vivêka-nidhiyaṃ kayvâradiṃ Chaṭṭi-râ- |

div.p: va ǁ â-herggade-karaṇaṅgaḷig êkîbhâvadoḷaṃ madhyasta-vṛittiyoḷaṃ naḍeva ǁ

lg.l: jan anûnaṃ guṇi Varmma-râjan anavadyaṃ Rêvaṇaṃ Sarbba-dê- |
van udâttaṃ śuchi Sôman ujjaḷa-yaśaṃ Mârttaṇḍan â-Goyda-râ- |
jan anindyaṃ vibhu Mallapâryyan inibar ssad-dharmma-tâtparyyakar ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ intu samasta-pradhâna-râjâdhyakshaṃ pratihasta-parijana-pura-janaṃ berasu mahâ-pradhânaṃ
Kêśava-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Banavase-pannirchchhâsiramaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-sishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ pâḷisi
râjadhâni-Balipuradoḷ irdd ondu-divasav âsthâna-maṇḍaḷa-madhya-sthitanu sakaḷa-parijana-pari-
vṛitan âgirppuduv illiy uchitâvasarajñanuv aśêsha-dharmmajñanuv enisida ǁ

lg.l: tana kuladalli Rêvarasan âtana sûnu vevêki Sôman â- |
tana tanayaṃ Śivaika-śaraṇaṃ vibudhâgraṇi Chaṭṭi-rajan â- |
tana sati Mâdiyakkan avarg âtma-bhavaṃ sukṛitârtthi Rêchaṇaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ antu dharmma-prasaṅgamaṃ puṭṭisi bhûmi-dânada grâma-dânada mâhâtmyamuman anna-
dânada mahônnatiyumaṃ vidyâ-dânada mahatvamumaṃ pêḷgum ad ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: sarvvêshâm êva dânânâṃ bhûmi-dânaṃ paraṃ smṛitaṃ |
sarvva-pâpa-haraṃ tadd hi svarggyañ châhur mmanîshiṇaḥ ǁ
nâsti bhûmi-samaṃ dânaṃ nâsti bhûmi-samô nidhiḥ |
nâsti satya-samô dharmmô na pâpam anṛitât paraṃ ǁ
grâmaṃ Śivâya yô dadyât tasya puṇya-phalaṃ śṛiṇu ǁ
yathêshṭam aiśvarê lôkê krîḍatê kâlam akshayaṃ ǁ
annât parataraṃ lôkê na bhûtaṃ na bhavishyati |
anna-mûlaṃ bhavêt sarvvaṃ sarvvam annê pratishṭhitaṃ ǁ
anna-daḥ prâṇa-daḥ prôktaḥ prâṇa-daś châpi sarvva-daḥ |
traiḷôkyaṃ chaturô varṇṇâś chatvâraś châśramâḥ pṛithak |
Brahmâdyâ dêvatâs sarvvâ vidyâ-dânê pratishṭhitâḥ ǁ
kin na dattaṃ bhavêt têna dharmma-kâmârttha-darśinâ(ṃ) ǁ
datvâ prâpnôti purushaḥ sarvvân kâmân na saṃśayaḥ ǁ
yat puṇyaṃ tîrttha-yâtrâyâṃ yat puṇyaṃ yajvanâṃ tathâ |
tat puṇyaṃ kôṭi-guṇitaṃ vidyâ-dânâl labhên naraḥ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ end int anêka-prakâradoḷu bahu-vidha-dâna-phaḷa-mâhâtmyamaṃ pêḷvuduṃ harshôtkarsha-chittan
âgi tad-dharmma-karaṇa-yôgya-sthânamaṃ vichârise mattaṃ Rêcharasan endan ad ent endoḍ akhiḷa-
lôka-nirmmâṇa(na)-pravaṇa-matiy enisida Hiraṇyagarbbha-datta-dvâtriṃśat-sahasra-dvija-samâjâ-
bharaṇamuṃ tat-Sarôjagarbbha-pratishṭhita—Praṇavêśvara—dêva-pramukha—dêvakula-virâjitamuṃ
tach-Chaturmmukha-vinirmmita-Brahma-tîrtha-pavitritamumam atibahaḷa-sarvvartukôdyâna-pari-
vṛitamum enisi sogayisuva Sthâṇugûḍha-nâma-grâmav adu sakala-dharmma-karaṇa-yôgya-sthânav alli
mâḍida-sukṛitav akshaya-phaḷaman îguv ene karaṇa-samêtaṃ tad astuv end âsthâna-maṇḍaḷadind
erddu bandu Sthâṇugûḍha-grâmada śrî-Praṇamêśvara-dêvargge viśêsha-pûjeyaṃ mâḍisiy alli yama-
niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar aupâsanâgnihôtra-
dvija-guru-dêvatâ-pûjâ-tatpararuṃ shaṭ-tarkka-mîmâṃsânêka-śâstra-viśâradaruṃ shaṭ-karmma-nira-
taruv agnishṭômâdi-sapta-saṃsthâ-saṃsthitaruṃ mârttaṇḍôjvaḷa-kîrtti-yutaruv anêka-yajñâvabhṛi-
tâvagâhana-pavitrîkṛita-śarîrarum enisid anâdiya sarvva-namaśyad agrahâraṃ Sthâṇugûḍha-grâmada
mûvattirchchhâsirvvar mmahâjanaṅgaḷa vêdânti-Svayampâki-dêvara mattav alli naḍevanubhavaṇe-
kâr̤a herggaḍe karaṇa Nâgara-khaṇḍada Manneyaṃ Bandaṇikeya Sôvarasa Nâkaṇa Goydaṇa Bêgûra
Kêta-gâvuṇḍa Mâguṇḍiya Saṅka-gâvuṇḍa Maḷavaḷḷiya Kêta-gâvuṇḍa Koṇavattiya Pṛithivî-seṭṭi Kiru-
vaḍeya Masaṇi-seṭṭiy int ivaru-pramukha Nâgara-khaṇḍada samasta-prabhu-gâvuṇḍagaḷ â-Kampaṇada
heggaḍe karaṇaṅgaḷ ant anibara sannidhiyoḷ dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôga-nitya-naimittika-pûje-gaḍ-
ḍuge-bali-hôma-chaitra-pavitra-mâṭakûṭa-nava-karmmakkaṃ nâlku-vêda-khaṇḍikav eraḍu-bhaṭa-vṛitti
Kannaḍ-akshara-sikshe ghaḷiyârav âr̤uṃ-khaṇḍikad upâdhyâya-chhâtrara grâsa-vastrakkaṃ satrak-
kav endu Kasapayya-Nâyakana Vâvaṇa-Dêvan-anukûlateyiṃ Kêśava-daṇḍanâyakanuṃ karaṇaṅgaḷ-
uṃ Saka-varshaṃ 1079 neya Îśvara-saṃvatchharada Pushyada puṇṇami-Sômavârav-uttarâyaṇa-saṅ-
kramaṇa-vyatîpâtadandu Banavase-pannirchchhâsirada kampaṇaṃ Nâgara-khaṇḍa 70 r̤a baḷiya
bâḍaṃ Hiriya-Taguḷaṭṭiyaṃ Tâṇagundûra nairutyada Konavaneya bayalumaṃ pûrvva-maryyâdeya cha-
turâghâṭa-śîmâ-śuddhiyiṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭar alliya pariṭhavaṇeya
kramav ent endoḍe Taguḷaṭṭiya Mûlasthâna-dêvargge mattar ondu alliya gauḍan-umbaḷi matta 2
mattaṃ Konavaneya bayaloḷage Rigvêda-khaṇḍika 1 Yajurvvêdadalli pada khaṃ 1 kalpada khaṃ 1
Sâmavêdada khaṃ 1 śabda-śâstra-rûpâvatâra-nyâsa khaṃ 1 Prâbhâkara-vêdânta khaṃ 1 ant âr̤akkaṃ
pratyêkav are-vattara lekkade mattaru 3 vêdântada Svayampâki-svâmigaḷge matta 1 davasigarige
matta 1 hûdôṭada mâlegâr̤age kamma 20 antu matta 5 kamma 20 n uḷiye mêlâda bhûmiyalu
bhatta-bhâgadi pâda-bhattadoḷage dêvargge nitya-naimittikada naivêdyak ondu-saṃvatsarada bhatta-
vaṃ kaḷad uḷida bhattadoḷaṃ Taguḷaṭṭiyal puṭṭida dravyadoḷag ombhâgaman dêvargge kaḷad uḷida
bhâgada ponnoḷav â-bhattadoḷaṃ nitya-sthiti dêvara satrav âg umba Brâhmaṇaru 30 khaṇḍikake chhâ-
tra .. r̤a lekkade . khaṇḍikadal umba chhâtraru 48 dêvara pûjâri-mâṇiyari 2 antu 80 kkav aṭṭikkuva
bhâṇasittiyaru 3 rgge jîvitaṃ ga 6 sîrege paṇa 6 chhâtra 50 kkaṃ sîrege pratyêkaṃ pa 2 lekkade ga
10 vagge Vaḍḍavâradol abhyaṅga Sômavâradoḷu 30 manushya-Brâhmaṇar-uguraṃ kaḷava nâvidana
jîvitaṃ ga 4 aggisṭagege ga 5 kkaṃ naḍad upâdhyaṅge ga 5 bâla-śikheya śâstradavaru purâṇamaṃ
hêḷuvar-agnisṭhageya hoḷeyal eḷḷ-aksthate darbha-gandhamumaṃ satra-khaṇḍikadal uṇḍa Brâh-
maṇargge tâmbûḷamaṃ kuḍuvaru mattaṃ dêvargge Taguḷaṭṭi-arddhadoḷ âda dravyadoḷa Rêcharasa-
Haṭṭagâr̤a-Chauḍarasa-Mahadêva-Tikajjaṅgaḷu biṭṭa-tôṭaṅgaḷoḷaṃ Siddhahaḷḷi matta pûrvva-vṛitti
sapta-divyadaluṃ bhaktaru koṭṭadar̤aluv int initar̤oḷâda dravyadoḷage nitya-gadduge-pûje-dhûpâriti
naivêdya nandâdîvige nityaṃ sahasra-tiḷa-hômav int initumaṃ nityaṃ naḍesutta tiṅgaḷ-diṅgaḷoḷ 2 ḍ ash-
ṭami 2 chaturddaśiy amâvâsye paurṇṇamâsye vyatîpâta-saṅkramaṇav emba-parbbaṅgaḷalu nitya-naimit-
tika-pûjeyaṃ mâḍi śâstrad upâdhyâyaru Śivavarmmad âr̤eneya śântyâdhyâyamaṃ japaṅgeydalli hêl̤da
kramadiṃ dêvar-eṇṭu-dikkinoḷ maṇḍalavaṃ mâḍiy alliya mantradiṃ baliyan ikki dêsavan âḷva Ksha-
triyanumaṃ gô-brâhmaṇarumaṃ yajamânanumaṃ harasuvaru mattaṃ varshadoḷage baha mahâ-parv-
vaṅgaḷ 2 ḍ ayana 2 visu sôma-sûryya-grahaṇav Âśâḍa-Kârtika-Mâgha-Vaiśâkhada puṇṇamigaḷal ond-
ondu-divasada pûjey âr̤âr̤u-tiṅgaḷa phaḷaman îguv â-parbbaṅgaḷoḷ dêvargge sahasra-gaḍḍugeyaṃ
prârambhisi puṇyâha-vâchaneyaṃ mâḍi śâstra-khaṇḍikadavaru raṅgadoḷ vidyâ-maṇḍaḷa guru-maṇḍaḷa
Śiva-maṇḍaḷav emb maṇḍaḷa-trayaman uddharisiy archchisi śântyâdhyâyamaṃ japisuvaru vêda-
khaṇḍikada nâlvaruṃ 4 praśasta-kaḷaśaṅgaḷalu udakamaṃ tumbi sarvvauśadhi-gôrôchana-siddhâr-
ttha-pañcha-pallava-pañcha-challi-pañcha-gavyav êḷâdi-chandanâdi-maṅgala-dravyaṅgaḷan ikki nâlku-
dikkinoḷ irddu nâlku-vêdadoḷagaṇa Rudra-sûktaṅgaḷaṃ japaṅgeyvar anisakke gaḍḍuge pûrnnavâgalu
dêvargg eṇṭu-terad-argghya-pañcha-gavya-pañchâmṛitamaṃ mâḍi yave-gôdhuvey-akkiya hiṭṭiniṃ bisi-
nîriṃ nelliy-arisinadim majjanavaṃ mâḍi kuśôdaka-gandhôdaka-pur̤pôdaka-phaḷôdaka-suvarṇṇôdaka-
ratnôdakadiṃ snapanavaṃ mâḍiy anantarav â-nâlkuṃ kalaśavaṃ piḍidu samudra-pûrvvakav appa
Rigvêdada mûr̤uṃ ruchigaḷiṃ maṅgaḷâbhishêkamaṃ mâḍi pañcha-saugandha-gandhaṅgaḷiṃ pûsi
vastrâḷaṅkâram-upavîta-madhuparkkav-âchamanîya-pur̤pa-pûje-pur̤pa-phaḷa-pakvânna-maṇṭapa-dhûpa-
ghṛita-dîpâritigaḷaṃ koṭṭu nâlku-taḷigeyalu pañcha-raṅgad akkiyind oppaṃ mâḍi hiṭṭina soḍara dadhi-
dûrvva-veras âratiyiṃ nivâḷisuvalli maṅgaḷa-gîta-vâdyânaka-tûryya—śaṅkha—kahaḷâravadiṃ mâḍi
pâyasa-ghṛita-bhaksha-bhôjyânna-pâna-dânâdigaḷiṃ nivêdyâchamanîya-kaighaṭṭi-tâmbûḷamaṃ koṭṭ
â-parvvaṅgaḷal ayuta-hôma Baligrâmada samasta-dêvatâ-pûjeyaṃ mâḍuvud alliy uttarâyaṇadoḷ
dêvargge nûr̤u .... tuppadiṃ snapanavaṃ mâḍi sâyirad-eṇṭu-kannaydale-hûvind onde-mâleyam mâḍi
pûjisuvudu Mâghada puṇṇamiyalu ghṛita-kabaḷavaṃ mâḍuvadu Chaitradoḷ mahâpûjeyaṃ mâḍi
mahâ-rathadoḷakke râjâdhirâjan oḷakke dêvaraṃ bijayaṅ-geysi chhatra-châmara-dhvaja-patâke-kaḷaśaṃ
kannaḍi-bhêri-maṅgaḷa-tûryya-śaṅkha-kahaḷâravaṃ kaiy-dîvige gîta-vâdya-nṛityadiṃ grâma-vîdhiyoḷ
toḷalchi barisi nilisuvad (usual final phrases and verse) ôṃ namas Śivâya

div.head:
186
At the same place, on a second stone.
div.p: śrî-Mâdhavâya namaḥ ǁ

lg.l: .. kâ .. ksha .. vama .. nimag oldu vold îg âdi-Pôtrîśa-gâtran ǁ
jâtaṃ Nṛisiṃha-vallabha(Dêva)n | âtaṅg ogedaṃ pratâpa-nidhi Ballâḷaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuva ... prithvî-vallabhaṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi artthi-jana-chintâmaṇi Male-
râja-raja .......... na-prachaṇḍa pratâpa-chakkravartti vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarasaru sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadiṃ râjyaṅ-geyyuttam ire ǁ tatu-kâladoḷu ǁ svasti praśasta-samasta-vastu-vistâra-saṃstuta-sam-
pûrṇṇa-mahârṇṇava-bahaḷa-jaḷa-vaḷaya-vaḷayita-vasumatî-śubha—pradêśa—viśêsha-rûpa-Jambûdvîpa-
kânta-Kuntaḷa-maṇḍaḷa-maṇḍana-sakaḷa-jana-manô—nayanâbhirâmârâmânêka-śâka-phaḷa-kusma-kus-
ma-vâṭî-vimaḷa-kamaḷa-kuvaḷaya-viḷâsi-sarôvara-vara-taṭâka—taṭa-kaḷita-kaḷama-kêdâra-kêdârôdâraṃ
dêśaṅgaḷ-arasaṃ Banavase-modal enisid anêka-maṇḍa[ḷê]śvaraṃ Mukkaṇṇa-Kaḍambaṃ jagad-anu-
graha-vigrahaṃ dâna-vinôdi dakshiṇâ-pathadoḷu vipra-kuḷaman ar̤a-keyin eḷasi paḍeyade taḍeyade
naḍad Ahichchhatrâgrahâraman ârâdhisi sâdhisi paḍeda pannitsâsirâgnihôtra-pavitra-dvâtriṃśad-
vipra-kuṭumbamaṃ mundiṭṭu tandu chatur-yyuga-prasiddha-viśuddha-chaturâbhidhâna-Chaturmmu-
kha-pratishṭhita-Praṇamêśvara-pramukha-sura-pratishṭhita-pañcha—Liṅgâliṅgita—tîrttha-kshêtradoḷu
nôḍi mâḍida mahâgrahâraṃ Sthâṇugûḍha-purada por̤avoḷal ent ene ǁ

lg.l: dûr atisôbhikuṃ siriya kambolad-ante dharâtaḷâgradoḷ ǁ
saṃ .... salu beḷadud embud ên achchariyê ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ ad ent ene beḷeda maḷeyaja-paḷukina mara | neḷe-kâḷâgaru | nâḷikêra | lavaṅga | mâtuḷuṅga |
chûta | champaka | baka-bakuḷa | aśôka | pûga-punnâga | nâga-latâ-vitânadoḷu | vôdina | bâdina |
tarkkada tarkkisuva | tantrada mantra-vâdada | kavi-paṭhana-kathhanada | yâgnikara sañjñegaḷaṃ
kaltu palumbuva palvan-ter̤ada-vihaṅga-tatiyind atisayisitu Nandanaman in .. tpura-parisarôdyâna |
mattav â-mahâgrahârada mahimey ent ene ǁ

lg.l: vêdaṃ nâlk avar̤-aṅgam âr̤u kurupiṃ mîmâṃse-kâṇḍa-trayaṃ |
pirid â-puradoḷag enut î- | sura-mithunaṃ pogaḷut irkkum aniśaṃ niśeyol̤ ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ â-grâmadoḷu vibudhargge Chakradharan ent ante buddhi-chakradiṃ grâmakke barppa duri-
taṅgaḷaṃ pariharisi hitaman âcharisuva kâraṇadiṃ Chakra ...... vesaraṃ paḍeda vaṃśam ad ent ene ǁ

lg.l: mûvattitsâsirakkaṃ tiḷakamo toḍavô lôchana-sthânam emb î- |
jana-vandyâkâran end î-sakaḷa-budha-janaṃ baṇṇisal ballar ill end |
ene Viśvâmitra-gôtraṃ negaḷdan eḷeyol î-Mâki-râjâṅkan âgaḷ ǁ
paḍed-artthaṃ budha-kôṭig âśrita-janakk ishṭargge sishṭargge ban- |
d eḍar̤[..]d adhanargge sat-kavi-kadambakk intu Gôvindan îv- |
eḍeyoḷ kalpa-mahîjav endu dhareyalli prîtiyiṃ bâḥpenal |

div.p: â-kṛitakṛityana santatiy ent ene ǁ

lg.l: jana-pati-Pâṇḍug ayvaru tanûbhavar-ol sale Vâmanaṃ Triḷô- |
chanan atuḷa-prabhâva-paran Îśvaran oḷpina Gôpan â-Nṛisiṃ- |
hanum oḷagâgi tat-taneyar intu jagakk atiśêvya-vaṃśa-maṇ- |
meyvaḷiyaṃ tegaḷd ati ka .. darg îvan ǁ
chana ninag âr ssamânar akhiḷôrvvareyoḷ guṇa-ratna-bhûshaṇa ǁ
pirid atibhaktiyind eseva Mâdhava-dêvara supratishṭhey âg |
ire nere mâḍidaṃ Kamala-Bhâritiyuṃ puruḍ illad-irppinaṃ ǁ
janake parôpakâri [..]Kêśavan âtana sûnu Êchan â- |
tana tanayaṃ jagakk eseva Vâmanan âtana putri dhâtriyoḷ |
jana-nute Mâchikavve sutar ayvara Kontiye mâte Mâkima- |
yyana vara-kântey [..]enal êṃ kṛitakṛityano pêḷ Triḷôchanan ǁ
rvvatigam Arundhatig ayvaḍiy ene matt ant |
kshitiyoḷu Mâchiyave mâtey âtag ene dhanyan ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ antu mahantar ubhaya-kula-viśuddha-prasiddhar-udaradal udayisi vivêka-viśêsha-naya-vinaya-
vaidika-laukika-satya-saucha-dayâ-dâkshiṇyav-âdiyâda-anêka-guṇa-pâtran â-Triḷôchana-dêvan omm-
ey ummaḷisi nirmmaḷa-dharmmav enag â-chandra-târa sthiram appud endu dorakoḷuvud ene kanasi-
noḷu anupama-mahimaṃ Prayâga-Paramêśvaraṃ śrî-Mâdhava sâdhu-vatsalaṃ vatsa-Praharâ-
daṅge kambadoḷ irddante kaṇiyoḷ irddapan endu pêḷdu bijayaṅgeydu supratishṭhitav âda śrî-Mâdhava-
dêvargge Śaka-varshada ?1123 neya Siddhârtthi-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-su 11 Âdivâra-vyatîpâta-
saṅkramâṇadandu mû[va]ttitsâsiray-aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷa śrî-pâdavanu Vâmayya Triḷôchana-
dêva Îśvara-dêva Gôvinda-dêva Nârasiṅga-dêvan int îy-ayvaruṃ upârjjisi tamma vṛittiyoḷage
(here follow details of gift and usual final phrases) śrî-Mâdhava-dêvargge Daṇḍeya Sôvi-seṭṭiyaru
biṭṭa nadâdîvigege Triḷôchana-dêvana kaiyal aydu-kamma tôṭavaṃ mâr̤ugoṇḍu biṭṭa ǁ
âtana mahimey ent ene ǁ

lg.l: * So in the original. kallaṃ Daṇḍeya Sômaṃ ǁ

div.head:
190
In the lower part of the north side of the roof of the raṅgamaṇṭapa of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Bijjaṇa-Dêvarasara tat-pâda-padmôpajîvigaḷ appa Banavâse-
pannirchchhâsirada hejjuṅka vaḍḍarâvuḷada daṇḍanâyaka-Mâyi-Dêvarasaru śrî-Praṇamêśvara-
dêvargge sthâna-nivêdya-nandâdîvigeg endu dêvara tôṭada a .. ke ele battada suṅka sarvva-bâdhâ-
parihâra mattam ûra aḍakege lakkakke pa I yint inituṃ Saka-varsha 1079 neya Îśvara-saṃvatsara ..
shyada puṇṇamî-Sômavâra-uttarâyaṇa-vyatîpâtad andu mûvattirchchhâsirake .. nadalu dhârâ-pûrv-
vakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa dharmmavan (usual final phrases).

div.head:
191
On the side of the same stone.
div.p:
.......... samasta-praśasti .... śrîman-ma .... śvara vîra-Gadamba .... jjuna-Dêva Hola .... Beḷ-
vala Banavâ ... sirama Sântaḷige-sâyi .... ma sukhadiṃ dushṭa ... ha-śishṭa-pratipâ .... râjyaṅ-
geyvuta .... śrîmatu .... samâra Vishṇuvriddha .... rasa-gôtrada ..... kravintara marmma ....
Dhadhimayyaṅge .... kabbegaṃ puṭṭida .... ûroḍeyaṃ paśu .... ṭṭara marmma .. koraḍe .... Saṅ-
kaṇana peṇḍa .. tra-pavitra dêva .... ḷukya-vikrama-v .... neya Râkshasa-saṃva .... drapada-
bahu .... Kanneya-saṅkrama .... du śrî-Praṇamê .... vargge ondu nandâ-dî .. râtra .... naḍavant â
.... mahâjanaṅgaḷa .... koṭṭa Lokkiga .... ponna baḍḍi ....... â-chandrârkka .... naḍayisu (usual
final phrases).

div.head:
192
On a stone below the bilva-tree to the north east of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja râja .. ramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâ .. ṇa śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara râjyam utta-
rôttarâbhivṛiddhiy â-chandrârkkaṃ saluttam ire .. da-padmârâdhakaṃ śatru-baḷa-sâdhakan âsthâna-
vastu-nâyakaṃ dvija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa ka .... prachaṇḍa daṇḍanâyakan Anantapâḷan eraḍar̤u-
nûr̤a Banavâsi-pannirchchâsiramaṃ sukhadin âḷuttam ire â-śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ bâṇasu-mane-
veggaḍe Ananta .. ra prasâda-samâsâdita-prâpta-lakshmî-niḷayaṃ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: sura-kîrtti-priyan âgi sanda guṇa-ratnaṃ Dâsirâja .. gôtrâm- |
kare Sômâmbike yandaḍ î-bhuvanadi ..... dan êṃ dhanyanô ǁ

div.p:
â samasta-guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇaṃ vibudha-jana-śaraṇanuṃ nija-visuddha-kîrtti- .... prabhâ-vikasita-
jagad-vaḷaya-kairavanuṃ raṇa-raṅga-bhairavanuṃ bishama-haya-Vatsa-râja .. kavi-sura-bhûjanuv eni-
sida mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Gôvinda-Râja Banavâsi-pannirchchhâsiramuma vaḍḍarâvuḷavu-
maṃ perjuṅkamumam eraḍuṃ bilkaḍeyumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda .. pratipâḷisuttam ire | tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi Antarvêdiya śrî-Râma-dattiya ashṭa-sahasra-saṅkhyâ-Gavêhu-grâmaṃ puṭṭid-ûru Mâdhava-
bhaṭṭaru tande tây Jânaki Vatsa-gôtra-Gaurabbey atte Soḍḍalan anujaṃ daṇḍanâyaka-Goydarasan
maydunaṃ Pṛithivîdharaṃ Trivaḷi-bhaṭṭaru śrîman-mahâ-vaḍḍagrâmamaṃ Tâṇagundûralu pergge[ḍe]-
tanaṃ geyyuttam il̤du dharmma-prasaṅgadi .. ker̤eyan agaḷisalu bhûmi kuḍiv endu mûttirchchhâsi-
rakke binnapaṅgeydu prasanna-chittarâgiy ûrindaṃ baḍagaṇa hâdiya beddeyalu bhûmiyaṃ kuḍe Châ-
ḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada mûvatteraḍaneya Sarvvajit-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-suddha-tadige-Bṛihaspativâra-
dalu ker̤eyan agaḷisi nîraṃ paḍedu dêgulavaṃ mâḍi ar̤avaṇṭigeyal ambaligaṃ nîr-er̤eva mâṇigaṃ
ker̤ege paḍi salisuvudarke ker̤eya keḷage ojhara (here follow details of gift and usual final phrases
and verse).

lg.l: dyâ-nidhi Goyda-Râja vibhu bhâvan enal vara-Vatsa-gôtra-mauḷi- |
jñâna-vidhâna-kôvidan enalke Gôvindaran êṃ kṛitârtthanô ǁ

div.p: Praṇamêśvara-dêvara kêriya mane-dere kâḷu ............ ku | Jokkôja barada ǁ

div.head:
193
At the same village, on a wooden pillar of the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
śrî-guruvê gati Sâlivâ[ha]na 1736 ne Śrîmukha-saṃ- | da Âśvîja-śudha 12 lu Dudihaḷḷi-gau ǁ
Puṭṭaṇṇanu tanna bhaktiyinda yaraḍu 2 muṇḍige-chitravannu mâḍisiddu

div.head:
194
At the same village, on a stone belonging to the north outlet of the great tank.
div.p:
svasti Sakha-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsa .. sataṅgaḷ eṇṭu-nûr̤a-ayvatt-eṇṭane ... Manmatha-saṃvatsaraṃ
pravarttise Vaisâka .. bârasi-Brihaspativâram âge Sânta ..... ra peggaḍe svasti samasta-bhara-nirûpa ...
mahâmâtya-guṇa-sampanna .... i ........ nâsrayan âsraya-manôharaṃ nanni .... gaṃ bageyaṃ
nâtaṃ .... chavegge ...... sampattivaḍigaṃ Brahaspati-samaṃ .. śrîmat-peggaḍe-Puḷiyyamma
Tâṇagundûr-kker̤eyaṃ kaṭṭisi dêvarige nivêdyakkaṃ nandâdîvigegaṃ mattal aydu ker̤eya keḷage
tôṭamaṃ mattal ondu ker̤egâla mattal ippattu granta ippattâru mattal gal̤de innûrana yeḷkoṇḍu
dêvargge ner̤egaṃ biṭṭa ker̤egâla nû ..... vadda berisakk epatta-gaṭṭa (rest illegible).

div.head:
195
At the same village, on a vîrakal at the edge of the paṭêl Raṅgappa’s field.
div.p:
svasti Śaka-varsha 930 ne Plavaṅga-saṃvatsarada Jyêshṭha-mâsada śuddha-bidiye-Bṛihaspativârad
andu Sântaḷige-śayirad arasan Oḍḍammanaran ir̤uvâdaḷe peṇḍaru de .. aya-tur̤u pariyeyu nâvidara
Gôsâsi-Gulugaṃ kaṭṭi sattu sura-lôkakk ôda âtana peṇḍati Hukkabbege nâḍa gaṇḍa-gûsanu vetta
magaṃ Jîya-Sanutannu kallan er̤esida maṅgaḷa baredaṃ Salugayya

div.head:
196
At Chikkamâgaḍi (same hobli), on a pillar in the enclosure of the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
(East side) svasti śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa Hoysaḷa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva-varshada
23 neya ǁ

lg.l: dorevett Âṅgira ... tsaraṃ negal̤da-mâsa Śrâvaṇaṃ śuddha-vâ- |
dhy .. su .. bahay Âshâḍa ............ paraṃ vi ...... sat- |
karaṇaṃ taitilam i ...... ndida vibhâtaṃ kûḍe pu .. yiṃ ǁ
anituṃ tannav iv allav em .... bageyaṃ biṭṭa . kush- .... tma-śu- |
ddha-nayaṃ tanna .. dêva tâḷdi guṇamaṃ Jakkavve niśchaysutaṃ ǁ
mati Jina-pâda-paṅkajadoḷ anvitam âdudu dṛishṭi nâsikâ- |
grateyoḷe ninduv âgama-padaṅgaḷan âlisut irdduv âgaḷuṃ |
gati-vaḍedaḷ samâdhi-vidhiyiṃ vare Jakkaley êṃ kṛitârttheyô ǁ
ma .. bhânu-jyôtiyindaṃ vikachisiy adarol̤ dêva-dêvêśanaṃ niś- |
chaḷam âgirdda .. santôshadoḷe Jinapanaṃ jânisutt â-latâ-kô- |
maḷe biṭṭaḷ Jakkiyakkaṃ tanuvan uḷidar âr ppôḷvar embantu tannaṃ ǁ
kshayamaṃ mithyâtva-karmmakk amarda guṇada saṃyaktva-sa .... saṃvṛi- |
ddhiyumaṃ mummâḍi dêśa-śrutaman anitumaṃ koṇḍu nirmôhe tây-tan- |
deyumaṃ biṭṭande sanyâsaman amaḷinavaṃ pûṇdu Jainêndra-pâda- |
dvayamaṃ chittaysi Jakkavve dal ese .... a ............ ǁ

div.p:
.... ta-darśane vistârita-su .............. ra-kaḷêvara Jakkale-nârijanâṅg .... ti ............
.... neneyuta Jakkale tanuvaṃ biṭṭâgaḷ ante sukuma .... sudhâśana-pûjya-samavasaraṇaman anâ-
kuḷaṃ pokku Jinan abhivandisuva ..........
(South side)

lg.l: śrîmat-puṇya-phalâd abhûd bhuvi sutâ sâmanta-mukhyasya yâ
sâścharyaṃ tyajati sva-dêham aṇuvach chhrî-Jakkalâmbâ satî ǁ
karttuṃ tyaktvâ vimôhaṃ sadayam upaśamaṃ prâpya châtmôpayôgaṃ |
prasthâpyâlôkya dêhaṃ tyajati tṛiṇam iva śrîmatî Jakkalâmbâ ǁ
chitraṃ dêva-gatiṃ prati tyajati kiṃ dêhan tu Jakkâmbikâ ǁ
na bhajati hṛidi tṛiptiṃ Jakkalâmbâ sva-dêhât
kê na stuvanti bhuvi Jakkala-yôshitaṃ tê ǁ

div.p: (West side)

lg.l: ene Jakka .... vaṃśa-śîla .... samyaktvaṃ jagat-pâvana ǁ
........ ḍige Jinâga .... Jina-mataṃ matig â-Jina-sû .. sat-padaṃ |
naḍeg oḍanâḍiy âyt ene Jinôktiyan ôdi tad-âgamârtthamaṃ |
naḍe tiḷidante muktig irad eydipa śîla-guṇa-vratâdhvadoḷ |
naḍed eḍegeydaḷ âlke gaḍa Jakkale-nâri Mahêndra-kalpadoḷ ǁ
ner̤eye munîndraruṃ pogal̤d aṇaṃ tale dûge parigrahaṅgaḷaṃ |
par̤idu suvṛitte Jakkale mahâ-sati chittaman âpta-tatvadoḷ |
nir̤isi samâdhiyiṃ ner̤eye sâdhisidaḷ sura-lôka-saukhyamaṃ ǁ
kaḷiveḍe balpu baḷk irade mey miḍukâḍade Jaina-bhakti sañ- |
nelasida sat-samâdhi-vidhi Jakkale-nârig id ekka-lâvaṇaṃ ǁ

div.p: (North side) śrî-Jinêndra ǁ

lg.l: âruhya svargga-durggaṃ nija-bhajana-baḷâd êva yat tad gṛihîtvâ |
itthaṃ tushṭâva gatvâ samavasaraṇa-bhûsthaṃ natêndraṃ Jinêndraṃ ǁ
vaneyiṃ pett amaratvadind er̤agidaḷ Jakkavve Jainâṅghriyoḷ ǁ
tatvaman â-Jinêndra-matadiṃ tiḷid ujvaḷam âda śuddha-dṛi- |
vitvadin eydidaḷ negal̤da Jakkale-nâri surêndra-lôkamaṃ ǁ
gaḷane nimirchchi Jakkale valaṃ paḍedaḷ sumanô-vibhutiyaṃ ǁ
bareyipan endu Jakkale mahâ-satiy êr̤idaḷ alte saggamaṃ ǁ
pugey avasarppaṇaṃ Bharatad Âryyeyoḷ anvitam âda bhôga-bhû- |
migaḷa virâmadoḷ sukṛita-dushkṛita-varttaney âgi sanda kâ- |
la-gata-cha .. tu . ḷ antyadoḷe pañchama-kâladoḷ ondid anda . |

div.head:
197
On a stone in front of the same temple.

lg.l: śrî râjippudu dharmmadiṃ niyata-dharmmaṃ śântiyim śânti-vi- |
î-Ratnatraya-dêvar ûrjjitam enal dîrgghâyumaṃ śrîyumaṃ ǁ
mâḷâḷa ........ bhü-ramaṇaṃ jagaddhitan î-mahatvakk enalk êṃ |
ṇaḍuv oppaṃ bettudo tâṃ lavaṇa-jaḷadhi rannam maṇal Lakshmi nîr- |
veṇṇ oḍaripp â-kalpa-vṛiksha-prasava ...... d êvêḷven oḷpaṃ ǁ
pârvinav eḷeg imb id âytu Jambû-dvîpaṃ ǁ
idu Jambû-dvîpa .... n idu surôrvvîruhaudâryyadind int |
bhyudaya-śrî-lîleyiṃ Rêcharasana teradind unnatatvakke pakk â- |
dorevett â-Mêruvin teṅkaṇa-deśeyoḷ ad ên oḷppuvett irddudô śrî- |
ll-eraliṅg aḷḷâḍuv ell ell elema ........ pushpaṅgaḷiṃ haṇṇa-goñchal- |
sîmeyan â-Bharata-śrî- | ... tôrppu ...... nâḍe Kuntaḷa-dêśaṃ ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ mattam alli janada kôṇṭeyuṃ guṇada vyavahâramuṃ binadada vyavasâyamuṃ rasada
tor̤egaḷin eseva kêḷî-vanaṅgaḷuṃ birayigaḷ Kâmana .. yikke .. r̤eyaṃ goṇḍirppa ḷîḷeyiṃ nereda-kama-
ḷinigaḷuṃ Vasanta-kêḷige sameda pondôṇigaḷa-gondaḷamuṃ dharmmakke nermmamuṃ bhôgakk âgara-
mum âda ghaṭikâ-sthânamuṃ ratna-samṛiddhige sôltu sa .... magaḷ goṇḍud enipa parikheyiṃ râja-
maṇḍaḷa-samâjam enipa kâminîyara mukha-kamaḷa-nikaramuṃ grâma-nagara-khêḍa-kharvvaṇa-ma-
ḍamba-drôṇâmukha-pura-patṭana-râjadhânigaḷa bana ..... m elli nôḷvaḍav alli meredu nava-vidham
âgi tôrppa Kuntaḷa-dêśakke ǁ

lg.l: ttamar âtma-kîrttiy â-bhû- | ramaṇige muttugaḷa toḍav enal priyar âdar ǁ
Châḷukya-bhûbhujar ddivi- | kêḷiyoḷ ire perage nereye kâmpuvol irddar |
bhû-vadhuge Raṭṭar avaraṃ | sôvuttaṃ Tailan âḷdidaṃ ner̤e dhareyaṃ ǁ
avard â-Tailaṅge Satyâśrayane magan avaṅg âtmajaṃ Vikraman tân |
avanind ant Aayyaṇaṃ tâṃ kir̤iyane Jayasiṃhâṅkanuṃ tamman ant Â- |
havamallaṃ tat-sutaṃ tat-tanayan esava Sômêśvaraṃ tan-mahîśaṅ- |
ge vaḷaṃ Permmâḍi-Dêvaṃ magan avana magaṃ tâne Bhûlôkamallaṃ ǁ
Kaḷachuri-tiḷakanan êṃ peṇ- | gaḷa chittaṃ hosatan ar̤asut irppudu hosate ǁ
dâḍegaḷ unṭ ivaṅge raṇadoḷ sale mûḍuvav êrid-âneyoḷ |
.. ḍoḷav ant av anya-nṛipa-rakta-visiñchanav end arâti .... |
dd ôḍade nilvan âvan enut irppudu Bijjalanaṃ jagaj-janaṃ ǁ
masagidud añjad ântavaroḷ â-sura-kânteyarg ânta-bêṭav u- |
bbasav enisittu kâdid eḍe nettara-jaugine kês-oranteyaṃ |
pasarisit endu bandu śaraṇ embudu Bijjalanaṃ dvishaj-janaṃ ǁ
baḷedant â-Bijjaḷaṅg ên adaṭ esedudo pêḷ Śiṃhaḷâdhîśvaraṃ be- |
ttaḷigaṃ Nêpâḷakaṃ ghaṭṭivaḷan aḍapadâḷ Kêraḷaṃ Gujjaraṃ kam- |
maḷigaṃ matt-â-Turushkaṃ kudure vesadavaṃ Lâlan âd achchuḷâytaṃ |
heḷeyaṃ Pâṇḍyaṃ Kaḷiṅgaṃ kari-paricharan âg âḷ-veseṅgeyye nichchaṃ ǁ
jagamaṃ saṃprîtiyim Bijjala-nṛipatiya tammaṃ bhujâ-garvvadiṃ Mai- |
jagatî-nâthânutâtam baḷikam avaniyaṃ tâḷdidaṃ Sôyi-Dêvaṃ ǁ
kramadiṃ Karṇṇâṭamaṃ Kuntaḷaman olaviniṃ tîḷdi taḷkaysi ramyâṅ- |
gaman imbim bimbip oḷpaṃ paḍedu pṛithula-Lâṭakke Kâñchî-pradêśa- |
kke manaṃbett eyde râgaṃ budida-kara-sarôjâtamaṃ nîḍiy â-Râ- |
yamurâri-kshôṇipaṃ mêdiniyan inisu vand êka-bhôgyakke dandaṃ ǁ
bhû-taḷamaṃ baḷikkam avanim kir̤iyâtan enippan âdoḍaṃ |
khyâtiyin ârggav alte hiriyâtan enal dhare Śaṅkamôrvvîpa- |
daṃ kâmini bhûmi gaura-ruchiyind esed êṃ |
savan âr nNiśśaṅkamalla-kshitipatige tach-chakriyindaṃ baḷikk Â- |
pavarg êka-chchhatramaṃ meysiri mer̤evinegaṃ prâjya-sâmrâjyadindaṃ ǁ
ttam adaṃ tach-chakriyind ittalum odavida râjâvaḷî-lîlegaṃ tan- |
dum id ê saptâṅgamaṃ kâṇisidan ene jagaṃ mantradiṃ tantradiṃ vi- |
kramadiṃ śrîyiṃ sad-âchâradin osed esedaṃ Rêchi-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ
Jinanaṃ tanna manaṃ manaḥ-prakṛitiyaṃ sad-vidyey â-vidyeyaṃ |
tanuv ant â-tanuvaṃ viḷâsav adan udyal-lakshmiy â-lakshmiyaṃ |
vinutaudâryyav adaṃ jagaṃ jagaman imb î-kîrttiy âliṅgisal |
kavi-tati balmeg ôlagise kâminiyar sobagiṅge sôle bêḷ- |
pavargal udâra-vṛittig olaviṃ nara-śâsanavâge râjyam ud- |
ke vaḍeye Rêchirâjan esedaṃ jasadiṃ vasudhaika-bândhavaṃ ǁ
naḍeda-nelaṃ raṇôrvvareyoḷ ant anituṃ tanag ajja-pajjariṃ |
paḍeda-nelan dal emban asig anya-nṛipâḷaran ikkad unte kiḷ- |
taḍe kaḍu-dôsav emban asahaṃ mige beṅguḍe patte tâne beṅ- |
guḍuvavol emban ên adaṭanô kali-Rêchaṇa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ ǁ
janaparoḷ onduv achcharasiyargge sayambarav âge saggadoḷ |
janiyisit Indra-bhûruhake tôraṇadin tavil embud eyde mê- |
dini vasudhaika-bândhava-chamûpati Rêchaṇan êṃ kṛitârtthanô ǁ
peḍe-vaṇi Śêshanoḷ Sarasijôdaran ambudhiyol mṛigâṅkav and |
pp eḍe dig-ibhaṅgaḷoḷ kurupu dôrppinegaṃ jagamam musuṅkit iṅ- |
gaḍal ene kîrtti Rêchan esedam jasadim vasudhaika-bândhavaṃ ǁ
Śrîvachchaṃ siriyiṃ samṛiddhan esev â-Nâgâmbikâ-sûnu bhô- |
bhâvaṃ bettire chelvan end enisidaṃ śrî-Rêchi-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
gara-khaṇḍakk artthivaṭṭ â-nṛiparoḷ paḍed imbindav âḷd-irppan â-Rê- |
charasaṃ tân endoḍ ê-vaṇṇipudo nisadav î-dêśadind oḷmeyaṃ bi- |
ttaradiṃ paṅkêja-rûpaṃ Banavasey adar̤oḷ śrîya-vôl irppud embeṃ ǁ
kusuma-rajaṃ rasâvaḷi taḷir sôvaḍâḍuva kîra-jâḷav emb |
esakade chalvuv êr̤ida-nelaṃ nele-verchchida pûgoḷam bisur- |
pp esagada-nuṇ-bisal suḷiva kamm-elar îkshise hachchan oppuv-â- |
gasav eseyalke nâḍ esavud entu Basantada sṛishtiy embinaṃ ǁ
śrî-vadhug eseyalke śauryyad oppaṃ Boppaṃ ǁ
âdudu hage hugada bâḷa bâḷvêliy avaṅg |
nuḍi-galalande muddu-nuḍi satya-patâkan enippud oppid a- |
ṭṭ aḍi Nigaḷaṅka-mallan ene râjipud ôje Kaḍamba-Rudran emb- |
paḍedudu Sôma-bhûmipana śauryya-guṇâvaliy êṃ kṛitârtthanô ǁ
ninag ant â-kâmam îgaḷ keḷeyan enipudaṃ tôrppuvol emman erchche- |
chchu nitântam ninna pâdakk eragipan enutaṃ kânteyar jjôle kâlg â- |
janitârâgambol âgaḷ mer̤evud anudinaṃ Śôma-bhûmîśa-pâdaṃ ǁ
munidoḍe Sôma-bhûpan emag irppeḍey â-Banavâsey ant ad ant |
anitum ad îgaḷ âtana bhujâsi-latâ-vṛitav âytu pokku sil- |
kinoḷ ire pollad end ahitar ôḍi samudrada vêḷegaṇḍu tâv |
anumisi vêḷegoṇḍu sukham irppar idên adaṭiṅge nôntanô ǁ
sśaraṇ-endar ssêvakar bbêl̤pavarg old îvan î-Sôma-bhûmî- |
śvaran enduṃ râgadiṃ saṅgataman abhayamaṃ bêṭavaṃ tushṭiyam sayt- |
iravaṃ samprîtiyaṃ bêl̤pudan ene janav audâryyadiṃ varyyan âdaṃ ǁ
pâḷanoḷ êka-bhôgyav enisal tanag âgiral â-sthaḷaṅgaḷaṃ |
pâḷipa kâpu bîra-siri Lakshmi Sarasvatiy ende sairipaḷ |
mêḷisal îvaḷê per̤aran endene Lachchala-Dêviy oppuvaḷ ǁ
mini mâḍal bigiyappan eytare parôrvvîpâḷariṃ kappav int |
inisuṃ mâḍad iralke dushṭa-tati tappaṃ puṭṭidaṃ Boppan emb- |
î-Borppaṃ Dêvakig âd | â-boppaṃ tappad appan ar̤id êṃ kîrtti- |
uguriṃ satta Hiraṇyakâkshakan enippaṅg and adêṃ biṭṭa-kaṇg |
mugey end î-vibhu-Boppa-Dêvan alevaṃ satvâdhikânyaughamaṃ ǁ
kadana-krîḍeyoḷ uḷḷa ninna dayey êk int ormmeyuṃ tôr̤ad î- |
Madana-krîḍeyoḷ uṭṭudaṃ mar̤edaḍam nîr-vokkaḍam nâṇa putt- |
u dal ondirddaḍav ittoḍam taleyanê saṃprîtiyaṃ tôr̤ey end |
odaviṃ mêḷise kânteyar mmer̤evan î-śrî-Boppa-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ
pâl-abhishêkav ant enit ad âdaḍav alliy adṛisyam appa pû- |
lîleyi majjanakk er̤eye vâmade śîtaḷavâgi barppaveṃ |
sâlave Śântinâthana mahâ-mahimatvaman oldu baṇṇisal ǁ
pô-rame piḍid irdda padmam ene tach-chhishyaṃ ǁ
bhṛin mati posat enisi negaḷdan â-Munichandraṃ ǁ
lôkaman âvagaṃ beḷagidaṃ jasadiṃ Munichanara-dêvan a- |
paṃ taḷedaṃ sva-mantra-gati dhûrtta-janakk ativarttiy embinaṃ ǁ
mantaṃ Śântiyane mâḍi śaṅkaran enipaṃ ǁ
Siṅgana kântey alte siriy âtana kêsara-mâḷey amba chel- |
viṅg eḍegoṇḍu Mâḷan avarg âdan avaṅg eṇeyâge Mâḷiyakk- |
aṃ guṇa-yukti-kântey avarg imbine puṭṭidan Ekkan Ekka-gau- |
ḍaṅg anujâtan â-Ker̤eyamaṃ mer̤edam stuti-jîvanôdayaṃ ǁ
dan avaṃ .. resavve nallaḷ âdaḷu nalaviṃ ǁ
avar-irvarggav udâttan appan enisirdd â-Boppa-gâvuṇḍan u- |
dbhavamuṃ tânu vudâtta-vṛittiyum anûnaudâryamuṃ permmey o- |
ppavud âg ire puṭṭi kîrtti-paḍedam tann-ichchevol Châki-gau- |
ḍi vinûtâṅgaja-vârddhiyoḷ paḍeye sat-puṇyâṅkanaṃ Śaṅkanaṃ ǁ
haran ene Śaṅkaram paḍedan oppe charitradoḷaṃ ... rttiyaṃ ǁ
dinam ellaṃ dâna-kêḷî-samayame tanag end embinaṃ nîtiy ellaṃ |
taneg end âgirddav endembinav ari-kuḷav ellaṃ sva-khal̤gâhataṃ śâ- |
kiniyargg end âdud end embina voḍamey ad allaṃ jagat-pôshaṇakk em- |
binav â-sâmanta-Śaṅkam negaḷdan eḷegav âtaṅkav âgalke tanniṃ ǁ
pathikaṅg ishṭaṅge śishṭaṅg adhanan enipavaṅg ârtti-yâdaṅge nityâ |
tithig âḷg anyaṅge mânyaṅgav avanibeḷeya .. bu-geṭṭaṅge bhâra- |
grathitaṅg ent embavaṅg ên enuten udisidaṅg ârggav old ittu dausthya- |
vyatheyaṃ mâṇippan eṃ mântanada kaṇiyo sâmantaroḷ Saṅkarâṅkaṃ |
kshiti san-maryyâdeyaṃ bandhugaḷ anudina-san-mânavaṃ dhârmmikar san- |
..... baṇṇikuṃ puṇyada tavaro diṭaṃ nôḍe sâmanta-Śaṅkaṃ ǁ
vineya-rasaṅgaḷim taṇipi yâchakaraṃ maneg oydu santataṃ |
kanakada bâḍan ittu mige sokkisi sêvyara ...... |
......... a mâr̤ugoṇḍ avara nâlegeyaṃ prabhu-Śaṅkaraṃ yaśô- |
dhanan enisirddan alladoḍe mâruvarê rasanâ-nikâyamaṃ ǁ
mana siri kaṇ-deradaḷ embine sogeyisidar ǁ
ant esed âpta-mantri vibhu-Boppan oḍarchchidam oḷmeg oppamaṃ |
śântate dânav aṇmu charitaṃ siri kômaḷa-rûpav oppiral ǁ
iniyaṅg ubhaya-bhava-sukhav ad ene karav esedaḷ ǁ
.......... ti rûpake yathâ rûpaṃ tathâ śîlav end |
kk erevaṃ Sôma-sahôdaraṃ śiśuteyoḷ Muddayya Muddayyan â- |
daradiṃ kaḷpa-kujatamaṃ paḍevan end â-chûtamaṃ varddhipaṃ ǁ
pratibimbaṃ pada-ghâtamaṃ kaḷevud â-raṅgakke kambhakke hṛid- |
tatiyaṃ jaṅgama-chitradind ene janaṃ sâmantha-Śaṅkaṃ jagan- |
nutamaṃ mâḍisidaṃ Jinêndra-gṛihamaṃ Mâguṇḍiyoḷ râgadiṃ ǁ
â-Bhava-bhâvadim muni-varaṃ sthaḷa-vṛittiyan ittan uttamaṃ ǁ
sthiravâg ir ittan aḍakeya | maran aynûr̤-uḷḷa-tôṇṭav â-pûdôṇṭaṃ |
berasu subhûmiya mattar | vvare garddey ad-ondu-gâṇav end int initaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja Kâḷâñjana-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ
pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ śauryya-pañchânanaṃ gîta-Chaturânanaṃ śubhaṭar-âdityaṃ Bijja-bhûbhujâ-
patyaṃ gaja-sâmanta jaya-kâminî-kântaṃ suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ Kaḷachuryya-râjya-lakshmî-
pratishṭhitâyata-bhujaṃ Râya-Nârâyaṇaṃ Bharatâgamâmbhôdhi-pârâyaṇaṃ Giridurgga-mallaṃ śrî-
mad-Âhavamallaṃ Modeganûra nelevîḍinalu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-
pâda-padmôpajîvi śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ bâhattara-niyôgâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ
Rêchi-Dêvarasan â-Mâguṇḍiya Ratnatraya-dêvara basadiy-âchâryyar Bhânukîrtti-siddhânta-dêvaraṃ
barisi munnaṃ samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Banavâsi-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ
Padmâvatî-dêvî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ mṛigamadâmôdaṃ mârkkôla-Bhairavaṃ Kâdamba-kaṇṭhî ..
...... kâminî-lôlaṃ husivara śûlaṃ nigaḷaṅka-mallan asu-hṛit-sella gaṇḍara-dâvaṇi subhaṭa-śirô-
maṇi ity-akhila-nâmâvaḷî-samâḷaṅkṛitan appa Boppa-Dêva .... baḷiya bâḍaṃ Taḷaveyaṃ tri-bhôgâ-
bhyantara-viśuddhiyim sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâraṃ sarvva-namaśyav âgi parikalpisidudaṃ Śaka-varsha
* So in the original. nûr̤a-nâlkeneya ............ suddha-pañchamî-Budhavâradand â-Ratnatraya-dêvar-abhishêkâdy-
aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôgakkaṃ ṛishiyar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ vidyârtthigaḷa .............. basadi pesa
........ khaṇḍa-spuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkav endu â-śrîman-Mûla-saṅghada Krânûr-ggaṇada Tintrika-
gachchhada Nunna-vaṃśada śrîmad-Bhânukîrtti-siddhânta ...... koṭṭu ........ mahâ-pradhânaṃ
krita-jayâkarshaṇa-vidhânaṃ dhanur-vidyâ-Dhanañjayan âkarṇṇita-raṇa-rabhasa-bhîta-bhû ......
...... da-Vidyâdharaṃ kâvya-kaḷâ-dharan enipa Murâri-Kêśava-Dêvaṅge dharmma-pratipâḷanamaṃ
samarppisidan âtana prabhâvam entendoḍe ǁ

lg.l: ire gar̤ivetta tanna śaraliṃ gar̤i mûḍi divakke pâr̤i dus- |
stara-ripu kâdi ga .......... na ........ Murâri-Kêśava ǁ

div.p:
.... â-basadiyal omme nânâ-dêśada vyavahârigaḷ tanda-bhaṇḍada krayakke nâlkuṃ sthaḷada
baṇañju-mummuri-daṇḍamuṃ ............ tta ........ kana mṛidu-hṛidayarâgi yâ-sthaḷavaṃ
pokku mâr̤ida bhaṇḍada poṅge vîsa maḷavege hâga javaḷakke bêḷe int initumaṃ ................
dharmmamaṃ prati .. dar anêka-janmârjita-pâpa-bâdheyaṃ pariharisi nânâ-sukaṅgaḷan-anubhavisu-
var pratipâlisade kiḍisidavar êḷeneya-narakamaṃ pokku .............. var ǁ (usual final verses).

div.head:
198
At the same village, on a stone near the basti.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa bhuja-baḷa-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Kandâra-Dêvana 11 neya Naḷa-
saṃvatsarada .. tra-bahuḷa-amavâse-Vaḍḍavârad andu Muḍiya sâ .... vanta sanyasana-samâdhiyaṃ
mâḍi sugati-prâptan âdaṃ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî gaja-sailêndu-śaśaṅka ......... Kârttika-kṛishṇa-pak-
sham ene himanâ .............. Śanivârav uttarayaṇa ... sa ........ praṇashṭa ... dêvara guḍḍan
eseva Śânta ...... navaranu sâmanta mu ...... manadoḷu tâ pañcha-padavaṃ chintisutta ......
maramu .. svargga-janakke .... âpta-janaṃ parivâraṃ bandhu-janamum âśrita-janamuṃ niled ella-
ruṃ ........ śaraṇ illad endu ... ḷuttiddaru
(rest effaced).

div.head:
199
At the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa pratâpa-chakravartti ...... Dêvara varshada 28 neya Śârvari-
saṃvatsarada Kârttika ........ Chikka-Mâgaḍiya akkasâle Bammôja sa ...... vadira ...... gati ..
................................................ neyde pûṇdu sat-purusha-siṅghan udâtta-
nidhi sach-charitaṃ paḍedaṃ samâdhiyaṃ ǁ

div.head:
200
At the same place.

lg.l: kk ê mât andina Sîteyiṃ .... Vâg-dêviyind aggaḷaṃ ǁ
janakaṃ Saṅkaya-Nâyakaṃ janani tâṃ Muddavve Śântîśvaraṃ |
muni-nâthaṃ Nayakîrtti-dêva-muniy ârâdhyaṃ dal end andaḍ âr |
vvanitâ-ratnam enippa Sântaleyavol dhanyarkkaḷ î-dhâtriyal ǁ
tân î-dhareg adhikey enesi Sântave sukhadiṃ |
tân aididaḷ amara-lôkamaṃ halar ar̤iyal ǁ

div.head:
201
At the same place.
div.p:
śrî svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa pratâpa-chakravartti .... dhâvi-saṃvatsarada Âśvayuja-bahuḷa 5
Sômavâra ........ sana-samâdhiyiṃ paḍedu sugati-prâptan âda maga .............. Virôdhî-
saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śu 2 Śukravâradandu Bîrôja muḍipi sugati-prâptan âda ǁ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śri
........ Bêspativârad andu Bommave sannasana-samâdhiyaṃ ........ âdaḷu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî ǁ

div.head:
202
At the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-pratâpa-chakravartti Hoysaḷa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva-varusha-
da 21 neya Prajâpati-saṃvatsarada Mârggaśira-suddha 7 Âdivâradandu ǁ

lg.l: sâjadin îyal ârppa Jina-bhaktiy ad ênuman îyalârade ǁ
vara-guṇi Mallavve-gauḍig ene voppadar âr ǁ

div.head:
203
At the same village, on a vîrakal in the yard of the Kallêsvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-pravuḍa-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Râma[chandra]-Rây-
ana râjyôdayada 14 neya Svabhânu-saṃvatsara Jêshṭa-su 11 Budhadandu Chikka-Mâgaḍiya ......
ja-Nâyakanu dhâḷiyan .. dalli taḷt ir̤idu mer̤adu sura-lôkake prâputan âda maṅgaḷa mahâ

div.head:
204
On a 2nd vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada hadmaydeneya Pramôdûta-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-suddha-
pañchamî-Âdityavâra Boppa-Dêva Nâgari-khaṇḍa 70 kke nâr-ggavuṇḍu geyvutt iralu Tripurântaka-
dêvarig âḷuva Kiri-Mâguṇḍiya tur̤u harivalli surig ir̤idu mer̤edu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
205
On a 3rd vîrakal.
div.p:
śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada padinâr̤eneya Prajôtpatti-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-suddha-daśamî-
Bṛihaspativâra śrîmatu Boppa-Dêva Nâgara-kha 70 ttakke nâr-ggavuṇḍu geyye śrîmatu Tripurântaka-
dêvarig âḷva Kir̤iya-Mâguṇḍiya malaparu mutti tur̤uvaṃ koṇḍu peṇḍir uḍiyan urchchi pôpalli Kâchi-
Seṭṭiya magaṃ Tailama tur̤uvam magurchchi surig ir̤idu mer̤edu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
206
On a 4th vîrakal.
div.p:
............ ryya bhuja-baḷa chakravartti Râyamu ........ da 10 neya Durmmukhi-saṃvatsara-
da ........ Âdivâradandu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśva ........ ra-khaṇḍa-eppattuman âḷuttire śrî ..
...... śvaraṃ Vikramâditya-Dêva Banavase-pannirchchhâ ........ ma sukhadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyutt-
am ire śrîmân-nâḷ-pra ...... gâvuṇḍaṃ Chikka-Mâguṇḍiyalu sukhadindam ire pri ... traṃ Boppa-Gâ-
vunḍa Chaur̤oḍeyiṃ baruttiralu malaha ...... lu Kâraḍiya Kâḷeyanu besasalu palaraṃ tâgi ta ...
mer̤adu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
207
On a 5th vîrakal.
div.p:
śrîmatu Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada ...... ydeneya Pramôdûta-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-suddha-pañ-
chamî-Âdityavâra Boppa-Dêva Nâgari-khaṇḍa 70 kke nâr-ggavuṇḍu geyuttiralu Tripurântaka-dêvarig
âḷuva Kiriya-Mâguṇḍiya Eka-gâvuṇḍa tur̤u harivalli suri ...... mer̤edu sura-lôka-pâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
208
At Kôḍihaḷḷi (same hobli), on a vîrakal to the north of the Malleśvara temple.
div.p:
śrîmatu 13 ... nê Prajôtpatti-saṃvatsarada Mârgaśira-ba 7 Sô-lu Kôḍihaḷiya Marava Bomme-gauḍana
maga Kappaṇṇa kaḷḷaru hoyidalli svargga-lôkastan âdanu âtanige kallu-pratishṭhe.

div.head:
209
At the same village, on a stone in the back-yard of Kariyappa’s Basappa.
div.p: śrîmatu Sidhappa-Nâyakaru Bhairappage âśîrvadâ

Kôḍihaḷḷi-Basavappanu hujuru bandu puṇḍutana mâḍutidha Mañche-Baramana tale-hoyidu kashṭa-
baṭṭabage Śivapurada-sîme Kôḍihaḷḷi-grâmadinda tanage uttâravâda umbaḷi nashṭa saha ga 14 ǁ 1 ǁ o
ke akâla-chetravâgi hâkida pagadi-haṇa barabêk endu varata mâḍuttâre hêraḷa-nashṭa sahakû uttâ-
rava koṭṭa umbaḷi-pagadi koḍalâre pâlisikombadiri appâṇey âgâbâk endu hêḷikoḷutân endu arikeyâd-
alli yî-Basavappage uttârava koṭṭa umbaḷige akâla-chetravâgi hâkida-pagadi barabêḍav endu Visu-
saṃ- | rada Jêshṭa-suda 2 lu appaṇe âgede â-pramâṇu yî-Basappage uttâravâda umbaḷige akâlâ-
chetrav-âgi hâkida pagadi bareyada-rîti kaṭṭumâḍiside sîmeyalli yi-bage haṇa barabêk endû kêḷalâ-
gadu yî-vâlle sênabavara kaḍatakke barasi tirigi koḍuvadâgi vâle 1

div.head:
210
On a 2nd stone at the same place.
div.p:
Yuva-saṃ- | da Śrâvaṇa-śu 15 lu Tavanidi-kôṭê-ṭhâṇyake pravêśa Yîśvara-saṃ- | da Jêshṭa-śu 1 lu
Mañche-Baramana nigrahake nirûpu bandalli yî-śu 14 lu nigraha mâḍidanu Udrê-santeyalu

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-nṛipa-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1680 neya Bahudhânya-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Jêshṭa-śu-10 lu śrîmat-Keḷadi-Sômasêkhara-Nâyakaru Bhairage barasi kaḷuhisida kâryya Kôḍihaḷḷi-
Basavanu puṇḍatana-mâḍutidda Mañche-Baramana tale-hoyidu kashṭa-baṭṭidhêne umbaḷi pâlisi-koḷa-
bêk endu heḷikoḷuthânê â-rîti appaṇey âgabêk endu Śivaliṅgappanavaru hêḷikonḍa-sambanda uttârava
koṭadu | Uḍugaṇe-sîmê-sthaḷada sênabava barakoṭṭa chappu-pramâṇu yî-mâgaṇi-Sivapurada-sîme-
Kôḍihaḷi-grâmadinda huṭṭuvaḷiyinda ga 6 nilisida nashṭadinda ga 7 ǁ 3 ǁ o ubhayaṃ ga 13 ǁ 3 ǁ o yîga
hechidu pagudiyinda huṭṭivaḷi-mêle ga 1 kke σ 1 | o lu ga ǁ 2 ǁ o nashṭadabagye kûḍida dâsôhada sistu
σ ǁ o ubhayaṃ ga ǁ 3 ubhayaṃ ga 14 ǁ | ǁ o hadinâlku-varahanu âru-haṇa-aḍavanu yî-Basavage Mañ-
che-Baramana tale-hoyidu kashṭa-paṭṭabagye umbaḷiyâgi uttârava koṭṭidhêve rêkhê pramâṇu bhûmi
viṅgaḍisikoṭṭu yî-kâgadava sênabavara kaḍitakke barasi tirigi yivana vaśakke koḍuvadâgi śrîmatu
Sidhapa-Nâyakaru Bhairappage âśîrvâda | Kôḍihaḷḷi-Basavapanu puṇḍatana-mâḍutida Mañchê-Bara-
mana talehoyidu kashṭabaṭṭa-samanda Sivapurada-sîmê-Kôḍihaḷḷi-grâmadinda huṭṭuvaḷiyinda ga 6
nilisida nashṭadinda ga 7 ǁ 3 ǁ o ubhayaṃ ga 13 ǁ 3 ǁ o yîga hechchida pagudiyinda huṭṭuvaḷî-mêle
ga 1 kke σ 1 | o lu ga ǁ 2 ǁ o nashṭada bage kûḍida dâsôhada sistu σ ǁ o ubhayaṃ ga ǁ 3 ubhayaṃ
ga 14 ǁ | ǁ o nu umbuḷi uttârava koṭṭu prâku nirûpavâgi adê gaḍi-kalu hâkisi-koḍuva rîti appaṇey
âgabêk endu yî-Basavapanu hêḷikoḷuthân endu arikeyâdalli yî-śîme Kôdihaḷḷi-grâmadinda yî-Basavapp-
age uttâravâda umbuḷi ga 14 ǁ | ǁ o hadinâlku varahânnu âraṇa-aḍḍada bhûmige hujûrind-ûligada-
na kaḷuhikoṭu gaḍi-kalla hâkisi-koḍahêḷi Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada Mârgiśira-ba 11 appaṇe-âgiade
â-pramâṇu yî-sîme Kôḍihaḷḷi-grâmadinda yî-Basavapage uttâravâda umbuḷi ga 14 ǁ | ǁ o ke gaḍi-kalla
hâkisuva-bage hujûrinda ûḷagadana kaḷuhiade chaû-grâmadavara tarasikoṇḍu nirûpu-parmâṇu
bhûmige yivana muntiṭu gaḍi-kalla hâkisikoṭu â-vivarike hujûru barasi-kaḷahôdu yî-vâle sênabôvara
kaḍitake barasi ttirigi koḍuvadâgi vâlle 1

div.head:
211
At Harige (same hobli), on a vîrakal to the north of the Mallikârjuna temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-praüḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-vîra-Râmachandra-
Râya-râjyôdayada 25 neya Jaya-saṃvatsara ...... su 7 Â ǁ Harigeya Nîla-gauḍana maga Malla-gauḍa
âtana maga Sôva-gauḍan âtana maga Bomma-gauḍanû taṃ vibbaru haḍavani .... veyadese Indûr-
aḷuvinali tur̤ugoḷalu maraḷchi raṇa-śûrarâgi ir̤idu mer̤adu sura-lôka-prâptar âdaru | Malikârjjuna-
samîpadali ǁ

lg.l: jitêna labhyatê lakshmîḥ ǁ (usual final verses).

div.p:
śrî-Nîlakaṇṭha-dêvâya namaḥ ǁ śrî-râya-haḍạda-Nârâyaṇaṃ sakaḷa-saukyâdhipati śrî-châ .... Chaṅga-
dêva-Nâya .. â-Nâ-gavuḍana maga Boma-gauḍanu tur̤uva maraḷchida bîra-sirige mechch-esava ......
ker̤eya keḷage gadde .... r̤annu koṭṭaru nettaru-goḍagiyâgi ǁ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî bîragalla ....
ôjana moṃ .. Mâr̤aga-vôja

div.head:
212
On a 2nd vîrakal at the same place.
div.p:
Sârvvari-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-su 12 Maṃ svasti śrîmatu pratâpa-chakravartti Hoyisaṇa-bhuja-baḷa
śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Râyana śrîmanu mahâ-pradhâna Toya-Siṅgeya-daṇṇâyaka Hânuṅgala Basavaiya-
Nâykanu Vudareya kôṭeyalli ṭhâṇântaravâgi yidalli śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Baṅka-Nâykan-
aḷiya Gaṅgeya-sâhaṇi Beyama-sâhaṇi Javaneya-Nâyka yî-mûvara saṃvaraṇe-sahita bandu mutti
kâdidali taḷt ir̤idu mer̤adu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ
âtana tamma Pârisaya nilisida kallu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî ǁ

div.head:
213
On a stone in Nirvâṇi Kariya’s land, west of the village.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa śâ 1594 Paridhâvi-saṃvatsarada Aśâḍa-śu 10 lu
śrîmatu Keḷadi-Śivappa-Nâyakara putrarâda Sômaśêkhara-Nâyakara puṇya-strîyarâda Chennamâji-
yavaru Harigeya taḷavâra Nâgana maga Koṭṭige koṭṭa bhû-svâsti bîjavari σ 1 ¼ ke hakkalu saha
rêkhe ga 3 mûru varahâna haḷada gaddeyannû umbaḷiyâgi biṭṭevâgi | ninna santâna-parampariyâgi
uṇḍubahudu

div.head:
214
At Kaṇasôge (same hobli), on a vîrakal in front of the Râmêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa Dvârâvatî-pura-
varâdhîśvaraṃ pratâpa-chakravartti Hoysaṇa vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva-varshada 20 neya Prabhava-saṃ-
vatsarada Bhâdrapada-bahuḷa-dasamî-Âdivâradandu śrîmanu mahâ-pradhânaṃ Pratipanna-Sâra-
sûryya-Dêva-daṇṇâyaka Taladi kâhadu śrîman-nâḷu-prabhu Kaṇṇasôgeya Yar̤akâvi-gauḍana tamma
Êcha-gauḍanu .... Pañchâḷara Bûtan ir̤idu tur̤uvaṃ koṇḍuhôhalli ...... rêśvariya banadalli tur̤uvaṃ
magurchchi taḷt ir̤idu sura-lôka prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
215
On a 2nd vîrakal at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî .......... siṃha-Dêva-varsha ...... Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarad Âśvayuja-ba 10 Bri-dallu
Kaṇasôgeya Malli-Seṭṭiya maga Dêvaṇṇanu ubheya-Gaṭṭa-sâḷage bahalli kaḷḷaru tâgidaḍe palabaraṃ
kondu surig-ir̤idu mer̤adu sura-lôka-prâptan âda |

div.head:
216
At Kauli (same hobli), on a vîrakal in front of the Kallêsvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda .......... Jiḍuvaḷigey-eppatuma sukha .......... yuttam
ire Tâṇagundûra ha ...... sûr̤egoḷal endu Bandaḷikeya ...... -Sigi-Seṭṭiya maga Râma-Seṭṭi ....
siya kâydu palaraṃ taḷt ir̤idu konda ...... t endoḍe

div.head:
217
On another vîrakal at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrimatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa pratâpa-chakravartti yeraḍaneya Kandâri-Dêva-varshada
Kîlaka-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-su-purṇṇamî-Sukravâradalu anâdi-saṃsiddham appa dibya-liṅga-
Praṇamanâtha-dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakarum appa Tâṇagundûra mûvattichchhâsira-mahâ-
jaṅaṅgaḷa baḷiya bâḍada Kavileya Maḷḷiya Homma-gauḍana maga Paṇama-gauḍa Kalaseyaheriyalu
